1:
Hey, Light, come help me out with training!
Heh. I feel so special, getting drilled by a champion.

The stuff I cook might not be fancy, 
but you can bet your bottom coin it's good. If you're hungry, let me whip something up.

I don't remember anything about my life before Starview.
...Aw, it's not a big deal. I'm sure it'll all come back to me.
Man, imagine the sorts of people that must be living on these worlds. Kick-ass soldiers, full-tilt weirdos... I've gotta find a way to stand out!
Starview's sure come to life. It's nothing like back when it was just me and Stella. It... feels like home now.

Light, you think I don't see those carrots on your plate? Eat your veggies, okay? You're a big-boy champion.
...That is the weirdest thing I've ever said.

Come on!
 On to the next world!
I promise I can handle it.

Don't you worry about me. I've picked a few new tricks and stunts.
I'm more than ready for the next world!
10:
Huh? You want me to break up a fight?
Not my problem—let 'em duke it out.
...I wouldn't get between them if I were you.

All those big balls up there are other worlds?
Hah! I wish Rolan could've seen 'em—he would've lost his mind.
It's not like I have anywhere better to be. Might as well kill some time with you guys.

Alk! Wanna go hunting with me?
I'm bored of sitting around doin' nothing.
What, they're STILL fighting? Nuh-uh, not my problem! Go get Light to chew 'em out instead. I need a quick catnap...

You can't find Stella? Tch, she's always stickin' her nose into trouble.
...What're you waiting for? Let's go find her.

*snoring* ...GAAAH! Hey!
Which of you bastards stepped on my tail?!...Hmph, can't a guy get a bit of sleep around here?

I was livin' with a target on my back.
I owe you my life—and I'll sure as hell make it up to you!
Hey, Rolan... You listening up there? Looks like I won't be seein' you as soon as I thought, but... I'll have damn good stories for you when I do!
111001:
Dost thou fear me, little one?
'Tis only natural to dread great power one cannot control.
All worlds are the same. Full of petty folk fretting over petty things... How dreadfully dull.

Let me make one thing clear. I am not a jungle gym for the youth of Starview to clamber over.
...Wait! Get them off of me!

Little one, what seekest thou on this journey?
...What? I merely wish for a tale to whittle away the time.
Thou fearest no dragon or deity, and seekest to traverse the skies. Hah! Very well! I will lend thee my wings, if only to see thy hubris plunge thee to thy death!
I am Vagner. King of dragons, master of fire, and doom of mortals!
I find thy foolhardiness most interesting, child. Show me how one so insignificant can possibly change the future!
111002: Geez, Alk's a total wiz in the kitchen. But you know, I'm ALSO something of a chef myself... H-hey, where did everybody go?!
Oof. Can't believe we actually got shipwrecked like that out there... Looks like the Crimson Blades'll be in your care for a little longer, Alk!

Home? I don't plan on going back for a while—at least, not while there's adventure to embark on!
Full sail, you scallywags!
You're telling me ALL those spots are supposed to be different worlds? Wow... You think mine's up there? I'd love to show you sometime!
When you join the Crimson Blades, you're not just a crewmate, you're family. And that's the MARINA guarantee!

Ahoy there!
Marina of the Crimson Blades, totally here and totally ready to... Party. It. UP!
Whether its the end of the ocean or end of the universe, I'm on board for the long haul!
111003:
You wanna learn alchemy? Sure!
Just a little BAM here and there, and then it's like, KAPOW! Did you get all that?
Sometimes I think I'm just too gosh darn adorable for my own good!

Whoa... I never thought I'd see a place like this!
 So many worlds, so many people!
 How exciting!
Stella! Ohmigosh, that barrette looks SO adorable on you!  Maybe I'll get one and we can be twinsies!

I wish you guys could meet my crew someday!
 I just know you'd be the best of friends!
Uh... Atomic dissolution? Y-you want me to use it again? *sigh* If only I'd paid more attention to Master's lectures!
Yay! Super cute genius alchemist Clarisse is here to have some fun!
If I'm gonna be here for a while, I might as well make the best of it, right? Ooh, it's gonna be a blast!
121001:
Hey, wanna dance with me?
Hehe. Relaaax. There's nothing to be nervous about.

Behold the floating lotus of the desert—the one and only Sonia Therese!
...Dramatic, I know. But, believe it or not, I used to be pretty popular.

I never dreamed the world was so big.
...If I'd had all this opportunity growing up, would my life have been any different? Or was I destined to become a dancer?

Have you ever seen "Dance of the Moonfairy"? It's... otherworldly.
I'd love to take you sometime.

It's weird...
I'm not homesick at all, but... Standing here, and looking up at all those beautiful worlds, to me, home still shines the brightest.

I'm Sonia Therese, but all my friends call me Sonia!
Shall I dance for you?
I can reach new heights. I feel it in my core. I'll dance with the moon and stars themselves! All I need is your help to do it. You won't let me down, right?
121002: Let bygones be bygones—the stagnant pond is murky, but the flowing river runs clear. I think we'd all rather go with the flow!

What an amazing view of the heavens!
 I bet I could use the worlds for divination instead of stars.

Hm? Alk, there seems to be an angry spirit following you. Would you like me to exorcise it?
...Ah, never mind, it was just Light!
Ahaha, it was just one bad reading. The future is more malleable than you'd think—take it into your own hands!
I would never have dreamed of working with yokai, but... I'm really glad I did. Thank you!
Suizen Gogyou, here as guided by the elemental currents!

I've yet to repay my debt to you, so I'll stay and lend you my strength for a bit longer.
...And no, I won't take no for an answer.
131001: Hey, Alk! Do you know how to fry tofu? I could eat fried tofu every single day! ...Hint hint.
The people in Starview wear such peculiar clothing... How do you even put a dress like that on? I want to try wearing one!
Bold of you to address the great yokai Inaho Tamamo so casually!...Want to chat some more over tea?
Places to be, people to see! The yokai plays are such a hit, I hardly have time for myself. It sure is tough being super ultra famous and popular!

I hope you all are hungry, for I have prepared a feast—all by my self!See? Kitsune udon for everyone!
 Now, now, you need not thank me!

You speak to Inaho Tamamo, greatest yokai to ever live!
 Pretty cool, right? Right?
A real-life level up!You need not worry anymore, Stella. The power of friendship always wins!
131002:
What is it, Alky? Can't take your eyes off me?
Well, what can I say? My cuteness transcends dimensions.
Simply put, alchemy is the rearranging of substances. Doesn't matter what world I'm on. As long as matter exists, it's mind to command!

Wowee!
Cagliostro never even dreamed that worlds could float in the sky. You've gotta take me to all of them, okay?
Alk! Take me to the Kaleidoscope, now! Damn thing's changed its composition again. And stop moping! You got a date with the world's cutest.
Know what? I feel a connection with you. Got some bungling pupils back home myself. Yeah, I'll help you get your pruny old face back, "Champ."

I got a mystery for you. I'm almost sure someone arranged your sky so you can see all the worlds at once.
But who... and why even bother?

Hi theeere. I'm Cagliostro—only the cutest wittle genius ever.
Try not to fall head over heels, capiche?

Cagliostro WAS gonna hurry home, but Starview's really, really fun.
...Think I'll stick around for a while.
161002: In the heat of action, you don't have the luxury of hesitation or thinking. You got that?
I can think of a hundred things I like more than fightin'. You'd better start finding some... unless you wanna end up like me someday.
A spar? Heh... Why not? But you're payin' for drinks if I win. Deal?
Just like you have your reasons for fightin', I have my own for, well, not fightin'. And that's my business.
Part of me wishes I could drink the rest of my days away, but I've learned somethin'... Life's too short to pretend to be somebody else.
The name's Vyron. Adventuring? Hah! Forget it. I've long retired from that life, buddy.
Heh... Crazy how life can change in just the blink of an eye, ain't it?
141002: It's a lovely day. All the sprites are out, basking in the sun... If only it could be like this forever.

The sky's such a beautiful shade of blue...
Oh! I-I'm sorry! I didn't notice you there. Goodness gracious, are you hurt?

What does it mean to fulfill one's destiny?
...Oh, I'm sorry. That's not a question anyone can answer, is it?
I've been helping Alk with food preparation recently. Look! My wind magic can shred cabbage in no time at all! I daresay I've found my hidden talent!
I prayed to the wind and the sprites for good fortune on our journey. But I now know I mustn't rely on the strength of prayer alone.

You know, I used to want to be rid of my powers... But now, I'm not so sure.
I've gotten a bit greedy, I suppose.
Um... Excuse me. My name is Phiria Hermel. Could you tell me where I am?
I've decided to stop running from my problems—and start running towards my dreams! You'll support me along the way, won't you?
141003: Ah, my physical forms confuse you? Both represent me, yet neither fully encompass me. You are welcome to address my blade or spirit as you please.
Monster hunting? I will lend you my aid, but please go easy on me. I tire far faster than young folk such as yourselves.
My blade looks brand new? That is very kind, but I am older than you can imagine. Ahaha!
You have my deepest gratitude, Alk. Spending time with you brings back memories of my old partner.

That was quite a yawn, Alk!
 The two of us truly think alike. Ahaha! *yawn*
I am Murakumo, a sword forged in Yamato long, long ago. Though I long to once more adorn my old partner's hip, I recall neither his name nor face...

I, Murakumo, appoint you my new partner. I give you my blade and full support.
...If you are willing to keep an old man like me company.
141004: There's no rhyme or reason to adventure. But ALWAYS answer the call—you'll never know what it has in store!

Some lamp oil, a rope, and a sturdy pair of boots are all you need for adventure!
Get some good food and booze in the mix, and it don't get much better than that!

Countless worlds, countless adventures!
What are we waiting for? There's more than enough adventure for a lifetime to be had!
I may get irritating from time to time with my lessons, but just have some faith in this old head, eh?
I'm not gonna be here forever, but I think my best adventure's still yet to come—and that's you guys!

Adventuring's all about the journey, not the destination!
That lesson's free—next one's gonna cost you!

I thought my days of adventuring were numbered, but not anymore!
I'm here for the long haul!
151001: What makes a world? Is it a planet or a moon? Can it be an asteroid? Nephtim seeks answers.
home/hoshi

Running check on Nephtim...
All systems operating smoothly.
I am prepared to carry out orders.
home/nephtymni

Nephtim was created as a weapon.
Keeper, I await my next mission.
home/nephtymwa_tatakau_sonotameni

Overbathing has an adverse impact on morale. The alkaline nature of soap causes a stinging sensation in the eyes.
Stella... Can we put all future baths on hold?
home/kadono

Nephtim has determined that "cleaning" is an illogical act. "Order" is a man-made concept.
Abort mission... Abort mission!
home/katazukewa

Nephtim is... sleepy...
All systems... shutting down... Zzz...
home/nephtymwa_nemui
Nephtim will defend. No orders required!
home/nephtymwa_tatakau_meireiwa

Requesting an energy source.
I require less vegetables... and more meat!
home/nephtymwa_yokyusuru

Nephtim awakes. All nights end.
Keeper... what is your command?
ally/join
Nephtim understands. I have no more keeper. The only person I fight for... is me!
ally/evolution
151002:
Worry not!
I will hold off the enemy!...Well? Run away!
They are bound to get past me eventually!

Something troubles you, you say? You have some brass, coming to a prince for aid.
...Well, let's have it! I am not a mind-reader!
There shall be no stormy faces around me!Come now! Eat, be merry, and then take some rest!
F-f-fear? I f-f-feel no fear!My knees are... trembling in laughter!

You look dispirited...
You need not tell me what troubles you if it hurts. Just let me know how I can help.

Here is my new base, from whence I shall journey into foreign lands. Now! Bring me whither you will! By my sword and shield, 
I shall protect you!
Have I outgrown fear? Hah! As long as I have knees, they will knock together. But as long as I have breath, I shall protect you!
161001:
Aren't you just the cutest cookies in the world?
Big sister Belsidia would do anything for you. Aaanything.

If you're curious about the underbelly of society, I can show you any time.
Just keep it a secret from the tiny champion, will you?

I was alone for so long, I started craving human contact.
Hehe. I'm sure Stella can sympathize.
Don't be afraid of the dark. You might not be able to see... but it's all the better for feeling the world around you.

I like this Light far better than the one who killed me.
Hehe. Why don't you stay like that, honey bunny?

I'm Belsidia, Wicked Witch of the Rift.
I'm not usually a hero, but... if you choose to trust me, I won't disappoint.

There's no light that can illuminate the future. We're all just groping in the dark.
But don't worry. The Wicked Witch of the Rift has got a hold of you.
211001:
There are some who call me Dragon's Swain, instead of Dragon's Bane.
...That's fine. A battle is only truly won when you've earned the enemy's respect.
I want the strength to protect all that is good in the world...
To defeat dragons, first, you must learn about them. "If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles."
You remind me of my brother. I lost him because I was weak... But now, I have the strength to protect all that I hold dear.

I used to blindly hate dragons, but a friend helped me see the light...
It's what sparked a life-long fascination with these beautiful creatures.

I am Azel. Some know me as the Dragon Slayer, but you may call me whatever you wish.
My spear is at your service.
I'll get stronger... Stronger than anything. Stronger than dragons, and stronger than the me of yesterday!
211002: This is Aperio, my loyal and trusted servant. Hm? Of course we trust each other. What kind of master do you take me for?
They're so weird, aren't they, Aperio? Despite my attempts to frighten them so, they keep coming back... But I suppose I don't mind.
You're always welcome to join my collection of pets. Trust me, I promise you'll NEVER want to go back. Hehe.
A healthy relationship doesn't always have to be so... one-sided, but I do enjoy having my pets do my bidding... That's just how I show MY love. Hehe.
I may or may not have called you my friends, but inviting me to a tea party? Hmm... Fine. But you'd better prepare enough crepes to satisfy a queen!
Oh my... Did you just summon a summoner? Well played. I suppose I could stick around for a while... if you play your cards right. Hehe.
Oh, Aperio... One of these days you'll spread your wings and fly. But just remember—I'll be with you... always!
211003:
Ah, I love the smell of ninjutsu in the morning.
...Wanna whiff of my new bomb?

You want me to say, "believe it?"
...Look, I'm a REAL ninja, thanks.

I can make as many explosives as I want here! Hehe...
I'd stay outta the way if I were you. You might set something off!

Bombs aren't the only explosives, you know? You can rocket them into the sky and make art!That sounds cool?
...Just you wait and see!
Starview is already starting to feel like home. Sure isn't as quiet as the Veiled Village, but... gotta admit, I like it here.

Why be boring when I can arrive with a bang?
...It's nice to meet you.

I've done it... I've mastered all the properties of gunpowder!
Vanishing in a puff of smoke is for baaabies. I'm gonna make a BANG!
211004: My father was a demon, apparently. Not like I've ever met the bastard, though.
If you're going somewhere, take me with you. Crushing monsters is what I do best.
This village is full of weirdos... Hmph, no one even bats an eyelash at my horns.

Hah! Yaaah! Shaaah!Whew, that should do it.
...What are you looking at? If you're free, get in here and spar with me.

Damn it... What the hell does this say?
Maybe I should've got Soushiro to teach me how to read after all. Hey! You! Can you read this thing?
If you've got monsters to crush, I'm your guy. I'm Asukirimaru, the demon-born demon hunter!
Do you realize what you're doing? I may be half-human, but I'm also half-demon. If you've got the guts to train a monster, I'll make damn sure it pays off!
211005: Lend you my shield? Only if you're ready to be cursed for the rest of your life.
Damn shield glued itself to my dominant arm, but it has its perks. At least my defense is darn near unbreakable.

My evil curse senses are tingling...
Stop! Don't touch that item.
This shield's cursed. Won't come off no matter what I do....Hey, you're gonna rip my arm out of its socket.
Listen, shield. I don't care if you talk, but watch your language.
The name's Clyde. Was a mercenary for a while, but now I'm on a quest....You know anyone versed in magic?
What doesn't kill you makes you stronger, right? This shield has basically ruined my life, but payoff day's coming.
221001: I wonder how the other Swallow Knights are doing... They're not very worldly-wise, to say the least. I can't help but worry.

I picked up the sword so I could protect people.
Don't ever charge into battle without me.
A knight doesn't need noble blood if he has a noble spirit... I'll make the world understand that someday.

Alk, let's decide, once and for all, who is most suited to be Sir Light's squire!...I'm kidding!
 That's right. I've a sense of humor too, you know.
When we took our oaths, we knew we were chasing a child's dream. Didn't matter. Even if we couldn't change the world, we were taking the first step in the right direction.
When I was small, I'd pester my mother for tales about champions... But now that I've finally met one, I have to say, he's not quite what I pictured.

I am Yuwel of the House of Nouin.
My sword exists to defend all that is good in this world. Are you worthy of its services?

It's an honor fighting alongside you.
Here is where I'll fulfill my duty as the last Swallow Knight.
221002:
Starview Village is such a lovely place to live!
 Thank you, Stars, for the roof over my head.
Is it this late already? Goodness, I always lose track of time in the Kaleidoscope. If I'm to take care of others, I need to take care of myself first!

My church worships the Stars above, but I never knew each Star was its own world.
 ...I'll keep them all in my prayers!
The Bishop sent me away from the church on a mission, but... I'm not sure how to go about "experiencing love." Do you have any ideas?

The Bishop once taught me that the greatest prayers are the ones you make for others.
...Shall we pray for each other?
Hello, my name is Liesel Berger. I pray the Stars smile upon our meeting—and will do my best to spread their Light!
The Stars in all their benevolence have given me the strength to help people... And you have given me the courage. Thank you!
221003: *sigh* If only I were a pirate like my Czarina... There's no way I could totally slay the look like SHE does though.
All those lights in the night sky are different worlds? Wouldn't it be just magical if you could swim among the stars somehow?

I am in SERIOUS need of a dip, you guys!
 Don't you have a pool or something around here? I am gonna FLIP If I don't get my beauty swimming in.
Like, we're basically pirates—except instead of the seas, we're sailing the universe! Totes gives a whole new meaning to starboard, am I right?
I should really see Grandpa again... Say, how about a trip back to my world? I'll teach you how to swim this time, so don't worry!

I'm Amelia—just THE most breathtaking little mermaid the seas have ever seen!
Let's have some fun!
Woohoo! Now this liittle mermaid's ready to dish out some SERIOUS pain! Seriously!
221004:
I am a REFINED lady and expect to be treated like one!
If you can't at least do that much, don't expect much in return from me!

So many worlds to see, so little time... 
Let's get a move on, already!
Chop, chop!

I wonder if Mommy and Daddy are somewhere out there... 
I-it's not like I can't take care of myself—I'm not a baby!

Light's such a pest, I swear! Always with the nagging, making me study... *sigh*
I guess that's what family is like though, huh?

Can you believe this? I've already had THREE whole tea parties today!
 You'll spoil me rotten if I'm not careful!
 Ohoho!
I suppose you'll make an adequate escort. And you'd best not bore me—is that clear? A lady must be treated with proper respect.
You've been an excellent escort so far, I suppose I'll continue employing your services for now.
222001: Okay, so for our next mission, I propose that we prioritize the movement of—Wait. Oh no... I'm overthinking things again, aren't I? *sigh*
I can't believe I made such a careless mistake on my last signal flag exam... *sigh* Looks like a make-up exam is on my horizon.
Once I graduate, I'll officially be recognized as a full-fledged sailor in the Gaean Navy. Hopefully I'll learn a few things from you along the way!
I suppose the greatest treasure of any expedition... is the friends we make along the way!
There's so much the real world has taught me that I never could've learned at the academy...
Apologies for my tardiness. I'm Rain, a cadet at the Gaean Navy Academy. Let's crack down on some pirates!
From today onwards, you can refer to me as Sublieutenant Rain of the Gaean Navy! Hehe.
231001: I expect to meet many beings from different worlds. And each encounter will sway the course of my destiny... It is an exciting thought.

I used to be quite the prankster. 
I particularly enjoyed stealing up to the fire dragon when he was sleeping and giving him a little shock. ...Oh, to be young again.
A person's essence is to be discovered not in her body, but in her soul. What quality of soul do you possess?
What a lovely town. Its residents come from all different walks of life, but your souls resonate together beautifully. It forms a melody that can move even the skies.
I had given up, you know. It seemed there would never be an end to the war between humans, dragons, and fiends. But since meeting you, hope has been rekindled.
I am Rams Euphoria. My thunder can sway even the wheels of fortune.

People of Starview, I entrust my dream to you. Together, we shall rewrite the future.
The full might of thunder is now at your command.
231002: The books in the library? Already read 'em. Must've been about 10,000 books. Say, you know if I can get any more delivered here?
I don't think I've ever seen a creature like Light in all my years of research. Oh, what I wouldn't do to... Heh-heh...

No, no, don't step there! Oof, too late.
I had a little spill there earlier... Anyway, I don't think any of the chemicals were lethal, so you're fine. Probably.

Ah, perfect timing. I just finished concoct—er, brewing a new type of tea!  It'll quench you like nothing you've ever had before!
 I can't tell you what's in it. Hehe.

I always saw science as a solitary endeavor, but having a team... is actually even better!
 Talk about an unexpected discovery.

My name? Sorry, I might've scrubbed it from my brain to make room for SCIENCE!
 But it was probably Renoir or something.
I've become stronger? Fascinating... This calls for further examination—to the lab!
231003: There's a bounty of books in the library, and a wealth of worlds in the sky!Starview really is a scholar's dream.

Even a knight in shining armor needs breaks from his princess.
...Don't tell Dia I said that.

I've always been one for brains over brawn.
I won't object to a friendly spar, but take care not to scratch my paint job, will you?

Real shame I can't exchange a toast with you. Oh, wine! Oh, violet divine!
If I had lips, they would be yours and yours alone!
I daresay Starview's making me more human. Why, whoever heard of an android feeling hope? Much less one as cold and calculating as me. Haha.
The name's Rec Register, but feel free to call me Regis. I never let a client down, you can be sure of that. So, what've you got for me?

Didn't I tell you? I never let a chum down.
I guarantee it—technological singularity is more wonderful than you ever could've imagined!
231004:
Starview's full of noise and movement. It's nothing like the forest.
I feel... out of place.
Hey... Do you think I'm uptight? My friend always used to tell me that. I never mean to, but... sorry if I suck the joy out of things.

They've got some good fighters... If we all march on the capital, then—
Mm? Sorry, I was just talking to myself.
I'll never get used to the noise, but I think Starview's a place worth protecting. Living here has... changed me.
After everything's over, how'd you like to visit our forest? As friends, of course.
I'm Eleanor, an elf warrior. Are you fighting the Lord of Shadow?
I swear on my pride as the Starflame, I won't stop fighting. Not until the Dark Throne's no more than a bad memory.
231005: *cough* You young'uns expect a poor, frail old man like me to fight? *cough* Well?

Oh? What's that you've got there?
...Curious. Curious, indeed!
Even a sage doesn't know EVERYTHING. But that'll never stop one from trying! Hahaha!
The Whitetails were bestowed with great wisdom... Long-lost wisdom which will one day be mine!
While I'm not much closer to finding the knowledge I seek, you kids are always full of surprises. Hahaha!
Hahaha, I'm Jay, just your average old cat. I let my curiosity take me where it will in pursuit of knowledge.
No matter how old you get, you never stop learning. You're certainly never stopping me!
241001: Ta-da! Check out this loot! Drumroll please... An old bone! A-and um, embalming wraps! ...A cool bug husk? Today was just a fluke, okay?!

I love hanging in Starview!
It's nice being surrounded by adventurers—everyone's so free-spirited and fun!
Look, I'm a treasure hunter. Not a tomb raider, not a thief! I don't STEAL things, I go out and find them for myself...
The value of treasure's subjective... so enjoying the adventure's my main objective!Ooh, that sounded kinda catchy!

When I find cool treasures, I bring them to Gramma's grave and show her. It's a really pretty spot, especially as the sun sets!
I'll take you to visit sometime, Stella!

Hiya! I'm Mia, treasure hunter extraordinaire!
Just you wait—I'm gonna get my paws on the best treasure ever! Wanna help?

I've gone above! Beyond!
Now I'm Mia, treasure hunter SUPER-extraordinaire!
241002:
A beautiful sunny day...
Perfect for hunting visibility... or for a warm nap.
Stella's feathers are a such a pretty color. I wonder... What do you think she eats to turn them silver?

I love feeling the sun on my feathers as I glide, but it does make me a bit sleepy.
...You look like you're drifting off too.
Birdfolk are proud warriors, but most only think about how to fight... You taught me how to protect. It's important to think about who we're fighting for, eh?
I actually enjoy hunting a lot. It's a good way for warriors to hone their skills. That, and there's nothing quite as rewarding as smiles around the dinner table.
I'm Aurore. Birdfolk warriors fly as the winds guide us... and fight as the tempest howls!
Looking back, the birdfolk warriors of the canyon seem so small now... With you, I know I'll reach even greater heights!
241003: Getting back into the swing of fighting is proving more difficult than I anticipated... I must be rusty. Would you mind training with me?
I opened a second study hall in the library here. No matter where you look, there are always people itching to learn.

Oh, excellent timing!
 Would you care to join our lesson? Your brain is just as important as the rest of your muscles. Come give it a stretch!
It is more difficult to protect than destroy—you possess true strength. It is an honor to fight at your side.
You mustn't lose sight of those you cherish... Protect what matters to you—I know you can.
I am just a simple samurai, but ask—and you will have Soushiro Kengyu's sword.
Oh? I must not be as rusty as I thought. I am grateful for the opportunity to resume my study of the blade.
241004: Have you met the other elves? Quite a dreary lot, aren't they? Smiles would work wonders for their complexions.
Everyone says the outside world is a horrid, noisome place, but I think it's lovely. All the different breezes you get really lift my spirits.

Change is wonderfully exciting, isn't it? Like when friends blossom into lovers...
Am I thinking of anyone in particular? Hehe. Well, that's a secret.
It doesn't matter where you come from—the moment you step into Starview, everyone is equal. Sometimes, I wonder if you aren't wiser than the elves.
When I was younger, I'd often sneak out of the woods. It frustrated my friend so much, her face would turn red! Oh, she was adorable.

Ellen? Where have you gone?
Oh, hello there. Would you happen to have seen a lost elf around here?
There's not a thing in this world I wouldn't do for the people I love. Including, of course, putting an arrow through the hearts of dastardly villains.
221006: Don't worry! The manager and I are here to support all your adventuring needs.
Yeah, we've got some low-level quests available. Should be a walk in the park for you!

Return to the void.
...Or my mace will send you streaking back to it.
Sometimes, I feel powerless... like an empty bag, swept up by the wind.
Remember, the best adventurers aren't the ones who win the most battles. They're the ones who help the most people.

I'm Sharon of the Adventurer's Guild.
My, my. You've traveled a long way, haven't you?

Adventures change your perspective! 
Go out, discover new sights, and life will be that much more beautiful.
243001: Let's do our best together, Light! If there's any way I can help, just give me the word!
Losaria always helped me. Now it's my turn to save Losaria!

Elves are pretty skilled in archery, you know? 
I still have a long ways to go until I'm as good as Losaria though.
Who knows what awaits me... Sometimes I just feel lost. But as long as I have my friends, I'll be okay!
Thinking too much isn't gonna do me any good, and neither is feeling sad. I have to find something I can do in this world!
Losaria's the one who taught me how to use a bow. I was so happy the first time I hit my target!

Hi there!
I'm Arisa. I'm looking for my friend... but where am I, exactly?
Thanks for helping a girl out... Now it's my turn to help you! Count on it!
251001:
La, la, la... Okay!
Sound units are go!
I think you'll like this next ditty!
I've never seen the universe on a scale like this before... I wonder just how far my music will reach?
I feel like my voice can reach the stars from here... Let's all sing together again sometime!

Hey, Stella! You want to do a duet!
I just know you'll sound totally adorab—Wait, where are you going?
When Diva Media's on the air, all your electrons stop and stare!

Do you believe in the power of music? I do, now more than ever before!
My melodies will reach the stars!
251002: "A true knight has arms of steel, and a heart of gold!" That means you've got to train endlessly! Say, will you join me in my quest for perfection?
"A true knight is a bulwark to the people!" ...What do you mean Starview doesn't need my protection? Well, I shall protect it anyways!

*sigh* This hero business is hard work...
D'AAAH! How long have you been standing there? What did you hear? Nothing? Good. GOOD DAY!
Er, Alk. Might I ask that you keep my origin story under wraps? ...THE WHOLE TOWN ALREADY KNOWS?  W-well... Secrets are meant to be spilled!
Would you like to learn how to ride a horse with me? Well, no knight ever went galloping into battle on his own two feet, did he?

Even a sham like me can find their path.
...You're the one who taught me that, Alk. It's true, and you have my gratitude, friend of friends!
I am Gerard, of the house of Martel. For as long as you tread the golden path of chivalry, my lance is with you!

I shall waver no longer!
Fake it till you make it—that's what my mum always used to say!My name is Gerard, and I ride upon the path of chivalry!
251003:
Come on, gang!
Let's conquer the Kaleidoscope together!
Some adventurers may put on a tough act, but in reality... they just aren't cut out for it. But you... you're different.
Now you see what I can do, right? Let's head for the depths!
If it's part of conquering the Kaleidoscope, I'm ready to take out any monster that gets in our way!

I'll be the one to conquer the Kaleidoscope!
And we'll be the ones to do it together, and you can believe that!
I'm Ellya, but people around here call me the Starlight Sharpshooter. Let's show that Kaleidoscope who's boss—I'm locked and loaded, baby!

I knew I was right to join you guys!
 I just know that together, nothing can stop us, not even the Kaleidoscope!
251004: Don't misunderstand our situation. I'm merely here to keep an eye on things.
I've been thinking... Who is responsible for upholding law and order here in Starview?
It is our solemn duty as Guild Knights to uphold and protect the law in Palpebra.

Above all else, protect the people.
This maxim has been engraved in my heart for as long as I can remember.
I've brought something for you—I'm sure you'll all be able to make good use of it.
Finn of the Guild Knights, reporting for duty. If you ever find yourself in a spot of trouble, allow me to help.
I'll do what I must to continue protecting the citizens of Palpebra.
251005: I'm just making the usual rounds, don't mind me.
Impressive how this town comprised of complete stranger remains, by and large, at peace.
The privilege I have of supporting him is not one I take lightly. Wh-what? Is there something on my face?
Don't be afraid to call on me for help.
Keira of the Guild Knights, reporting for duty. If you see any troublemakers about, allow me to handle them.

Excellent! Now surely the commander will notice me! Er... Ahem.
Please, accept my gratitude for everything you've done.
261001: Mmph... I want candy!If you don't give me some, I'm gonna get maaad!

Hey, do you think Arum's scary?
That's what everybody back home used to tell me. But they'd say it like it was a good thing. Weird, right?

Who should I play with next?
I can erase anyone 'cause I'm invincible. Everybody says so!
Guess what? I've got tons of new friends now!I'm not allowed to make them cry, but... it's funner this way!
Lightsy says I should treat people the way I want to be treated. It's funny. He looks like a baby animal, but sometimes he sounds like a little old grandpa.

Are you my new keepers?
Okay! Who do I gotta erase?

Ta-dah! Arum's leveled up!
Think Sisty'll be proud?
261003: Don't give me "I dunno," or you'll be eating ice-cold soldiers' rations for breakfast.
I'd like to review my task list, Milord. Just give me your orders, and I'll see them executed.
Hm? My gun? ...I found it in the Kaleidoscope. It's served me well—if only I'd had it back when I was a soldier.
I know I'm not as cute as the other maids, but if there's one thing I learned in the military, it's respect.

Being a maid is nice now I'm starting to get the hang of it. What are your orders
—I mean... may I take your order, Milord?

Battle maid Marianne, reporting for duty. 
What are your orders, Milord?

I promise to support you—not as a soldier, but as a maid.
...May I take your order, Milord?
261004: Wonder if there's other kids like me around.
I like Starview. Very welcoming to the walking dead.

AM I a medium, though?
Makes sense that a zombie'd be able to talk to a ghost, right?

The worst thing about being undead? 
Hm... I guess there's a fair amount of existential crisis going on, yeah.

You want to take a look in a coffin?
No, I don't have a problem with it... But the people sleeping inside might.

I'm Andy. I kind of enjoy life as a zombie...
Mm... Okay, maybe "life" wasn't the right word.
I'm happy we became friends. Even death won't part us now. ...Oh, was that too heavy? Heh.
261005: Want one? I bought some chocolates in Palpebra. Dismal town, but they've decent sweet shops. ...What? My large brain requires sugar to function.
Starview's a great place... No superstitious Association brickheads blowing whistles in your face every time you dabble in the dark arts.
Darkness is the root of all mystery. But mysteries... exist to be solved. Don't fear the shadows—embrace them.

I had a dream about my sister...
An illness took her a long time ago... I thought I'd forgotten her face, but there she was, clear as day...
The Kaleidoscope's connected to the Abyss? Though I AM intrigued by the various worlds now open to me, my TRUE passion lies in darkness...

The name's Liam Ilde. I specialize in black sorcery.
You are going to guide me around town. Well, come on. I haven't got all day.
No matter how much you unearth, there will always be knowledge lurking in the dark. That means I will never be out of a job. Yes, I'd say I'm winning at life.
311001:
There's gotta be SOMETHING new to discover out there. 
The world's always changing, so I'VE gotta keep innovating!

Hmm, I think I've got it. I'll just dump a splash of this in and... 
Ahaha, nope!
 I can cross that off the list!

Man, there's so much here to do and see. 
Hey—what's that thingy? 
Oooh, Starview is a blast!

You adventurers are so awesome! 
I love seeing all the cool new stuff you dig up.
...Thanks for letting me tag along!

As soon as I discover something, my mind's already racing towards my next big breakthrough. 
I'll never run outta stuff to research! Ever!

I'm full of infinite possibilities
—just like alchemy!

Oooh, look!
This is gonna open up a ton of new possibilities! 
Just you wait and see!
311002:
Humph, Pippo is such a meanie!
He's always nagging me to do boring stuff like clean my room and study. Do you have any tips from dealing with Light?
Hey, Alk, do you have any chores I can help with? I need to practice my magic, so let me know if you've got dirty dishes, laundry, Kaleidoscope runs... Anything's fine!

Hey, um, we're allowed to keep pets in Starview, right?...Thank goodness!
Now that I think of it, if Light's fine, so's Pippo, huh?
Someday, I'm gonna get married and use magic to make super yummy food and live happily ever after!
Hey! You guys made a HUGE mess!I can splash water over stuff, but my magic doesn't reach all the little nooks and crannies yet. Be more careful!

I'm Marnie, and this is my familiar Pippo!
I'm training to be a witch, just like my mom!

Look, look! The spell worked!
When I grow up, I'm gonna be invincible and pretty and the bestest witch ever!
Just you wait!
311003: One wrong choice can lead to a lifetime of regret. I learned that the hard way.

You wondering about this scar?
It's a dumb story. Ask the dancers if you really have to know.
What if I'd chosen Sonia? What if I'd become a dancer? I know there's no going back, but... I can't help but wonder.
I used to hate this scar, but not anymore. If I didn't have it, I wouldn't be able to fight, and I wouldn't be able to protect the people I love.
I've got your backs because I know you have mine.
I'm Elise Ruster, your armed escort. I keep my clients safe—no more, no less.
Listen. I swear on my gun and on my scar, I will not let anything hurt you!
311004:
My father was taken away by the royal guard. My mother's been waiting for him ever since...
...If only I was stronger…

This place is paradise compared to back home.
Living's a right here, and not a privilege.

You got any jobs for me? I'll do anything for money.
...I just can't sit still.
I used to enjoy going to the ruins. Treated it like a treasure hunt....Don't call me cute.
I've always been alone. I don't mind it, but... You won't leave me alone either way, will you?

My name's Haaj. I'm a hunter.
Give me a job, and I'll make sure you get your money's worth.

I'm already used to your quests.
I can handle whatever you throw at me.
311005: If there ever were a medicine that could cure all ailments... I'd probably be out of two jobs!
I've never botched a surgery before. Surely the heavens are watching over me.
The heavens may seem cruel and unforgiving at times, but everything happens for a reason—trust me.
Say, is there anyone you fancy? I can brew you a bit of my patented love potion if you'd like... One condition—you tell me who it is first.

O lost lamb, what brings you before me?
...Funeral? Health check? Either way, I've got you covered.
Another step closer to perfection... So many lambs to guide, so little time.
311006: A word of advice—be careful of who you put your trust in. Sometimes it's best to rely on your own instincts.
So you're fond of the ocean? How nice. I, for one, find it terrifying.
Things may get a little hairy out there, but I hope I can be of assistance to you.
I've traveled for this long with you, so I'll see it through the end.
I've only known life in the Gaean Navy, so I...  don't have anything interesting to say. Sorry. I'll keep practicing.
Lieutenant Trine Weston of the Gaean Navy, reporting for duty.
As long as combat is my profession, my life will continue on the battlefield, and the battlefield alone.
321009: I'm Faf!And I'm not a lizard, I'm a dragon!

Workin's for suckers!
The guild's always fed me for free!

Yeah, I know I'm cute, but I'm as fierce as any other monster out there!
And THAT'S how you get the best of both worlds!
I'm not just a mascot, you know? I'm a full-fledged dragon! You'd better think twice before petting me!...But go ahead and pet me.
I'm happier than ever before! And ya know why? It's cause I have real friends now!

I'm Faf, the dragon!
Nice to meetcha!
Think I'm powerful now? You ain't seen nothing yet!
311008: Haha! Multiple worlds... Who would've thought? Heh... The guild would totally freak if they knew about this! This place is way better than campin' out in a cave!
When I heard Starview was home to warriors from all sorts of worlds... I'm gonna be honest, I wasn't expecting so many kids.

Headin' out for battle? Count me in!
Dragons, behemoths, I'm ready for anything you throw at me!
I may look like a loose cannon, but I ain't in a hurry to get myself blown up just yet. Not while those kids are waitin' for me.

Have you seen the threads some of the girls here are sporting? Very, uh... flattering to the form.
...What? Did I say somethin' weird?

Ahaha! 
The name's Gilasrad. I'm ALL about the thrill of battle, baby! Just show me where the action's at and I'm there!

Hahaha!
I'm just gonna keep doin' my thing. I'm rarin' to go, so just watch my back, 'kay?
311009: Fire can warm, yet it is capable of great destruction. Play with it carelessly, and you will get burned.
Sprites are only visible to a select few. But even if you cannot perceive them, their workings are present in everyday life.
City clothes? I suppose I am interested in finding an outfit for myself... someday.
I actually bought some city clothes... Hehe.
When a fire fades, you must ask—when a fire wavers, understand the flames. Ashes can only tell you so much.
I'm Enni, a fire shaman. May my flames be a guiding light on your path.
This too, must have been due to the guidance of the sprites—No... I must thank you instead.
321001:
*sigh* Nuh-uh, sounds like a pain.
I'm not moving unless I have to.

You'll be fiiine.
If things get REAL bad, I'll jump in, so lemme sleep a few more minutes.
Even poisons can have some medicinal purposes... and even a lazy bastard like me can do good, huh?
Well, aren't you a goody two-shoes? You're the only one who's ever bothered trying to make friends with a guy like me.

Hey, you kids hungry?
Landed a big-old beastie while hunting. Want some? It's fine, I used normal arrows—no poison.
I'm Keylos. I guess I could kill some time helping you kids. Just don't drag me into any messes...
Poison... It can be powerful—or an accident waiting to happen. Think you can use it right?
321002: Theory is every bit as important as field training. We should study together sometime! I've got a ton of books on adventuring I can lend you!
Wow! I heard about Starview from other adventurers, but... seeing worlds in the sky with my own eyes... it's like I'm standing in a fairy tale!
I don't have a ton of practical experience, but I can show you around the Kaleidoscope if you ever need a guide. Let me know if you need me, okay?

Dear... Levy Gracia... I love you.
No! I can't mail her this!
*sigh* Writing a fan letter is harder than I thought...
I figured it'd be handy if I wrote down all the stuff I've experienced in the Kaleidoscope. Practical knowledge is just important as theory, after all!
Hi, I'm Trista Howell. I know more about the Kaleidoscope than most adventurers. Let me know if you ever need a guide!

Lately, I've been trying to rely on my own experiences... but that'll never stop me being Lady Levy's number one fan!
I'll be as cool as her—eventually!
321003:
Nice place you got here... I've never even seen most of these flowers and butterflies.
Hey, look! A squirrel! Here, buddy... Tsk tsk tsk.

I'm only in my twenties.
How old did you think I was?
Actually, never mind. I don't want to know.

I'll cover defense.
...To me, the thought of hurting someone is scarier than the thought of getting hurt.

I, uh... braided my beard because the other adventurers said it'd look cute.
...Why're you all patting me on the back?
I feel like the other villagers are getting used to me. They're coming up to me, talking to me... It's great!
I-I'm Walter. I'd, uh... like to be friends. Sorry. I'm not very good with words...
You know, I started thinking... it's not so bad being big and scary. 'Cause it means I can keep all of you safe.
321004:
Uh-oh... Your face doesn't look too good. 
*sigh* Luckily, I've got the perfect shot for you. And something tells me you're gonna like this one.
Close your eyes... Good. Now take a deep breath... There. Don't you feel better already?
Pirates? I'm quite fond of them, actually. Their brawny bodies make them the PERFECT specimens for me.

Oh, did you get ANOTHER boo-boo? Lovely, just lovely!
 Getting hurt builds character, you know?
I had a bit of a wild streak myself back in the day... But let's keep that a secret between you and me.
Just tell me where it hurts, and let the nurse make it ALL better. Hehe.
I can feel it... power flowing throughout my entire body—how exhilarating! Hehe.
321005:
Why? Why don't you fear me?
The blood on my paws might stain your good names.

The history of beastfolk is written in blood.
With what would you pen a peaceful chapter? I'm curious how you'll give concrete form to empty ideals.

I will execute any order.
Bar none...

I thought I would always be a weapon—no matter where I went, or whose orders I took.
...But I may have been wrong.
You see me, not my claws.

I fought on command, not on principle.
Having something to fight for... feels nice, if I'm honest.

I'm to take orders from you now?
Very well—I'm curious how you'll employ my talents.

I am a weapon, tooth and claw.
But... a weapon is only as strong as who wields it. Tell me—how will you maneuver your pawns?
321006: Alk, that was more soy sauce than I'd use in a month! Goodness, you humans over-season everything.
There are so many peculiar smells here... It makes my nose twitchy.
Stella is so polite and quiet... *sigh* If only the princess would take a leaf out of her book.
Alk, have a gander at this scroll. It's got ancient knowledge from the foxes of yore—my old family tofu recipe! Ahaha, I'll walk you through how to make it.

The kits have certainly taken a liking to you!
 Do be careful though. They're cute, but they ARE yokai, after all.
I'm Akisame Shirano, faithful attendant of She of Nine Tails. It's a pleasure to meet you.
I originally came here on Milady's orders, but you've caught my interest, dearies. I can't wait to see where your adventures take you!
321007: Don't sweat it! Stuff'll work itself out somehow! ...Words of wisdom from a great and super hot ex-monk. Well? You feel any better, hunny?

Is it okay for a monk to drink this much? Bahahaha! Of course not!
Why do you think they kicked my ass outta there?
The keg I lug around's got Lethean water in it, and no, you can't have a sip. You should be out making good memories, not clearing away the bad.

Just a glass? ...No dice?
How about just a sip? ...Still no?
Just a drop? ...Oh all right. You win, Stella.

The path to enlightenment...
Seeing all the little worlds in the sky makes me feel like I've made progress. Me!
 An ex-monk. Guess a girl can dream...

Wooowie!
 Did I wander into the afterlife again, or am I just reeeally drunk? Either way, that's one heck of a view!

Whew, all that time off the rails, and look at me now!
Life on track, friends aplenty... I'll drink to that!
321008: On my never-ending quest for justice to end piracy, I ended up falling overboard... Crazy that I ended up here of all places! Isn't the ocean just amazeballs?
Honestly, sometimes I can't understand a thing Stella's on about. But she doesn't seem to mind. Hehe... isn't she just the purest little cinnamon roll?

"Aye-aye, captain!"
I always used to forget to say this while on duty... and those meanies in the navy would bonk me on the head every time!

Let me get this straight. You're telling me that some pirates are GOOD guys?!
I... I think I need to sit down.
Is there somewhere I can practice swimming around here? I need to be ready just in case I fall overboard again, you know?
I'm Lassie, the sea's number one warrior of nautical justice! I'm in search of the Crimson Blades, a ruthless crew of vicious pirates. Have you heard of them?
Would you look at that? I'm stronger than ever before! Heh-heh... Now those Crimson Blades are REALLY in for it!
331001: I wish I could see everyone's faces if they saw how I've been living. My teacher would FLIP to find out I'm in a totally different world now!
Today's quests—find a lost rabbit and take a shift at the local pub. Boring? Maybe, but you can find adventure in the most unlikely of places!

Helping others is the first step toward becoming a true adventurer!
Hehe... Just something my teacher used to tell me back home.

You can count on me for any job, big or small!
I'm always ready to help a friend!

No matter where this journey takes me, I'll never stop taking those so-called "boring" quests!
Those sheep aren't gonna herd themselves!
I'm Yuna! Just another adventurer here in Palpebra. I've still got a lot to learn, but my passion for adventure is second to none!
I'm stronger than ever before, and I owe it all to you guys. Now it's my turn to pay it forward!
331002:
I loooooove you, Light!  Can we have babies?
Aww, why not?
Wow, so this is what it looks like outside the forest! So many new hives to explore!

Look at the sky!
So many shiny hives!

This is a pretty comfy hive!
 Everybody's so sweet!
 Sweet like honey!
 Want a taste?

Light's so fluffy and warm!
I wanna just snuggle up with him forever!

You look fun!
Can I join your hive?

Bonnie's strong now!
Now I can fight for you, Light!
Hehe... Does this please you?
331003: Who knew there were so many worlds I haven't set foot in... It looks like my adventure's only gettin' started!
I keep hearing the kids talkin' about a fire somewhere. That's fire, this is fire... Where's the damn fire everyone's so excited about?
Huh... This here's just a town full of daredevils in a big hurry to get themselves in danger. In other words... I'm finally home!
You young'uns are growin' up so damn fast... But don't count this old dog out just yet—I'm still ready to learn a new trick or two!
Y'all have made this old man proud... For once in my life, I finally feel like I can pass the torch, ya know?

There ain't no accidents in this world. Nope... This was FATE, my friend!
These fists always find their way to adventure!
Oho! My fists... are feeling stronger every day!
331004:
Perfect timing, I had something I wanna ask you!
C'mon, I'm not trying to talk you into anything!
 I would NEVER!

Man, did you guys get stronger since last time I saw you? You're looking great, dude!
 ...I do too? No way, man, all I do is read!

Y'know, Alk, food really brings people together.
I'm serious, dude! You make MAGIC happen in that kitchen!
I always dreamed of the day there'd be no more war... and now, I wanna get strong enough to keep everyone safe and happy!...I WILL get strong enough!

I always avoided fights, but now I want to be able to protect others.
Just... I'd rather not fight unless I HAVE to, y'know?

Claudius from the panther clan, at your service!
 You can call me Claw, though!
 It's great to meet you, dude!

Man, I'd rather settle stuff with words... but it's cool having everyone count on me!
I've still got a ways to go before I'm as tough as Nimbus though!
331005:
You could stand to put a tad more care into your dress.
Yes, I think a cheeky little ascot would suit you nicely!
Starview might just be the place I've always dreamed of... Folks of all strokes, working together towards a common goal.
What a splendid library—you'd never run out of things to read! Did you collect this all yourself, Stella? Thank you, even scholars don't have access to this many books.
I wonder, if a canid chose a feline as their mate, what would the children look like? ...W-wait! Hypothetically speaking, of course!

Every now and then, Light looks really, REALLY tasty...
Must be my hunger playing tricks on me... Sorry.

Albert Fang, knight.
People have high expectations for us timber wolves, and I'll do my best not to disappoint!

I swear on my honor as a timber wolf, I shall grow strong enough to defend you!
 With class, not brute force, of course.
331006:
How fast can I zap? Hah!
Lighting fast—the speed of light itself!...That didn't answer the question? L-look! I ain't dealin' with math!
I've got the perfect bod for a zapper, huh? Red and white really stand out on stage, and look rad as hell!

Whoaaa! Look at all the people!
Dude, I've GOTTA have a zap fest here some time!

Sorry! You know me, zapping's my life!
I can't help droppin' a little zap here and there, y'know? Especially when I'm having a blast with my homies!

Oooh, Light, you look soft as hell today!
 C'mere, I'm gonna—
Hey, get back here!Urgh, damn you static electricity!
Get ready to get loud—stormcloud zapper Kazuchi is in the house! Let's zap!

Thanks for the encore! You ready to rock?! Drop the bass!
Cue the lightning! Haha, get ready for some CRAZY zaps!
331007:
You know what's really odd? I keep running into people who totally have it out for me—thing is, I never did anything to them!
...Nothing I can recall, anyway.
So... You've finally taken an interest in studying the blade, huh? I don't mind teaching—but you owe me a drink, okay?

Everything's more fun when you have a drink, let it wash all your problems away!
 *hic*

A knife can slice. It can dice. It can even excise!
 But REAL knife mastery is more than just parlor tricks, you know?
Woohoo! Time for a drink—who's joining me? The more the merrier! Right, friends?
My name's Tatiana, and I'm here to throw booze and drink knives... Wait, did I get that right? *hic*
A life without a little risk is a life wasted, am I right? This calls for a celebration—mind getting the first round?
361007:
S-stop that! Everyone's watching!
Sorry, that wasn't directed toward you!
 My shadows are misbehaving again...
You can count on me for anything, so don't hold back, okay? As long as it's something I can do, I mean...
It's been a long time since I've come to Palpebra. I guess you could call me a veteran of sorts, even if it only means I've been here for a while.
*sigh* I've been doing this for so long, and I'm STILL screwing up the basics. But I'm going to keep at it anyway!

Some people still know me as the "half-baked witch".
*sigh* One of these days, I'll prove them wrong... I'll prove them all wrong!

I'm Rebecca! Y-you can count on me and my shadows to back you up! 
W-wait, are you going on THAT quest? Eep…
Sorry, I'm still getting the hang of things, but... You can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs, right?
311010: While I did say I'm prohibited from assisting you... that was just for your review. Don't hesitate to ask me if you need any help.
I don't investigate examinees' private lives. That's not to say anything goes, but I aim for performance reviews to be as unobtrusive as possible.
You'd like to know what I'm noting down? Everything, of course. My work reflects yours, so I'd rather trust notes than my memory.
It's always a pleasure to work with you. Your work ethic is inspiring.
Rules exist for a reason. My book aims to explain why following them is in everyone's best interest.

My name is Jake, and I will be conducting your performance review for the Guild. 
It's a pleasure to meet you.
While reviewing your performance, I saw shining examples of things I could improve in MY performance. I'm truly glad I met you.
331010: I'm REALLY good at magic. Grown-ups can't even begin to compare.
When the going gets tough, the tough get going!Just you wait... I'm gonna become the next big riches-to-rags-to-riches story!

Whoa! Alk, get a load of this!They're having a sale! Thirty-percent-off?!
I don't need any of this, but that's not gonna stop me from getting a deal!

I'm the heir to the Creole family.
My plan is to A, become a world-famous mage and make being a Creole cool again, and B... Get super-duper rich!
The other adventurers told me to stop being a money-grubbing little freak and practice my magic... Hm... What if I invented a spell that made you rich? Two birds with one stone, baby!

I'm Colt Creole, who you'll eventually know as the most awesome mage in the world.
Plus, our adventures will make me rich!

Behold!
Future mage extraordinaire!
I'm gonna summon up so much money, you can't even imagine!
331011:
The mechanisms lovingly crafted in every firearm are technological marvels!
Tiny gizmos packing explosive power! Isn't technology amazing?

Do my eyes deceive me?!
 That ore... it's perfect for gunpowder!
 Don't sell it—give it to me instead!
 I'll put it to good use... Heh-heh.
I blew up the principal's statue... I wonder if there's another place I can try out my prototypes... *sigh*

My greatest ambition? To make a firearm that'll take the world by storm! But I'll require assistance!
You'll up to the task, right?
So you've taken a liking to my firearm, eh? I suppose I could make one for a cultured adventurer such as yourself.

Sha Suzu's the name!
And there's nothing I love more than firearms and firearms accessories!
One of these days, my technological innovations will change the world as you know it!
341001:
You buy your pots? Sharpen your swords?
Come on, you know what they say: by failing to prepare, you're preparing to fail.
This place never fails to surprise me... And I've seen my share of miracles down in the Kaleidoscope.
You got questions about the Kaleidoscope, come to me. I know everything about it—except what I don't.

My party's aiming for a new zone in the Kaleidoscope.
Come next week, I'll have some wild stories for you.
I gave up on chasing rainbows long ago... But being around you makes a guy feel like he can reach the stars.
The name's Evan. If you're looking for someone to take you around the Kaleidoscope, I'm your guy.
Never thought I'd team up with a bunch of world hoppers. Been a wild ride, but hey—what better way to expand your horizons?
341002: This place is so different from forest!Wait, was Shroombo always here?

Bury your feet in soil! It feels super nice!
You should try it too, Light!
Wow... From here, the whole forest is just a speck in the sky. My head hurts...

The soil here is so nice... and so are the people!
Some weird ones here too... Let's find even more friends!

Regitare said I'm a forest sprite. That means I can be an important helper to everybody!
 Hehe...

I'm Challua Challuwah, child of the forest!
I can protect everyone!...Can I?

I can hear it all... The wind, the earth, everyone's voices!
I can teach you how to hear them too, Stella!
341003:
I've got chippies on me left shoulder!
On me right shoulder? Why, more chippies!
People often lose their way when granted such great powers... But I think you guys are doing a right lovely thing 'ere!
You've probably no interested in daisies, but gis a gander at me garden anyway! Grew it all meself!
I sure do love it here... I just wish you'd keep it down sometimes, mithering me with all the chelpin' and hollerin'!

You can pet me chippies, if you feel so inclined!
Just mind how you touch 'em, since they do like bitin'.
Undead Lord, Regitare Macdeth at your service! These bones may be old, but I can still keep up with you young uns!
Ah, I feel one hundred years younger already!
341004: Whoa... Nice place, Alk. Show a girl around, won't you? Wink, wink.
Pro tip: You'll never light a fire in a lady's heart unless you take a chance every now and then.

The key to winning?
Hmm... Perseverance, I guess? Even when it's down to the wire, you never know what the cards have in store for you!
Who knows what the future holds? I'm getting shivers just thinking about how the chips are gonna fall!

Oh, perfect timing!
 I was just in the mood for a gamble. Hehe... Don't you worry your pretty little head, I'll be sure to take it easy on you!

I'm Naska Etrange, and you just hit the jackpot, baby!
You oughta thank your lucky stars!

Something big is in the cards for me, I just know it!
Looks like it's time to up the ante!
341005:
Um, hi, meow are mew... how are you doing?
Trying to talk tough is harder than Mew-Mew thought...

Mew-Mew? A good fighter?!
But Mew-Mew's just a city kitty!
N-not a REAL wildcat!
Mew-Mew's still got a long way to go...

Nimbus's claws are sooo cool!
Mew-Mew's go dull super fast... Guess real wildcats are better at keeping them sharp.
Um, would mew mind bringing Mew-Mew next time mew go adventuring? ...Purrty please? Mew-Mew wants to be a rough tough wildcat!
Mew-Mew used to be purrty sensitive about these looks—until mew showed Mew-Mew all the people in Starview! Mew-Mew's unique mew!

Myack, uh... um... N-nice to meet mew!
...Why are mew looking at Mew-Mew like that?
Ooh, Mew-Mew looks stronger? Mew might be right... Mew-Mew FEELS more meowerful!
341006:
A demon? Me?
Sorry to disappoint pal, but fiends and demons are two different things. OUR leader's got a bigger stick up his butt.
Sure, it'd be great if we could all be friends, but ya can't have a hero with no villains!

Your town's put a fantabulous curse on me!
 It's made me never want to leave!
Aw, you guys are a barrel of fun! Cruising around the world doing what ya want, with who ya want... I think you're even sheltering criminals! Absolutely stupendous!
Gee, if the kids back at Pandemonium saw us, what d'ya think they'd say? Would there be blood? Gore? Hehe! I'm just itching to introduce you!
My name's Folus! I'm a clown and a regular ol' bon viveur! Do ya think fate brought us together? Stay tuned to find out!
No secrets are safe from you—not even mine. Heeheehee! So what case are ya gonna crack today, detective?
341007: Whew, finally finished tilling the herb garden!  I'm trying to see if herbs from other worlds will grow in my plot—keep your fingers crossed.
Hello again. How've you been feeling? If you have any concerns about your health, come ask me, okay?
There you go. I know it doesn't taste great, but that'll have you feeling better in no time!
I know it looks like I'm making a lot, but I want to have enough healing potions for all of you in reserve.
I've been thinking of going on a little adventure myself. I'd like to find new ways to keep improving my medicines!
Hello, my name is Hartlief. I'm a pharmacist, so let me know if you need any medicine, okay?
I always focused on the patients in front of me, but now I might be able to help countless people I've never even met! I have to keep going—innovating!
341008:
Haha! Now that sounds like a moneymaker!
 I'll bite, lemme in on that quest of yours.
Take big risks, reap big rewards. That's the thrill of adventuring! Right, kid?
Spearmen can fight up close'n personal if they need to. What, you need a quick demonstration?
Never thought I'd EVER look forward to groupwork. Adventuring in a party's more fun than I thought.

Huh? You wanna try my spear?
It's pretty heavy, but knock yourself out.
...Whoa, careful now!
Name's Conner. I'm just an adventurer, making ends meet with this old spear of mine. What's your name?

You can rely on me—and my spear!
You got a quest, name it and I'll be there!
341009: You got to lure them in, bit by bit. So slowly... that the anticipation smothers out the wariness.

You think I'm spending too much time making traps?
How am I supposed to protect my cattle then? My ranch runs on traps!
Welcome! I got quite a few jobs lined up for you today. 'Course, I'll be paying compensation if you get hurt, so set your mind at rest, hear?
I almost feel fond of the poor creatures that get caught in my traps. Feels like they answered my call, you know?
The name's Jester. You could call me a trapper. Now, I'm looking for some hands to help out at the ranch. And, of course, the contract includes danger money.
I've got plenty of traps I'm itching to build. Now let's see who runs out of ideas first—me, or those giant stinking beasts.
351001: Starview Village feels like one big family. I'll do my best to take care of everyone!

Hello! It's a lovely day, isn't it?
...Thank you, Stars, for another beautiful day.
Nuh-uh-uh! No snacks until you've washed your hands! Goodness, where do they get all that energy? ...That's what makes them cute, though.

The children love hearing stories about Light!
 ...I may have popped myself into a few, just for some dramatic flair. Ahaha!
If you ever have time, we'd love to have you over again! The kids at the orphanage all love you!  I know the place is a bit run down, but it's home.
Hello, my name's Corinna. I'm a—I'm training to be a cleric! I'll do my best!

This is a lot of power. I hope I can use it well...
I have to—for the children!
I'll do everything I can to keep them safe and happy!
351002: So you wish to LOOK beautiful as well? Nothing a little rouge and razzle-dazzle can't fix, dear. Everyone deserves to feel GORGEOUS!
It's our duty as beautiful people to protect ALL things GORGEOUS!

Simply GORGEOUS!
So many beautiful people, yet it seems some haven't noticed their own beauty!
That simply cannot be!

Nobody's without their own flaws, but everybody is capable of feeling GORGEOUS!
And that, my friends, is truly beautiful!
The world is ugly, yet beautiful. Power, influence, wealth... Some are born with its beauty, and some are cursed by it.

This Marguerite shall join you in the name of all things BEAUTIFUL!
Now then, allow me to show you just how GORGEOUS you can be!

I've never felt this GORGEOUS in my entire life!
And it's all thanks to you, beautiful!
351003: I never imagined there were so many worlds in the sky… Did you know, Lady Phiria used to take me stargazing? It was then that I first realized how beautiful the night was.

Starview is a lively place.
But I worry that there are no laws. Disorder could erupt at any moment.
It is a knight's duty to maintain peace. If you see signs of trouble, come to me.

The folk of this village are hardy. They are willing to explore uncharted territory, to beat out new paths.
...I wonder if I'll ever find my own way.

I receive many gifts when I'm out on patrol, but I do not know whether it's right to accept them...
No, your cakes are delicious, but—

I am Cecilia Cerdic. 
I have orders to seek the Oracle of the Wind. 
Tell me, what is this place?

I have not yet found my conviction...
But if this wavering blade can be of any use to you, it is yours to command.
351004: Baloosh is suuuper cool! Lemme tell you what happened the other day—you won't believe it!
If you need anything delivered, you know where to find me!
Baloosh and I are best buddies!
I love Baloosh, but of course I love you guys too!
Someday, I'm gonna go on an adventure to find other birds like Baloosh!
My name's Aureo, and this big birdie's my buddy Baloosh. The two of us run deliveries all through Palpebra!
We're getting better, aren't we? We've still a long way to go though, so let's keep giving it our best!
351005: When my customers are happy and I profit, everybody wins!
Slow down and take a load off, friend. How about a drink?
At Raul's Bar, you can pay your tab at any time. It's good to treat yourself every once in a while, you know?
Perhaps one day there will be a Raul's Bar in every world! A man can dream, right?
I hope I can continue to be of service to you all.

Welcome to Raul's Bar. I am Raul.
I hope everything is to your liking.
There is no pleasure greater than meeting a new customer, my friend. Things are looking bright for Raul's Bar.
351006:
Oh, I just had a great idea for a story!
I'm gonna look knightlier than ever!

You're so shy, Kiara!
But I'll always be here if you need an ear—that's what big brothers are for.
Every ounce of my heroic might is to defend the defenseless from plight... That's what makes me a knight!
Kiara comes first, of course, but as a knight, it's my duty to protect my friends—like Samantha and Colt!
Geralt Dawnshield always said knights have to be suuuper strong so they can protect everyone!

Kiara! It's great to see you again, my sweet sister!
 ...Who am I? Why, I'm Miles, the knight playing the part of your big brother!

A smile to come home to makes my shield stronger! 
After all, "The will to defend is the power of Knighthood!"
351007: Hear ye, hear ye! Luluca's got a new scoop in the making! C'mon gang, there's a new cafe in town to research!

Do you have any news?
 Don't worry, I keep my sources tip-top secret!
 No one'll know you tipped me off.
Excuse me, would you mind answering a few questions for the Oculus?
Articles on trendy date spots always sell well. If you find any cute cafes, make sure to fill me in!
If you want to know what's new and happening in Palpebra, look no further than the latest issue of the Oculus!
I'm Luluca! I write for a magazine called the Oculus. Be sure to check out this month's issue!
I've found what I want to write about—stuff that'll make people's everyday lives more fun!
361001: The items they leave behind is proof they lived. What will you leave behind?
So many people here. I wonder if I could make a friend?
Sometimes the dead leave behind more than just their possessions. Just look behind you.
Even if you all died... I want for you to stay with me. Forever and ever. Promise?
If I ever find my parents, I want to tell them. About you, Starview, and the adventures we've been on. I'm sure they'd love it.
I'm Falsche. I collect items from fallen adventurers. Nice to meet you.
I never thought I'd feel proud of this power. Thank you.
361002: ...Sorry. I was thinking... about my family. Least I can do is keep their memory alive.

I was training.
...No one's gonna have to protect me again.
People call me dark and brooding, but sometimes... I'm just too lazy to talk.
I used to be part of a traveling troupe. It was a "you scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours" kind of deal. But looking back, I realize I owe them a lot.

People of the Desert Moon value family above all else.
The whole world can turn its back on you. But I... will never betray you.

My name's Jalil.
I have some skill with the chakram. Stay away if you value your life.

You can throw a chakram now?
Good. Next, I'll teach you the Art of the Desert Moon.
361003:
They can brand me a traitor. I'm not letting anyone use Arum as a weapon again.
That's why I came to you for help.

Let me clarify one thing. I'm not here to make friends.
I'm a fiend, okay? Don't forget it.

We were born into decay. You either lived with war, or you rested in peace.
...Not that I expect you to understand.

Aren't you guys afraid of anything?
I'm a FIEND. I was expecting shackles, a cell... And you give me tea parties and a cake!
You people are strange, you know that? Humans, beastfolk, fiends... You treat them all the same. ...We could use a little more strange in our world.

My name is Arly. I worked for the Lord of Shadow, but no longer.
Might be hard to trust a traitor, but... I'd like to join forces.

There is nothing I wouldn't do for Arum.
...I'll grow stronger than her. Just you wait.
361004:
Hmm, now THAT'S interesting!...Huh? Pay up?
Ahaha, you're such a tease!
If you ever get hold of a good secret, come tell me—I'll show you how to use it like a pro!
Each slip of the tongue is like a diamond in the rough. Dress it up right, and it'll fetch a fortune!
There's so much dirt to dig up here, I might need a shovel! Not to mention this stuff's risky even by MY standards... Life doesn't get much better than this!
So THAT'S what happened! Thanks for the tip-off. Here's your cut. I guess I COULD spare a few extra coins for a friend—if you make it worth my while.

Ooh, there's bound to be juicy secrets here!...Yes, I think we'll make EXCELLENT friends!
I can slip a few hot tips back your way.

Here's a free tidbit for you—I'm honestly really grateful for all you've done for me.
...What, you don't believe me? That's on you, pal.
361005: You have something on your mind? Why don't you tell me about it? I'm here to help.

I don't want any reward. I have savings, okay?
Besides, one man doesn't need much to live.
You know what's rarer and worth more than any gem? Your lives, shining in this lifeless desert.
What our town went through... was a tragedy. No one should've ever had to experience that, and I'll make sure no one else does.
All I ask is that you stay alive. My only legacy is through the people that I save.

You're not from around here, are you?
My name's Adil. I, well, lost my home... Mind telling me about yours?

If you don't have something, make it. Don't ever take what's not yours.
I know it's not as easy as it sounds, but... I'll figure it out this time, I promise.
361006: I'll do your cleaning—or your dirty work. I'm a maid. Believe me, I've seen it all.

My hair?
Adorable, isn't it? I color and style it myself.

Yes, my bunny has a name. Say hi, Orem.
...And I wouldn't touch her. She's got a needle inside.
Yeah, yeah, I'LL do it, so get some rest. If you don't take care of yourself, I'll knock you out myself.
Something smells good? Of course, I'm practicing my baking. You can have a slice of cake if you keep quiet about me raiding the pantry.

I'm your new maid, Dorothea.
This place is pretty casual, huh? Works for me.
*sigh* You're a weird one... but that kind of works for me. I'll give you a discount, so you better keep me around.
151015: There's all sorts of amazing things I can do in this Saga! I can even pretend to be a magical girl!
I can just wave a little stick and cast magic, incredible! Is there any magic that can transform my clothes? Or let me talk to animals?
Nimbus has such soft fur! I love fluffy, soft things like that. I could just pet him all day! Though I think he'd probably get mad at me.
I love everyone in this Saga! I want them to remember me forever, so I'll do my best to leave a great impression!
One day I'll have to say goodbye to everyone... but I'll make sure to do so with a smile on my face! Our last memory should be a positive one!
You know, Nimbus acts tough, but he's actually a softie on the inside! Every time I'm down, he watches out for me.
I'm Zombie Number 6, Lily Hoshikawa! Nice to meet you! Wow, it's like I'm in an isekai anime... This is so cool!
No time for rest—I'm gonna work hard to help Franchouchou and be the best idol I can be! Just watch me!
161009: First I get turned into a zombie, and now I'm in another Saga... I hope we can find a way to get back home.
I'm worried we might not be able to return to our Saga. There were many things in my old world that I wasn't used to, but this is on another level.
I'm nervous, but there's no use fretting about it all the time. I need to learn from Ai-san and keep practicing my skills to get even better.
I think I'm starting to get used to this Saga. Performing as an idol with everyone is so much fun that I'm starting to forget all my worries.
I just became friends with a talking mushroom. It could be my imagination, but I feel like he understands what I'm saying!
I went out with Ai-san a while ago and looked at all the strange clothing available in this Saga. Do you have any outfit recommendations?
I'm Zombie Number 4, Junko Konno. I'm honestly at a loss for what to do, but I'm going to try my best. It's nice to meet you!
I'm still not sure what I should do next, but in the meantime, I'll continue singing and dancing for everyone!
231014: This Saga has nothing to do with the one we come from... But if I can still be an idol here, it doesn't bother me!
I was worried we might speak a different language than people here, but we seem to understand each other just fine! How exactly does that work?
You've seen idols on other worlds too? Hmm, I see... So there are animal and robot idols too! I want to see them perform, for research purposes!
I need to keep honing my skills. When I go back to my original world, I don't want to disappoint my fans by becoming rusty!
If you have time, would you mind coming along with me to practice? I put together a new set list and want to get your opinion on how to improve it!
Could you take me to Challua's world again on my next day off? I feel like talking to her always reminds me of what's truly important...
I'm Zombie Number 3, Ai Mizuno. Even if I'm a zombie now and stuck in another world, I'll never stop being an idol!
There's nothing more fun than being an idol! I'm happy to be able to perform even here in this new Saga. I'll never stop trying to be even better!
121009: I can't believe we ended up in the Saga of another world... What's going to happen to us from here on out?
I'm sure there's people out there who would jump at the chance to be sent to another world... It's all so much to take in though...
I actually kinda enjoy going on adventures like this. But when I think about it logically... What kinda idol runs around fighting in an alternate world?
You know, when we first arrived, I kept thinking things never went my way... But meeting you all made me realize I've got plenty going for me!
We're going to hold a concert soon, so make sure you come. All of us in Franchouchou are gonna give everything we've got!
Stella always comes to our shows and pays super close attention—her eyes are glued to the stage! It's nice to have such a dedicated fan!
I'm Zombie Number 1... But this really isn't the time for intros! How the heck did we end up in another world? I've got to be cursed or something!
We've still got no way home, but that's okay! There's plenty of stuff for us to do here, and you bet we're gonna give it our all!
141009: A Saga in another world? Awesome, I'll take over this one too!
This world's got walking mushrooms and all sorts of creatures. Makes me wanna fight 'em to see who's strongest!
Kinda sucks there's no Drive Tori here... Wait, there is?! Why didn't you tell me sooner?!
What, I don't seem like I'd be an idol? No one says I can't take over the world with Franchouchou!
More and more folks are coming up and telling me how they're fans now. Really pumps me up for our next show!
Having someone to beat motivates me a ton! I practice a lot harder when I remember I can't afford to lose!
