I'm Zombie Number 2, Saki Nikaido! Not sure what's going on, but as far as I can tell, life's not that different here. I'm gonna go take a look around!
I decided I'd take over the world as an idol. 'Bout time I ramp things up and show this Saga what's what!
211014: The Saga in this world is fascinating. I'm going to enjoy exploring it.
I wasn't very familiar with the world we came from, but this one is filled with even more mysteries. Is this what they call a "fantasy universe"?
I can't help but tease Light since he's always so serious. His reactions are extremely amusing.
The more I adjust to life here, the easier it is to relax and enjoy myself.... I seem plenty relaxed already? Is that so?
I always give my all for Franchouchou. If you don't believe me, then come to one of our shows. I'll prove it to you.
Light keeps pestering me about my clothing. Does my sense of fashion bother him that much?
Zombie Number 5, Yugiri, at your service. So we've traveled to another world, have we? Just goes to show that life is full of the unexpected.
I'm grateful for all the fans we have, and the fans we'll make. I promise you'll never want to miss a performance!
263003: Gwar? Gar, gwar gwar. Gwaar... Gwargwar, gagagwar.
243007: There's so much to see in this village and the worlds connected to it... I want to paint it all!
Hmm... Something is definitely off... Is this what they mean by artist's block?
I know I'm here to practice and hone my painting abilities, but if there's anything I can help with, please let me know.
Lately, Ryouki's been fussing around me like a mother hen... I suppose I shouldn't have left without saying something first.
The next volume of the Yokai Encyclopedia is coming along smoothly... almost TOO smoothly...

...This part needs to be a little more—
Oh! I'm sorry, I was so focused... It's time for dinner? But... No, no, I'll be there soon!
It's my turn to extend a helping hand. Kugui Nishikaze, diviner, at your service.
I need to improve as both an artist and a diviner, to reach the ideal that she sees for us...
141111: Excuse me, could I use the World Flipper? I want to run through the forest...
I love running, but just running isn't good enough... I also need the view from the lead.
Oh, sorry, were you making the rounds? I didn't get to run today since we have the day off, so I came here on Spe's advice. What do I do though...
Forests, sand, plains, machines... So many different worlds. I'm glad I was able to take them all in.
Alk, do you know any good shops in Palpebra? Stella gave me the Oculus to look through, but it's mostly all-you-can-eat places...
Running here makes me think of everyone back home. Distance really does make the heart grow fonder... and makes me want to race again.
I'm Silence Suzuka. The view from the lead is mine. I love running in all sorts of places, including other worlds.
Traveling to other worlds is so nice. There's so many sights to see... Hehe, I wonder where I should run next.
151105: I'm trying to become the top Umamusume in Japan! I'm always ready and rar'n to go!
Being able to travel between worlds is a secret, right? I'm not good with secrets... b-but I'll do my best!
Please come watch me race sometime! I'd love to show you what I can do!
I never would have imagined I'd be traveling to different worlds. These new places have all kinds of carrot dishes too... What a blast!
The seasoning and flavor are totally different, but Alk's cooking reminds me a lot of Mom back home.
Tracen Academy's a really big school! I almost got lost when I first started going there... Ahaha...
Nice to meet you! I'm Special Week, an Umamusume! I look forward to working together with you!
I'll make my moms proud... And, more than anything, I'll do my best to pursue my own dreams... I hope you'll all keep on watching me!
113001: Whoa-ho-HO! Everywhere I look, it's something NEW and WEIRD! Now this is the life!
Ring-ring-ring! You've reached the Gold Ship Other World Support Desk. Are you looking for world domination or a relaxing vacay?
Maybe I'll visit home for once. Ya know—Planet Golgol. Can I borrow the World Flipper? Huh? It doesn't travel in space?! Yeah, makes sense.
You got a real winner in that Stella girl. Even I can't predict what she's gonna do next... Mind if I take her with me?
Alk, you know any SPECIAL recipes? You know... Something that'll have McQueen SCREAMING.
I asked Shroombo how to glow different colors, and I'm practicing now. The trick is to channel infinity into your upper body.
Heeey, peace! Golshi here, ready to dash into another world! I'll search high and low for something fun to do, so get ready!
Look how much you've grown! Keep it up, and you'll see even more growth. But don't take your eyes off me, or I'll leave you in the dust!
121021: The scenery and even the air around this place are so different from Lugunica... At first I thought this was a dream, but no longer.
Is it really okay for me to be in Palpebra? I mean, I'm a drifter... and a half elf. I don't want to cause any problems.
If Puck was here, he'd know what to do... Ah, Puck is the spirit who protects me. For some reason, he's not coming out...
I think I've grown more optimistic lately. Perhaps there's a reason I was brought to Palpebra... I'll need to work hard to figure that out.
At first, my own worries about being accepted kept me from making friends, but thanks to Subaru and you, that's no longer the case.
I'm headed to the Guild to discuss the drifters issue. Would you like to come? I want this plan to go well, so I welcome your opinion.
I am Emilia. I'm honestly not sure how this all happened, but if there's anything I can do to help, I will.
I cannot continue to bemoan the situation at hand. Surely there is something I can learn here that will help me grow!
121027: ...You think I seem relaxed? I assure you, I'm very troubled by the fact that we were suddenly transported to Palpebra.
I plan to take care of the mansion's chores for today. Once I'm done cleaning, I'll take care of the laundry and make food for Subaru.
Sister is kind... Too kind for her own good. If she's ever in trouble, please do what you can to help her.
Alk, your cooking was very good. Subaru loved it. Would you mind cooking dinner with me again sometime?
I'd like to take on more jobs for Sister's sake as well, but there haven't been any good ones lately... If only there were more demolition jobs.
Subaru keeps telling me how much he loves going on adventures with you. Please continue to watch over him.
I am Rem. I can assist you with many things, from house chores to monster extermination. Don't hesitate to call on me.
As thanks for aiding me, I'll help you however I can. It's time to show you I'm truly as fanatical as a demon!
241021: We need to return to Lugunica as soon as possible, but I have no idea how... I need to find a way before I use up all my mana.
I cooked for you as thanks. Here, have some of my special steamed potatoes. What? Why are you looking at me like that?
You better not be pushing Rem too hard. She's strong, but not invincible. She always piles too much onto her plate.
This bracelet will keep my mana up, but elemental gems are expensive... As soon as you find a well-paying job, let me know.
My mana supply dries up quickly when I use it, so I don't plan on working hard. You can fight in my place, thanks.
Going on an adventure? Then let me help. Why so surprised? I don't mind assisting on occasion, since you're always looking after me.
Ram here. I'll help out, but not any more than necessary. We need to return to the kingdom as soon as possible, so don't increase my workload.
I see you all like interfering with others' business. Fine. I'll help you if you help me, so keep working hard in my place, okay?
263009: Is there some kinda rule to this whole traversing worlds thing? This last time did feel a bit different though... Ugh, whatever!
Light sure is a fluffy little bunny, isn't he? You know, I actually really love fuzzy critters like that. Too bad he won't let me pet him more.
Hey, would you mind hanging out with Mili? She's got a lot on her mind, and she might get sad if she's alone for too long.
I might be stronger than before, but I'm still so weak. I wish I could just awaken a new ability like, "Bam! Level up!" But no luck...
I've figured out the timing for petting Light, but what about Nimbus... He doesn't leave any openings in his defense. What am I supposed to do?
Come on, Alk, go easy on me here! This is just practice... Wait, you ARE going easy on me?! No way, what would happen if you went all out then?!
My name's Subaru Natsuki! Not only am I totally clueless, I'm also broke beyond compare! ...Been a while since I said that. Nice to meet you.
If I want to protect Mili, I need to grow and change, even if it's just a little. I'll become the strength Mili needs, one step at a time!
412004: Error. Commands are disabled in power-save mode. *beep* Switch to active mode? Y/N

Life-forms detected. Now scanning...
Be-beep, be-beep...
No threats detected.
Current user is set to highest priority. All defense systems engaged.

Greetings. Registering new user...
Be-beep, be-beep...
Registration complete. Awaiting directions.
442004:
Hoo... Hoo... 
(Who turned the lights on? I'm trying to get some shut-eye...)

Hoot! Hoo!
(Ask me anything about the forest, child.)

Hoo-hoo. 
(My peepers aren't as good as they used to be...)

Hoo... Hoo... 
(Perhaps one day you'll grow to be just like the great Spirit Tree.)

Hoo... Hoot-hoo!
(Owlbert Tracer's the name. I live in the Spirit Tree, but I shall accompany you if you wish.)

Hoo-hoot!
(I never thought I'd still be learning at this age!)
442006:
Squeeeeeak! Yip yip yip!
(I'm booored! Let's go hunting!)

Yip! Squee-squeak, squeak. Awoooo!
(Hah! Bet you've never seen a weasel do THIS!)

Yip yip yip! Squee-squeak!
(Hey, human! Come brush me!)

Squeak, squee-squeak squeeeak! Yip!
(You're the best friend a weasel could have!)

Yip! Squee-squeak squeak!
(Heh, guess I could make you my lackey!)
512001:
Kula, kulacha!
(It sure is cozy here!)

Chaltea, kuah!
(Wanna go for a stroll?)

Cha chal hah!
(So many friends, so mush fun!)

Yachat, kula!
(I'm no ordinary toadstool—I'm a forest sprite!)

Ayado, chaltea, Shroombo Fungo!
(Shroombo Fungo here! Nice to meet you!)

Kuah, Challua!
(I've still got mushroom to grow!)
512002:
Blurble blurble. 
(Hey, take me with you!)

Blurp blurble blurble!
(I'M the lord of flames!)
512004:
Screech! Screech! Screech!
(Bring me stuff to torch!)

Screech screech screeeech!
(You're not going anywhere without me!)

Screech screech screech!
(Let's roast some smores!)

Screech screech!
(Where there's fire, there's an imp!)
522001:
Boing boingy boing. 
(I was taking a nap in the sun...)

Boing. 
(Clear water is the most beautiful thing...)

Boingy boingy boing. 
(I wanna ride on your head...)

Boingy boing boing. 
(I'm gonna get stronger...)

Boing... boing boing. 
(I'm really strong now...)
532001:
Zip zip zap... 
(When's the next thunderstorm?)

Zippity zap zap!
(I'll take the world by storm!)

Zip! Zip zip zap!
(Boom! I'm the best!)
532004:
Squeeeak, squeak!
(These quills ain't no joke!)

Squeak squeak... 
(My stomach's growling up a storm...)
Squeak squeak, squeak. (I'm in the mood for a little sunbathing.)

Squeak squeeak!
(I'm gonna stick to you like a burr!)
542001:
Whoosh whoooosh. 
(Watch me get blown awaaay!)
251006: Ugh, my professor's sending me on another wild goose chase! "Find me an interesting monster"? What does that even MEAN?!
First-rate hunters gather data and conduct ecological surveys! I'm, uh, still learning. Heh.
Mogu's pretty weird, huh? Like, how can a bag be alive? Even I don't get it.
When he's at home he's my grandpa, but otherwise he's my professor! And I love both of 'em!
My professor keeps bugging me about studying you, Light. Will you humor him? No? Yeah, I figured as much.
I'm Lyla the eco-hunter! Here—some hunter candy for a new friend!
I must be the luckiest hunter alive. I mean, who else gets to study monsters on another world? I'm using this info to vault to the top!
161005:
We've gotta let loose while we're still alive, yeah?

Just don't get yourself killed!
I hate being left behind! I'll lose it if you don't take me with you!

Look, Cob! This place is huuuge!

Calm down! You'll lose more life force!

Ugh, I hate sleeping. Could you hang out till I lose consciousness?

Heh. Think you could indulge her?

Could you PLEASE slow down?! We share a body, you know!

Ugh, don't remind me.
Ahaha! I'm your gruesome neighborhood monster, Carla. And this piece of trash is Cob. Now let's get this party started!

You've got half your life left, so we should make the most of it.

Heck yeah! C'mon, Cob! Let's get it!
361009:
Hmm, maybe I should put in a twist here for extra development—
Huh?! Oh, sorry! I was just thinking out loud! It's nothing, really...
What? Pictures?! Yes, I like them... F-for example? Oh, um... p-portraits of people?
Oh, no... If anybody did a background check, that would be the absolute end of my new career! I've got to be more careful!
Starview Village is crazy... The thirst is real.
Creators deserve privacy! That's my number one rule! Wh-why are you giving me that look, Alk?!
Nice to meet you. I'm Meryll. I'm still new, but I do okay with recon. I'll do my best to help you!
What? Huh? How do you know about my book? What reseller?! THEY SHALL RUE THIS DAY!
121006: When you meet someone, it's fate. You and I were meant to be.
Here, look at this locket. And when you open it... There's Enith's portrait! Isn't she the cutest button you've ever seen?
Hey, miss. You got some time to spare? Why don't we get to know each other over cake?
There's this old myth about a girl who lived by the lake falling in love with a dragon and having kids... I never believed it, but now, I think it might be true.
Starview is awesome. Perfect place to escape from all my problems.
I'm Remnith, a guardian by trade. Your enemies will learn to fear the spear... and the ladies will learn to love it.
I'm done with feeling sorry. If there's someone out there who messed up our lives... Enith, you and I are taking them down!
231009: There are quite a number of experiments I could perform with all the fascinating people here. If only I could work faster.
This is a tool used for experimentation. You can touch it if you would like—as long as you don't mind the live current running through it.
Alk has a very interesting past. His memory has holes too, just like mine.
Greetings, Stella. I have just returned. How are you today?
Emotion is a strange phenomenon. For example, when I think about you, I feel a warmth in my chest.
Greetings. I am Rudy. What is this place? Do you know where we are?
I have learned something new, and I intend to keep learning more. I think my future has just become a great deal more interesting.
263002: This chair? It's my mobile throne. Moving my body is difficult for me, so this chair acts as my legs. Would you like to try it?
I don't like working for the sake of maintaining the status quo. But working to make the world a better place? That’s different.
Today's the picnic with Bulleta! It's a special occasion, so I'll make something extra fancy! Like... sandwiches!
Sometimes I get frightened. I worry that I'll lose everything someday. ...No, I can't think like that. I have to be strong.
I walked by myself! Only a few steps... but I am improving. I am moving forward.
You've ended the eternal night, so I've come by for a chat. So this is your world, is it?
I've come a long way to stand alongside Bulleta. Perhaps I've caught up a little?
151006: I've seen stars in so many planetariums, but seeing them with my own eyes... No amount of money can buy something as precious as that.
I've modded my eyewear. Now I can see behind me like I've got eyes in the back of my head!
These babies will blast all foes to bits. Now that's what I call justice! How much do I spend on ammo? Uh... Enough. But it's worth it!
Moving clouds, fresh breezes—a living, breathing world... You'd never experience these back where I grew up.
I just have to keep doing my best not to let Love down. I guess that's the only downside to having such an exceptional partner.
My bullets of freedom are now in your hands. Hold your head high and set your sights on the horizon! So, where do we shoot first?
Sometimes I wonder if I'll ever be worthy of being Love's... No, no doubts! My bullets of freedom will always keep flying, no matter how far we go!
151005: Live every day like it's your last! Go all out, and things will work out!
Leave everything to me! You're in good hands!
These guys are mostly Organics, right? So why can they shoot fire from their hands and stuff?
The air here is so clean! And you're breathing it for free?! I bet I could sell cans of this stuff back home!
If you need a guide for Qualia City, I'm your guy! I know all the best spots.
Alk, you're into motorbikes too, yeah? You should buy your own so we can ride together next time!
Name's Teurgis! If you want the strongest, the fastest, and the best of the best, look no further!
Hehe, VR's great and all, but it's got nothing on having true pals! You and me, we're gonna go far!
251007:
If you've got a problem, I've got a solution.\n
My price? Don't worry about it.
Look, I couldn't care less about the money. But what money can BUY is everything.
What are you looking at? I'm not thinking of ways to use you, I swear... Haha...
Shoot. Looks like I used up all my savings... But I don't WANT to eat SoyMate. Wait, I can just freeload off Alk!
Have to say, never a dull moment with you guys. VR can't even compare to our adventures! So, where are we off to next?
Hey, how's it going? Name's Hopper. Any easy jobs come your way, hook me up. I'll even pay you for the introduction.
Just wanted to thank you for everything... No, I'm not trying to butter you up! Man, where's the trust?!
221008: Fake it till you make it, and snag all the rewards on the way. Heheh... Here comes another sucker.
People never know how much their old trinkets are worth, but I do... That's why antiques make the best reward.
My dream is to simply fall into the lap of luxury. How about you?
Before the whole sprite business, I'd go digging in ruins for artifacts and the like. That's why I've got an eye for trinkets.
I can't quite remember how Gianini and I met. It's just been so long. We'd probably gotten into trouble together, as per the usual.
I'm Mordiaga—jack of all trades, master of sprites. Lend me your services, and you'll be handsomely rewarded.
I've come a long way from the desert snake that I was. But I won't rest until I'm living in a palace oasis. Gianini, remember this lamp?
141141:
あーーっはっはっは！妾達のステージは
サーカスとアイドルを両立したスペシャルな体験！
存分に喝采するといいわ！

『ぴょん』？え、なに……？
こっちのうさぎって、そんな鳴き方するの……？

ふふん！
この子達を、ただのぬいぐるみと思わない事ね。
みんな、妾の忠臣――
ずっと支えてくれた大切な存在よ。

ＣＲＴ１３をやめるつもりはないわ。
アイドル活動も……まぁ嫌いじゃないし？
女王として、ファンを裏切る真似はできないもの。

『作戦開始は明日か。抜かりはないだろうな？』
『当然よ。状況に応じたプランも用意してあるわ』
『ステラとの初めての街遊び。失敗は――』
……って、なによ？お前も会議に混じりたいの？

ちょっと！友達の作り方、教えなさいよ！！
お前達には妾以外の友達がいるのに
妾にはお前達しかいないなんて……！
ずるいわ！！

あーーっはっはっは！妾こそ卯国の代表
クイン・シルクハーレよ！
さぁ、妾に支配される事を光栄に――
……え？潰れたって、なにが？……えっ？

あっはははは！夢へと向かって歩き出した
妾達に、もはや敵など存在しないわ！
お前もちゃんと付いてきなさいよ？
妾の初めての……と、友達なんだから！！
121147:
やっぱり納得できないからさ
格闘技、シロさんに教えてもらってるんだけど……
コロコロ転がされちゃうんだよね。
…………できると思ったんだけどなぁ。

だってさ、気分いいよ？
私、けっこうかっこよくない？って思うの。
きっとマリーナさんに、ディーネさん
あとバレッタさんも分かってくれる筈だよ……！

イナホちゃんの妖怪劇にさ、日本の作品も
使ってみたらどうかなって思ったの。
著作権は――まあ、１万年前ぐらいに切れてるし？

ショウちゃんは、やっぱ凄いよ。
ほんと、ありがとね。
……なにがって。いや、それは、詳しく説明すると
怒ると思う……。ご、ごめんっ～～～～！！

こ、言葉を知らないわけじゃないよ？
でもさ、適切な時に適切な言葉を使えるのって
それとは別の能力だと思うんだよね……！
……はぁ、アユム君達はいいなあ……。

私には、分からない事。
貰う事もあげる事もできない事。
今なら、それも悪い事じゃないって思える。
でも、寂しく思うぐらいなら、いいよね……。

明けましておめでとうございます。
みんな、今年もよろしくね。
……この服？ふふふ。作ってもらったの。
折角の新年だもん。楽しまなくちゃね？

今年の抱負。
恥ずかしくないように、やる。かな。
んー……私が、私にね？
分かんないけど、そんな感じだよ！
131128:
あっけおめー！特別技術対応課シブヤ支部
課長のツインクでーす！にゃはは！
みんなも支部遊びに来てよねー！

にゃは～。このキモノ、超いいでしょー？
せっかくだしもう何着か用意しよっかなー。
帯とかさ、もーっと派手にしたいし！

オバチャーン！お雑煮作って！
え～いいじゃん。この間作ってくれたの
めちゃおいしかったし！アルク達と
お餅ついてきたからさ～お願いお願い～！

ココちゃんとモカちゃん、足機械にしたいって
言ったら、お母さんに怒られちゃったらしくてさ。
シブヤの人って、きっびしいんだねー？

あ。シロ、またジッチャン達と飲んでるー。
ん？オジサンは？……ノヴァ達とゲーム？
ああ～。オジサン、すっかりレトロゲームの
とりこになっちゃったからな～。

シブヤの事も、みんなの事も
ぜーったい私達が守るから！
にゃっふふー。課長センパイとして
これからもカッコいいとこ見せちゃうよー？

にゃっははー。あけましておっめでと～！
ついでに特別技術対応課シブヤ支部、設立！
このツインク課長にお任せあれー！

やーーば！シブヤって超たのしー！
大変な事もあるかもだけどさー。
私達が絶対、守ってあげるかんね！
みんなー！ぶっ飛ばしてくよーーー！！
111141:
メリークリスマス！トレジャーサンタのミアだよ！
トレジャーサンタっていうのはね？
トレジャーハンターでサンタな存在なんだよっ！
細かい事はいいのです！勢い！大事！！

ねえねえアルク！ショウちゃん！
ミア、シブヤの地下迷宮ってやつに行きたいです！
きっと最深部にはすっごいお宝が――
……んん？そういうのじゃないの？

ほわあーっ！？は、はやい！はやすぎるよ！
この『ナインテイル号』っーーー！
も、もちょっと減速――ひょわああ～～～！！

ん～。ライトの世界の人達はね
サンタって虎族の事だと思ってるみたいなんだよ。
確かにミアも顔から毛は生えておりますが……
本当は違うのにね～？

あっ！あああっーーー！ナオちゃん！待って！
回避ボタンってどこ……ッンアー！！！
また吹っ飛んだ！ああああ、また負けたああ～～。
…………もっかい。もっかいだけ勝負！！ねっ！

ミアはね……トレジャーサンタなんだよ……。
サンタではあるけど、ママではないんだよ……？
……『ミアママサンタ』って
なんなんだろうね……。

メリークリスマース！
トレジャーサンタ・ミア、参上だよ！
一緒にプレゼントをハントしに行こー！

お宝をハントして、プレゼントして――
みんなの笑顔もゲットできる！
えへへ、トレジャーサンタって最高だね！
ミアもいっぱいプレゼント貰えたもん！
151141:
パルペブラの服ってのも、いいもんでありんすね。
可愛らしくて、華もあって。
なにより、髪と帯が！軽くて……！！
最高でありんすよ～～～っ！！

……ちらり……はらり。
うーーーん、こういう服では
どういう仕草が艶っぽいんでありんすかね？
グッときた奴を教えておくんなし！

欲しいプレゼントがあったら言っておくんなしね？
わちきが、なーんでも……♡
してあげちゃうでありんすよー……♡

か、家族といると、誰だって
昔の喋りが出るもんでありんしょう！？
からかわないでおくんなしっ！
もうっもーーーお！！

んふふふ～♡ようこそ、おいでなんし～♡
今日もお疲れ様でありんした。
どうぞゆっくり……
わちきに任せておくんなしね♡

こんなにも、支えてくれる人達がいて。
慕ってくれる子達がいて。
……わちきは本当に、果報者でありんすね。

めりーくりすます！でありんす～♡
わちきのどれす姿、いかがでありんしょう？
うふふっ、普段と違うわちきの艶姿に
めろめろになっておくんなしー♡

色んな人から貰ったプレゼントに
ちゃんと、お返しできるように……。
――どうか見ていておくんなし。
わちきの新しい旅の、始まりでありんす！
261083:
お出かけですか？なら、このお薬をどうぞ。
苦いですけど、風邪予防に効くんです。
帰ってきたら手洗いうがいも忘れずに、ですよ？

聖夜祭の間、ケモミミ団やエルザさん達と
特設診療所を開く事になったんです。
パルペブラの人もシブヤの人も、楽しく聖夜祭を
過ごせるように……私も頑張ります！

ふふ……この衣装、少し恥ずかしいけど……
ステラとピシカに褒めてもらえて
私、嬉しかったみたいです。

薬草クッキー、お口に合えばいいんですが……
――美味しい？本当？よかったぁ。
アルクにそう言ってもらえれば安心です。

いける……今の私なら、なんでもできる！！
私が世界中の全ての人を救って――……はっ！
ご、ごめんなさい！うぅ……たまに突然
変なスイッチが入るようになっちゃって……。

薬草調合専用の厨房、欲しいんですよねぇ。
いつまでも星見の街の厨房を借りてるの
申し訳ないですし。……ふふ、いっそ
サンタさんにお願いしちゃいましょうか？

メリークリスマス！
皆さん、体調お変わりないですか？
安心してくださいね。聖夜祭の間の
皆さんの健康も、私が守りますから。

普通の日も特別な夜も……
私は一人でも多くの人を癒したいんです。
患者さん、友達……そして自分自身も。
これからもよろしくお願いしますね？
151129:
多少装備は変わったけど、僕は僕だ。
今まで通り接してくれると嬉しい……
なんて、君達には別に言う必要もないか。

ナインズは元々サーディアの分家筋なんだよ。
だからと言って関係がいいわけではない……
というか、だからこそ、かな。
プライドが高いんだよ。どちらもね。

凄いな……僕が考えた通りに、剣が動く……！
――空飛ぶ刃を、剣と言っていいのなら、だけど。
ふふっ、だけどみんなが貸してくれた力だ。
これが僕の九剣だと、胸を張ってみせるよ！

ファーランド最強の剣士、ですか？
若い騎士同士では盛り上がる話題でしたよ。
……『彼女』と手合わせをする日までは、ね。

はぁ～～～……。
アルク……ヴェロンさんは……？
……飲み屋から、ツケを払えって連絡が、ね……。
本当にいい度胸をしてる団員だよ……！

兄上はナインズ最強の剣士だった。
強い人だと、思っていたんだ。
……それも僕の幼い期待だったんだろうな……。

もう一度やると、決めたんだ。
だから、見ていてください！
飛燕自由騎士団団長
ユーウェル・ナインズ、参上しました！

アルク達と共に。殿下と共に。国のために。
やれる事も、やるべき事も
多くなってしまったけど……それが僕だ。
――今なら胸を張って言えるよ。
161153:
っへへ。まさかこのトシになって
自由騎士なんてモンになっちまうとはねぇ……。
こそばゆくて、いけねえや。

さて、カードは揃った。
敵は慌てふためいていやがる。
こっからは先は――
ま、お前らと一緒にやってやるよ。

ヘクシズってやつらは、めげねえよなあ……。 
３０年前、どこよりもイテエ目に遭ったのは 
あいつらなんだぜ？ 
狸ジジイめ。よくもやりやがったもんだぜ。

『ユーニ』はな、あいつが名付けた酒なのよ。
騎士どもには受けなくとも、パルペブラでなら
売れるんじゃねえかって息巻いててなぁ……。
……あぁ、この味だ。この味だったなぁ……。

はぁ～～。天才ってやつは、これだからよぉ……。
おいアル坊。お前言っとけ。人様の技を盗む時は
せめて苦労したフリぐらいしろってな！
あぁ？あいつはお前の管轄だろーがよ！？

あのなぁ。俺はな
星見の街の便利なオジさんじゃねーんだよ。
アレを教えろだのコレを教えろだの次から次に――
なんだぁ？一緒に遊べぇ？？シロに頼めシロに！

飛燕自由騎士団、一の太刀。
自由騎士ヴェロン様とは俺の事よ！
……なんつってな？剣で足りなきゃ
タマもくれてやるさ。はははは！

ガキどもがよ！
勝手に死にそうになりやがって！
仕方ねえから、この俺様が
護ってやるよぉ！！
121141:
エンリルは、シィルにこそ相応しいもの。
私が手にする事はもうないだろう。
彼女は彼女の道を――
私は、私の道を進んでいくよ。

九騎士は、国王候補となる王子をそれぞれ
擁立しているのだが……サーディアだけは別だ。
王国の剣が、一人の王子に肩入れするのも
おかしな話だからな。

飛燕自由騎士団……ふざけた名目だと思ったが
サーディアの黒鎧を提供できたのはよかったな。
英雄の騎士団長殿への貸しは
多ければ多い程いいだろう？

剣は自ら、相手や場所を選ばない。
しかし私自身は人間だからな？
個人的に動く時も、好きな相手と喋る時もあるさ。

残念だが、ヴェルーガ・ソロンと剣を交えるのは
しばらく先になりそうだな……。
ああユーウェル、アルク殿。今度は３人で
手合わせしてみないか？

ふむ……シィルが彼を気に入った理由は
ある程度、理解したつもりだが。もう少し
扱いやすい男にしておけばいいものを……。

シェルード・サーディア。
共に未来を歩める事、深く感謝する。
サーディアの剣として
恥じない戦果を上げてみせよう。

ふっ……自分の中に
こんなにも熱が残っていたとはな。
まだまだ満たされはしない。突き進むさ。
頂きの景色を掴み取るまで――！
161159:
私が君達と懇意にしている事は 
まあ、口外しない方が無難でしょーよ。 
面倒なんですよ。大人の世界ってのはねェ。

ほぉ、あの空に浮かんでいるのは
世界の抽象ですか。
なるほど。この街を作った人間も
箱にモノを入れるのが好きそうですねェ……。

あぁ、この喋り方が気になりますか？
学院生達から伝染ったんでしょーよ。
……言葉は我々が世界に与えたカタチそのもの。
後生大事にするものではないですからねェ。

もし、古龍が始まりの龍の似姿に
過ぎないのだとしたら――
そうした。のではなく、それしかできなかった？
問題は、どうやってそれを行ったかだ……。

ッハーーー！なんと素晴らしい場所でしょうか。
痺れるような才能が、こんなにも集結して……。
これはもう何人か、私の子にしてしまっても
いいですかねェ！？

恋人？それはもちろん、何人か居ますが。
家族？娘と孫が居ますが。
……なぜって、そうしたいからでしょう。
ふふ、君はそうしないのですかねェ？

意志は、世界を描く一筆である。
君が、虚空に物語を描くならば
私はいい読者になると思いますよ？
今後とも、どうぞよろしく。

壊れて結構！
壊し、継ぎ接ぎ、バラして組み立てる。
そうやって世界は広がるのです。
あなたはそれで、よかったのですよ。
253019:
世界というのは……本当に……
驚きに満ちているのであるな……？
……いや、星見の街はそういう話を
越えてしまっている気もするが……。

さあ、今日もパルペブラへ向かうとしよう！
行くぞじいや、ユーウェル！
今日も今日とて一歩ずつ、だ！

なに！？ライト殿は元はランドウォーカー！？
本当に世界を救った勇者殿であったのか！？
い、いや、すまぬ。てっきりどこかの民族の間で
使われる、称号としての勇者だと……。

別に、為政者が最強の剣士である必要はない。
全てを知る必要もない。万能であるに越した事は
ないが、臣下とはそのためにいるのだからな。
……違うぞ。剣鬼殿に勝てぬ言い訳ではないぞ？

ユーウェル！今日な、アルク殿にシブヤを
案内してもらったのだ！なんだあの街は！？
衣食住、全てが違う！目が回るほど楽しかったぞ！
あれを独り占めするのはズルいぞパルペブラ！！

王道の先は遠く、未だ余にも全ては見えておらぬ。
……だが世界を知る度に、少しずつ進めている。
それが余は、たまらなく嬉しい！

ファーランド王国王位継承権第五位
ヴァーレイン・ゼロノア！
先日は本当に世話になった！
今後ともよろしく頼むぞ、英雄達よ！

遠くまで見えるようになるほど
世界の困難さも、また見えてくる。
奴や父上が見た物の片鱗なのだろうな。
――無論、諦めはせぬ。もう二度と！
141135:
これは槍です。サーフボードじゃありません！
……でも、水を切って駆ける……
あれも楽しそうですね……！

私、『あるくめし』を食べてみたいです！
この街の名物なのですよね。食べた者は
物の見事にほっぺが落ちるとか……！
ぜひ！実食させていただきたく！

クランもオロウルも、とても美しく
空を飛びますよね。それに二人で飛んでいる時は
いつも以上に楽しそうというか……。
ん？クラン、どうして顔が赤いのですか？

世界の事、姫巫女として私にできる事……
もっともっと、知りたいと思うのです。
さあ、今日はどの空を飛びに行きましょうか！

アルク達に出逢えた私は
やはり幸福なのでしょうね。
ちなみにライトは今、幸福ですか？
……ふふ。それならよかったです！

ああ、白虎様！ちょうどよかったです！
今、クロ達と一緒に君主論と社会契約についての
お話をしてまして、白虎様も是非――
あ、あれ？どちらに行かれるんですっ？

鳥族の姫巫女、ゼフィールと申します。
あなた達の力となりましょう！
……ふふっ、異世界の風……。
とても、とても楽しみです……！

ああ……共に空を飛ぶというのは
こんなにも心地よいものなのですね！
私、もっと色んな風を知りたいです。
これからも、皆さんと飛ぶために！
161147:
えっへん！
エルモル、今日もいっぱい人助けして
よしよしなでなでしてきたよ！
……メムラム様には内緒にしてね？

怪我したら言ってね。
すぐ、癒してあげるから。
それとも、抱きしめる方がいーい？

あったかいオドに触れると
すっごく気持ちいいのに。
人間は人生の半分、損してるよー。

ベスタ族、まだ人間嫌いな子も多いよ？
でもメムラム様もエルモルも、頑張るから！

オドと言葉がいっつもばらばら。
それが、人間なんだね。
不思議だけど……
エルモル、嫌じゃないよ。

カジノに行こうってシロに誘われたけど
断っちゃった。
なんか、すごくズルなオドを感じたから……！

こんにちは、ベスタのエルモルだよ！
人間の事、分かりたいんだぁ。
エルモルの事も、教えてあげるから
これからよろしくね！

人間って難しいね。
でも、ちょっとだけ、分かったかも。
これからも、人間と分かりあいたいな。
きっと、たくさん、幸せになれるから！
241069:
あ、もしかしてこれから迷宮？
行く行く！私も連れてって！
たくさん戦って、たくさん功夫積んで……
少しでもアイツに近づかないとね！

今頃どこでなにしてるかな、おじいちゃん。
師範代の癖に、すぐフラッといなくなるんだ。
ふふ、困った人でしょ？
……帰ってきたら、また稽古つけてほしいなぁ。

異世界の猛者達との手合わせ、楽しみだなぁ！
……あ、いや、もちろん、仇討ちの腕を磨く
という意味でね！？

アイツが人の極北を目指すなら……
私もそこに辿り着いてみせる。
いいえ、さらにそれを超えてみせる！
首を洗って待ってなさいよ？

みんなと一緒に戦って、ご飯を食べて、旅をして。
こんなに楽しくていいのかな。仇討ちの旅なのに。
……うん、そうだね。
きっとこれも修行の内、だよね？

ねえねえシロ君！
ちょっと組手、付き合ってくれない？
新しい型、試してみたいの。
あなたの拳とどっちが速いか勝負しようよ。

私は武闘家フーラン！よろしくね。
アイツに勝つため……
私は強くならなきゃいけないの。
――いい修行相手いたら、紹介してね？

私、みんなのおかげで強くなれた。
でもそれ以上に、みんながいたから
楽しむ事を忘れなかったんだ。
だから……これからもよろしくね！
161135:
H-Happy Halloween... N-no, Hanabi told me to wear this, so...
P-please stop staring at me!
You taught Sir Vyron how to use smoke bombs, didn't you, Hanabi? Argh... I want to test the man's swordsmanship, not his escape skills!
Would you tell me more about the city of Shibuya? As a knight of the stars, I assure you I will surely defend that city as well!

Trick or treat! Give me some candy, or I'll take your blood instead!
...W-wait, you don't need to be so frightened!

Oooh... What happened to me? Whenever I look at the nape of Sir Alk's neck, I feel—
Wh-what? What am I talking about?!
A sparring match is a friendly contest—nothing more, nothing less. You have nothing to fear... Probably, at least.
For now, I'm happy to merely have you at my side. But when this fight is finally over... I'll have to prepare myself, won't I? Heh-heh.

Your blood... Give it to me! Or some candy—I suppose I could settle for that too.
Haha... Happy Halloween.
The feeling of becoming someone you don't yet understand is a little scary, yet also comforting... Perhaps I've become that person already.
131122:
This is a... wedding dress, isn't it?
...He'd look great in a tuxedo...
Huh? No, I'm not imagining anything!
Halloween or not, we're always on patrol. If you see a Guild Knight, say hello. If you're a good kid, you might even get some candy.
Stella, Addie. Thank you so much for the compliments. But praising me with those sparkling eyes... Well, I guess I can't say I don't like it.
In sickness and in health, may even death not divide us... I vow to move forward with you all... What? Am I overdoing it?
That Rinne girl seems really attached to Lilie. She might deny it were I to be direct, but... W-wait. Celtie? Alk? Did Celtie just...
I'm just waiting for things to calm down before I confess, and then... Then... Ohh, he's definitely going to turn me down...
I'm Keira, Vice Commander of the Guild Knights. Honestly... Why did I need to dress up for this... Huh?! C-C-Commander?!
Trick or treat! The good kids get candy. The bad kids... Well, perhaps a few tricks may be in order.
261077: Happy Halloween! Meowcome to the Adventurer's Guild.
Come on, cough up your treats. 3, 2, 1... And that's time! Guess it's a trick for you then. Ahahahaha!
...Maybe it's 'cause I'm in another world now, but it seriously feels like there might be, like, ghosts walking around.
That Mishima pisses me off! Can't believe she asked me to make sweets at home too! That's why I didn't want people knowing about it!
What hell is wrong with Nao—I mean, Nagihara's sis? Tohru's sis too! They just started acting like we're all friends out of nowhere.
Weak. Pathetic. Low-life trash. Is that what you wanted? No? Ugh, you're so freaking disgusting.
Trick or treat! I'm ready to see what Halloween's like in Palpebra! Huh? I have to work? You're not serious.
Like I said, I've got the brains and the looks. Being a full-fledged Guild employee will be easy. If you need anything from the Guild, I GUESS I can help.
111135: Tharros is getting stronger by the day! I'm always tinkering around and modifying him!
Hey, Stella. How about starting a golem club or something in Starview Village? I bet we could make something amazing!
The golem at Magia Fest was really impressive! While unfinished, it was packed with Luciada's dreams... So inspiring!
Maybe I'll set up my next workshop in Qualia City. Or maybe Yamato? Those Diviners seem interesting... Wahaha! The ideas don't stop...
Ha-hah! The boys just love me! I'm sorry, but the bewitching Dedalia can't give you her answer yet... Hah... J-just kidding! Seriously!
I can learn about more than golems at the Academy. I'm not quitting... but I also don't want to repeat the year... Luciada! Your notes, please!
Wahahaha! I'm Dedalia, head of the Golem Club at Voluntas Academy! You can call me Dida. I look forward to working together!
Maybe I was just feeling sorry for myself when I thought I was alone... Thanks, you guys! Don't go anywhere—I love you all! Wahaha!
141123: What do I reflect with my masters gone? Manifesting in this form again after so long... Forgive me. I should not be pondering this.
I feel as if I spent a long time dreaming after Orochi was defeated... I saw a sad child and a crying one, but I could do nothing to help.
Murakumo has changed much. I thought for certain that he had turned into a vengeful spirit like I had.
Not all reflections are of the truth, nor are they false... Humans truly are complicated.
Hehe... I am a mirror capable of reflecting any form. Cute, cool, dark... Whatever you desire.
Sir Yakumo... Lord Yakumo... Mister Yakumo... Just Yakumo? Oh, your expression softened. Is that what you prefer?
Manoka, spirit of the mirror, at your service. What do you desire of me?
I am a mirror, who but reflects my master's wishes. However... Hehe, I now have wishes of my own.
121135: Fear not. I ain't plottin' anything. Frightening folk have their eyes on me, after all... Hahaha. That's a fine expression yer wearin'...
You want to hear about me pirate days, do ye? You'd best be givin' that up, for both our sakes... Savvy?
You want me to use me for somethin'? If that be true... then buy me a drink. Cheap rum, fancy wine, whatever. That's all I need...

The Crimson Blades... Aye, the ones responsible for Zegra's death?
...I'm not fond of folks takin' what be mine to take.

Show mercy—dead men be of no use to anybody. Heh-heh. Hahaha! 
...Laugh, would you? It be a joke.
I told you to follow me, and that means you be needin' to pull yer weight. Hahaha... I'm bein' deadly serious here.
I'm Zelimir. Hahaha... You've crossed fates with a filthy bilge rat, haven't ye? Well, I hope we'll be formin' a fine partnership all the same.
Whether we be sailin' to the end of the seas or the end of universe, nobody's goin' to stop movin' on my watch. I trust that you understand...
151123: On my life and my pride! As long as my holy sword shines, I will never surrender—Ah?! Hey! Don't take my sword while I'm still talking!
Ahhh... I did the embarrassing pose and catchphrase again... Ugh... I need to go find a hole to hide in...
Please don't tell Father and Mother that I'm an adventurer. If they knew I was traveling around with a sword like this, I think they'd faint.
Let me help you with shopping, Stella! This sword makes me really strong... Oh, but stop me if I start posing or saying something weird.
I'm so glad we all met—I don't think I could've kept adventuring if I was alone... Well, maybe with a disguise? ...Hey! Don't laugh!
Come on, Nimbus! Don't make me draw my sword out in public! I-I need to be mentally prepared for that!
I am Rinoa, Righteous Swordswoman! I will right the world's wrongs with my blade! Come, adventur—hey! G-gimme the sword back!
I don't know this sword's origin, but it came to me exactly when I needed it. I was given the chance to do this... So I'll keep doing my best!
131116: ...Heh... Ahahaha... I am the ruler of the abyssal night and exalted noble of... Ugh. Why do vampires have to be so long-winded?
I wonder what other vampires are like. I wonder if they dislike garlic, too... Huh? They don't like crosses or silverware, either? What's that about?
I have a lot of fun chatting with everyone, but my head starts spinning when I'm alone. Mmm... I wish I could speak more confidently!
The world's full of all kinds of people... Hey, Stella? Could you tell me about your adventures? I wanna know more about you all!
I've got a present for you, Yuki! It's a cream that prevents sunburns and makes your skin shine! I picked it out with Nao!
I-it might be a good idea to dry sucking blood, at least once... But whose blood—feh?! N-n-no, I w-wasn't saying anything!
Heh-heh-heh-heh... B-behold, the abyssal night! I-I am... Wait, that's wrong. What was my intro line again?!
Heh-heh-heh... I am the vampire Lumira. Let us live through the eternal night together... H-hey, I said it! I said the line pretty good this time, right?!
231093: I had a chance to hear Dia's singing and Lyra's violin playing. Their music moved me... Starting tomorrow, we're practicing TWICE as hard!
"If you're going to do something, you better have fun"? No, it should be "If you're going to do something, you better have fun AND come out on top."
Impossible missions? I live for them. Nobody ever got better only getting thrown softballs. That being said, I'm still going to succeed!
That airhead Drum Major is skipping practice AGAIN! Alk, I can tell by your face that you know her whereabouts—tell me at once, or else!
Eureka! I have a new off-world business idea! But I won't show my hand quite yet. When the time comes, I'll need YOUR help to get it done.
Why must you all continue to call me "Elsie"? It's far too familiar for one of my stature! ...I don't hate it though.
I am Eloise Magento, the ace of Voluntas Academy's Marching Band! One day, I will be at the TOP of Palpebra's economy! It's a pleasure to meet you.
It's impossible to get bored around you guys. Fine then, let us do our best to reach the pinnacle of FUN together!
111129: I don't know of any other lionfolk. For my whole life, my people have been scattered. I thought I was the last member before I found Teo.
Shuilong? ...Oh, that dog woman. She's a terrifying sort of person, but with the right contract—what? You're saying those ears were fake?!
My world used to be so small, but here... Gazing into the sky... Are those all worlds up there? I can barely comprehend that...
Teo... You and I are not the same. You go your way, and I'll... What's that expression for? ...You, Whitetail! Why do you laugh?!
I don't need any alcohol. It's not because I'm too weak for it, but I hate not being able to think straight... And my head hurts afterward...
...Books aren't bad. I read whenever I could when I was a child. Heroic tales and such, I suppose... Would you like to read one of them?
I am Magnos... and I'm nothing but an outlaw now. You're cursing me in your heart, aren't you? Don't worry... So am I.
I don't know whether I'm right or wrong. However... Even if I'm lost, I'm determined to keep moving forward.
161129: Oh, Sho! You're as dreamy today as ever... Meeting here like this must be fate...
I get friends are important, but... it's not fair that Nova got to spend 6 hours and 23 minutes more with Sho last week than me…
Everyone in Starview is so kind... Marianne taught me how to sneak into places, and Shion sells me all the info I want. I love it here.
My mom gets along really well with my dad. Thanks to her, I know how important it is to be devoted! If only she could've given birth to me...
Paradise Isle? Sho was in a swimsuit?! Why didn't you invite me?! Turn back time and let me tag along!
Oh, Sho... I love you... I want to lock you up and keep you all to myself... You'll never have to worry about anything or anyone ever again!
Hi, I'm Yukariko Kuguri. Me and Sho are friends for now, but we'll get married someday. You can call me Yukari if you want.
Sho really is something else... He doesn't let anything bother him, not even destiny... I knew he was the one for me.
241063: Kugui told me I should name my shikigami, but... How about Bigs and Smalls? Or maybe Zendo and Myodo?
The Abyss, the Void... I think it'll all make more sense to me if I paint it!
I should probably be a little more scared of how dangerous this is, but honestly? I'm mostly happy to understand Kugui better than before.
Hmngh... So it's "nothingness" but also "the potential to be anything"? So what, do I leave my paper completely blank? Ahaha.
The five elements means everything moves in a circle... I feel like Master drew something like that before. What was it...
Ugh, I'm sick of studying! Kugui, I wanna go paint that one shrine. Can we sneak out? Breaks are important, you know!
Ryouki Kochi here! Kugui and me will be in your care! By the way, do you mind if I paint you right now?
I'm probably getting ahead of myself, but... I just know that I'll be able to paint everything one day!
111007: My convictions allow me to wield this blade. But now those convictions have been shaken. Perhaps by accompanying you, I can find them anew.
You never cease to surprise me. No, I am being sincere. You perceive things so differently than I. Simply astonishing.
I have known victory for war and earned merit for leadership. But my hobbies? Hmm... Does polishing the royal armory count? Ah, that's not a hobby?
Even absent of royal decree, one must behave in a manner that respects the throne. That is how you demonstrate proper loyalty.
I have learned some local games. Though I am still an amateur, this helmet bestows one with a surprisingly good poker face.
I am Rolf Zahn, the Black Wolf. I have come to lend you my sword. Please use it well.
A sword tempered with bone, bathed in blood... I brandish it now in hopes of finding purification. From this point forward, I am your liege.
251008: Take a look at this! You're going to love it!
When I'm surrounded by cheers of joy and laughter, I'm invincible!
It's my dream to build a theater in Palpebra someday! I'm always looking for new members for my troupe.
It's okay to cry when you're sad. But when you really want to smile... you can call on me anytime!
Hmm... What should I do for my next show? Now, that's a problem trickier than the magic itself.
It might be a good idea to build a theater in Starview Village, huh? That way, I can bring brilliant dreams to everybody in that world, too!
Ladies and gentlemen! The curtains are up, and the magic's about to start!
Next time, I'm thinking of doing a show where I dance in sync with the magic! Sounds great, right? You won't want to miss it!
241008: Being a ninja stinks! If you mess up, they kick you out. Plus, you barely get any time off, and the pay is the worst!
Aaaaagh! O-out of the way— *crash* OW! How many times does that make? I don't want to fall down anymore...
This place is so comfortable that I could just stay here forever and ever.
Have I been any use to you? I just keep messing up, and I don't feel like I've gotten any better. If I don't get it together, there's really no hope left for me.
That's it! I need a drink! I'm back off the wagon! I quit ages ago, but the heck with it! I can't stand it any longer!
Hello! I-I guess it's no use trying to stay anonymous. My name is Suzuka. I'm not the sharpest shuriken around, but... thanks for having me!
I've surprised even myself with how much stronger I've gotten! I'm gonna keep getting stronger so more people can depend on me.
131005: An unknown foe in an unfamiliar world, eh? Bring it on. That's exactly what I need to get stronger.
Human or monster, it doesn't make any difference. I'll demolish anybody who stands in my way.
I'm just getting started! I'll get even faster, even stronger! I won't rest until my lightning-quick fists can destroy anyone!
After you're done with the Lord of Shadow, you're going to have a bout against me, Hero of Legend. You promised!
Stella, don't widen your stance. You lose power like that. That being said, it is nice to see you apply some technique to your morning stretches.

Dia's voice and Sonia's dancing... Those two are amazing! ...Ah! I think I just got a great idea for my next performance!

*sigh* I don't get Love sometimes... She tells me to have fun, then gets mad when I hang out with others... Is she jealous? No way, right?

161123: Th-this swimsuit doesn't look so good on me after all, does it... I can feel everyone staring...

I-I just recite from a script when I'm onstage! B-but I do... occasionally ad-lib...

233013: I ended up going to that horror attraction with Pythica and the others! It was... really scary! My throat hurts from screaming so much...
Food in the Endless Blue is fascinating—there's so many yakisoba flavors! Salt, sauce, seafood... What's next? Monster meat?

Zantetsu sure is an interesting guy.... He's so sincere—and strong too! Though we're totally different, I feel like he and I are kindred spirits.

111123: Is it that weird for me to wear an apron? I thought people normally wear stuff over their swimsuits.
Sleep all I want, play all I want, eat all I want... I love researching monsters, but vacations are pretty nice too!
Mmm, so good! Sitting down at a restaurant is nice, but so is eating junk food from a food stall after playing at the beach all day!
What makes me happiest is seeing the people I love enjoying my cooking...

141117: I'm going to do it... I'm going to make this vacation truly one to remember! This is the summer where I become a man, for real!

221066: Hehe, my swimsuit's super cute, right? I also borrowed this life preserver from the Fellowship! Safety first!
Mmm, this super-special berry-flavor shaved ice is amazing! Ngh?! Ahhh, brain freeze!

131098: I don't consider myself betrayed. As one of the things that go bump in the night, such is my fate.

Name's Clarita. I'm an operator for PBC's hero department. If you need any intel or help with tech, just say the word.

I'm looking for research assistants.

361008: The food you made last time was so good, Alk! I'm quite the gourmand, so you've gotta cook for me again sometime!
Monsters can actually be kinda cute once you get to know them, so they're nothing to be afraid of!
*sigh* It sure would be nice to go to the store or go out shopping by myself for a change, you know?
I started training up to get stronger, just like all of you guys. Hey, feel free to come train with me next time!

H-Hello! I'm Nochel! 
I'll do my best to keep up with you!
It's only because of all of you that I've been able to come into my own like this! I can't thank you enough! You guys are the best!
161099: Hmm... I wonder if my previous partners would be horrified to learn of my prince act. Or would they laugh? I am not sure which I would prefer.
Everyone has dreams—wishes that reach beyond the bounds of the world. I merely aid my partners in breaching those bounds.
"Tonight, my time is all yours. Leave yourself in my care..." After that, my partner, you fix your target with a piercing gaze and strike. Simple, yes?
I do think I did my partner a disservice... But I also did him a service at the same time. Hahaha, I truly have become a mischievous spirit.
I am not a person. We may partner up, but eventually we will part. If you accept those terms, then... shall we?
I am but an old soul. I said it before, did I not? I simply have more experience than the rest of you.
I am Murakumo—blade and spirit. Though I find it ill-fitting for one such as I to act in this manner, I shall do what I must. Watch as I strike.
How have you found my services? I shall continue to accompany you, for as far and as long as you wish!
141099: I have acquired stable income and am no longer... a dependent. Do not worry, I will make today a day you never forget.
Lucia and the others gave me chocolate. They made it themselves, as well. Alk... Do you think I, too am capable of such a task?
Clothes are... intriguing. They vary so greatly in form and fabric. Rams and the others seemed interested in them... But Vagner seemed upset.
I've been having my back scratched with a steel rake recently. Stella has been helping the other three do it, too. They all seem... amused.
Did I learn about the Lucia and the others to better understand humans... or the other way around? I... suppose it doesn't matter which came first.
Lucia, Aileen, Mertina. I heard that Inaho and Amelia prepared new outfits for you as well. They called them "wedding dresses"... Oh? What's wrong?
Happy White Fest... Take my hand. We have an evening to enjoy together.
I may be a dragon, however... I wish to fight beside you... And beside you I shall remain. I swear this to you!
251065: The stronger I get, the more people I can protect. I feel like I'm making a difference working this job.
3MM stands for 3 Minute Militia. It means we guarantee we'll arrive within 3 minutes of your call. Interested in our free 1-month trial, by any chance?
Being aware of local budget restaurants provides me a strategic advantage. Food knowledge is power, after all. I'm kidding—it's just a hobby.
I want to become like those heroes I used to read about—someone who defends the people dear to her. What about you? What are your dreams?
Don't worry, I'll protect Starview's secrets. Even if it means having to lie to my company. Heh, that sounds like something a hero would say.
You've got a beautiful sky and all sorts of people here... Shame about the lack of budget AdTaste shops, but... I guess I can look past that.
Squad commander Carbina here, representing 3MM Security. In a bind? Call us and we'll be there in under 3 minutes. Try our services today!
My rifle protects those who are dear to me. But a gun alone isn't enough. I need to get stronger, faster, braver. I'd like to keep training by your side.
121105: I do what I wish, now that there is no longer a target on my back. It's time to live life to the fullest.
Going by age since rebirth, I'm technically older than Vagner. He should really learn how to respect his elders...
It's such a pain, taking care of children. They're always asking for new things to play with, like a... "see-saw"? What is that?
Amelia, this hair accessory would look good on you. Stella... That knitted sweater is nice, but what about trying on this one-piece dress?
Oh, Rams, you are absolutely beautiful today as well! ...What, Alk? If you have something to say, then say it.
Well, former Champion. What kind of journey have you been on with these children? What? I feel like chatting now, that's all.
Anbach. Dragon. I live the way I want... So I have no obligation to help you.
You wish to defy fate? All right. Do what you want. But don't you dare lose—not when you have my strength backing you.
131092: My body was outfitted with illegal neural modifications. Actually, I can hear and see so much it's just straight-up annoying!
I wonder if this body is good for more than combat? Maybe I could play in a cyber-rock band? Probably wouldn't even need an instrument...
You gotta take things seriously sometimes, right? If you wanna be your best, you've gotta put in the work to really know yourself!

I've tried all kinds of things to understand myself, but... What am I?
Well, whatever. As long as I'm with you guys, I'm happy!
Wanna go hang out in Qualia City? I heard we can take care of our chores and jobs later! You only get to be young once, so I wanna enjoy it!
I've made some growth, don't you think? No, I don't mean in terms of strength, but like... As a person. I look more... dignified or something, right?
Ultimate Weapon Techtus is here to throw down! I wish they would've said something like that... Huh? N-no, I wasn't expecting them to!
Body readjustments complete! I look a little different now, but... Oh, whatever. I've got friends here now, and that's what matters!
141093: I've got an assignment due tomorrow, and meeting logs to transcribe. OH, and I need to buy Kaleidoscope guidebooks! Gah, there's so little time!
Whether it's adventuring or studying, if you're going to do something, you better have fun! The same goes for club activities, of course!
Stella is so cute... I wish she would just transfer to our school! Oh, we'd have so much fun together!
What kind of arrangement should I go with for our next performance? I can't just go with something on a whim again, Elsie will get mad.
Alk, look at all this homework Professor Nicola gave me! Gah, I guess it's my fault for that little magical mishap the other day, huh...
Everyone's got their own idea of fun... but we'll come together as a band and find harmony together! That's what making music is all about!
I'm Marchella, the drum major of Voluntas Arcane Arts Academy's famous marching band! Remember—the key is to have tons of FUN!
I'm sure I haven't seen the end of my worries, but... that's okay! I have friends who will help me out—and I'll keep doing my best too, of course!
111099: I'm fine with the distance between us as is. Any closer, and things might get awkward.
Wh-what?! I can't help following Alk around with my eyes, okay? I like him! Let me have this much!
I guess falling in love is the same no matter what world you're from. Isn't that kind of amazing?
I was okay with waiting, but now I see that was a mistake. Alk is WAY too popular! Not that I don't get it, but still! Come on!
Hopefully the chocolate turned out okay... I learned some basic skills during survival training, but maybe I'll start practicing cooking for real.
Hehe... So Alk really was happy to get chocolate from me... Hehehe!
A girl's gotta be stylish AND cute for Valentine's Day, especially when she's the heir to House Felder. Watch out world—here I come!
Um, here... I m-made this chocolate just for you! Because I like you! You'll... accept it, yeah?
151087: What is love? Ugh, I don't get it! What's love got to do with me? Why am I the Valentine's Day idol?!
So I need chocolates for Stella, Nimbus, Light... Themis and the president too... Oh, and Alk. I'll get him some cheap, no-name brand stuff.
Pulling out my gun on a lovers' quarrel wasn't on my list of things I thought I'd do today... Ugh, Valentine's is way too busy.
Am I seriously just a sucker for a pretty face? Reticia and Stella are pretty, but I'm not into them... Wait... AM I? Oh god.
When it comes to love, watching is better than participating. I just can't do it! It's not for me! Well, not right now, anyway.
This body came from someone Regis knows, right? Is it the person who did Dia and Sera's frames? Just who could they be...
Wayward Heart Nate is here to help YOU learn what it means to LOVE—but for a limited time only! ...Gah, I suck at this.
I'm just doing the same thing I always was: running away from my own humiliation by protecting others and helping them shine. Could be worse.
231075: Oh man... Repairing other-world technology is seriously going to take some studying. Even if it takes my whole life, I'll master this!
Oh, are you going out? I'll go with you! I don't want to miss even a single opportunity to repair something, you know?
Ah, I feel so refreshed! No matter how busy you get, there's nothing like a hot shower after work!
Back then, I made up my mind. I decided to devote my whole life to repairing! No half measures, if you're gonna do something, go all out!
My prize for finishing up this job? Getting started with the NEXT job, of course! And then the one after that! It's an endless happy loop!
Say, what do you think the World Flipper is powered by? Magic? Some sort of machinery? Could I take it apart?! No? Aw.
The name's Elegia! If you've got something that needs repairing, I'm the one to call! Seriously, I'll come running. Rain or shine, I'm there!
The more I improve my skills, the more I want to reach for the top! But I'm not quite there yet. I've still gotta work my BUTT off!
243019: I'm getting used to being called a "pain in the butt" at this point... But I don't think I would ever recover if Stella started saying it too.
My healing magic used to require physical touch, but not anymore. Unless it's Will, I still have to touch him—er, forget I said that!
If it's sweets you want, just leave it to me! I work with my parents at a confectionery, and I can help you make just about anything!

I'm making sweets with my friends. Nate looks like she's having fun... Oh! Stella, wait! It'll explode if you—
AH!

Hah... We really did it...
...Huh?! N-no, not that! What?! Nothing happened!
I think I'll always be a little hesitant, and always be a little scared... But even still, I don't wanna stop telling Will how much I love him.
Thanks, everyone... Will and I got together thanks to all your encouragement! Let me know if there's anything I can ever help you with, okay?

Happy Valentine's! 
Heh, were you surprised? I made this chocolate just for you! I hope you like it...
121099: My mom and my teacher always told me: when a creepy stranger talks to you, ring the Siren Amulet right away!
I'll have you know I'm very good with my studies! I often tutor Mimi and Misogi.
My favorite food? That would be the cupcakes my mom always used to make!
When I first got stranded on this world, I was really worried... But after meeting Alk and the others, I feel much better.
I know it's not good to be picky, but... I just can't stand the taste of bell peppers!
Mimi and Misogi are my dear friends. Our guild is technically not official, but once we're older, we'll definitely go on more adventures!

Hello, I'm Kyoka.
W-wait... You aren't one of those suspicious creeps, are you?!
I want to enjoy exploring these different worlds, just like Mimi and Misogi. And of course, I never want to stop studying and learning!
111093: C'mon, let's go exploring! Who knows what could be out there in this new world!
Hehe, there's no getting away from my pranks! Hope you're ready!
I wanna help people in trouble, but people who are doing a little TOO well could probably use a prank or two, you know?
Explorer Misogi is ready to head out! What kinda world are we gonna check out today, I wonder?

All powered up! I can handle even crazier expeditions now, so I'll let you check out my best prank as my way of saying thanks!
141087: Whaa? Can I still... find my way home? Well, I've already made new friends, so I've gotta do my best with what I've got!
Ah! That kitty's in trouble! I'm gonna go help it out!
Kyoka, Misogi, and I are all part of the same guild! I'm the oldest, so I've gotta take my job seriously!
Are you going out on an adventure, Alk? Then let me help! You can count on me to have your back!
I'm going out with Kyoka and Misogi today! Oooh, I just can't wait!
Light's a Champion, huh! He's tiny like me, but he's still so amazing! I've gotta do my best, too!
Let's do a great job together! You don't need to worry, 'cause Mimi's gonna keep you safe!
Hehe, we've made so many new friends in Starview Village! I can't wait for all of us to go on more amazing adventures together!
121093: I was really surprised when Gaiger first approached me. I knew what that meant, but... I'm sorry. I can't be an idol anymore...

Wherever Cosmic Idols shine, there will always be shadows waiting... That's why I joined the CIPD—to protect the light of the idols!
Noenne and Beaucy reminded me what it means to be an idol. I'm grateful, but I won't lose to them in the BRASS!
I'm really sorry for all the trouble, Mia! But... Gosh... You did such a good job. Mama...
...Hehe, back then, I was miserable as an idol, but now? Every day is so much fun! Come on, Gaiger—let's do our best!
Hey, there! I'm Torietta, Cosmic investigator from the CIPD! Am I an idol? Er, I, uh... Pwease don't ask... Waahhh!
Thanks to Gaiger and everyone, I was able to take a step forward... Now I'm proud to say I'm a member of Retryger! Get ready to watch me shine!
151081: Lilian made this outfit for me at the request of the merchant's guild. Hehe, I love how it turned out!

Wow, freshly-made mochi tastes wonderful!
...Huh? Wait, really? People choke on this stuff?!
I'm starting to understand that my prayers aren't bound to the Church of Farlana... Heh. Their saint can't go around thinking like that, can she?
Ahhh... Kotatsu are wonderful! I'd love to have one back at the church... Wonder if I could get one into my room somehow?
O Stars, we thank you for the arrival of the new year. Light up the path of... Hey, you. I'm not faking the whole saint thing. Please pay attention!
This mochi is delicious! Nothing beats ringing in the new year with plenty of eating and snoozing! Let's take it reeeal slow, guys!
161093: Pushing boundaries is what I do. Besides, you like it when I go a little wild, don't you?
Happy New Year! I'm here to lavish my little sweetings with whatever they want, so don't be shy! Tell me what you desire.
Lay out your bets... Just kidding. I may have gotten a little too into our excursion the other day.
Even with the star-felling blade in hand, Alk chooses his own way forward. That's why I'm sure he won't lose.
We can get up to as much mischief as you want, Lilith. Just don't tell Light.
Light was absolutely adorable when he first began his journey. He always clung to me—oh here he comes. Time for me to go!
Happy New Year. Shall we head off somewhere... and have ourselves a little mischief?
When one hand lets go, there's always a chance to grab onto another... If only I'd realized this sooner. Oh, the stars are so beautiful...
211056: It's already a new year, huh? Being a celebrity while also adventuring with you guys in so many worlds... Well, time really flies.
New Year's cuisine just can't be beat! I ate so much... But that's all the more reason to go adventuring, right? Hope you're ready for a workout, Alk!
This New Year's outfit is great, right? I got it at work. I think Trista complimented it, but... For some reason, my memory's a little fuzzy...
I've still got so much I need to achieve, but I'll never stop trying to be the best I can be. I'll become the Levy Gracia everyone believes I am!
You're adorable, you know that? Show me that face again, beautiful... Those eyes, they're... Wait, no! I'm doing it again!
My New Year's resolution is to be "indomitable." I heard that word in Yamato... Don't you think it describes us perfectly?
Happy New Year! It looks like it'll be another busy year, but it'll be a little easier with me around. Can't wait for more adventures!
I did my best to make the most of last year, but I know I can do more. You guys feel the same way, right? So let's give it our all, together!
231069: Wearing fancy duds like these really puts me in a good mood! I'm gonna make the most of this new year!
I get so many requests for a sequel to The Legend of Whitetail! I wonder how much cash I could make if I published it in other worlds?
I love letting others know that I'm wishing them all the best when I say Happy New Year!
It was just Al and I at first, but so many new folks have joined us already. Looks like we've got another all-nighter tonight!

Ahhh... This kotatsu thing is the best... 
The catfolk weren't ready for tech like this...
I'm Claudius Navelle, representing the catfolk. I would like to wish you all a Happy New Year. Heh. Was that too formal?

Happy New Year, everyone! 
Let's make this year the raddest one yet!
There are still problems we can't solve and plenty of issues cropping up every day. But step by step, we gotta move forward. Happy New Year!
121087: Three reports due in three days. A fraud investigation with the Guild Knights tomorrow, plus that material gathering... All right, no problem.
I had this outfit custom-made for the party by Lilian. It's tough and lightweight, and I've taken quite the liking to it.
A lot of my students have been asking me to attend the party with them. I appreciate the sentiment, but... that simply wouldn't be appropriate.
My mentor is both skilled and a man of character, but he demands so much of his students. I won't comment on my personal experience...
Alk, could you add Omurice to Starview Village's holiday cuisine? It's a request from the Commander.
Nimbus won't ask me to drink with him. Something about the way I drink being too "fancy"... Surely that's not the case?
This outfit was custom-made for the holidays, but what do you think? Looks pretty nice, does it not?
Happy holidays. Even if it's only for this moment, I'm happy to be together with you. I wish nothing but the best for your life.
141081: If you take a nap on the grass, a kitty will come and snuggle up next to you. So soft and fluffy...
I don't think I've ever worn something quite like this, but... Hehe, I think I like it.
Sneaking around at night to leave presents undetected... Did they ask me to play Santa because I was in a special forces unit?!
Whenever a child thanks me for giving them a cake, I thank them back. Strange, isn't it?
Doing something special for someone else is a wonderful thing. I'm so glad I got to play the role of Santa...
Everyone helped me out this holiday season, and I got to see so many bright smiles as a result. What a blast!
H-happy holidays... Santa Claus is here... Um, h-here... Have some cake. Th-this is so embarrassing...
When it comes to the holidays, parents and children smiling together is what matters most to me... I'll do my best to help make that happen!
251059: Feast your eyes on me now! Now THAT'S a fiendish getup, don't you think? If only I could give you the best present of all—a visit in your dreams!
Is self-restraint really all it's cracked up to be? I mean, there are tons of people who want to see your wild side! Who, you ask? I wonder... Hehe.
This outfit's too revealing? You don't say. It's almost like I intended it to be that way!
If you strip away every single lie in this world, what would be left over? Probably a big ol' empty page. The truth is what you make it, I say!
Happy Holidays! You don't remember Santa having horns and being a fiend? No problem—I'm here to bring happiness to every kid around!
Why tease people? Because it's fun, of course! Ah-HAH! Seeing those looks on people's faces is just pure bliss!
Happy Holidays! This year, Santa's down to clown around! Ah-HAH! I wonder what kind of present you're hoping for?
I'm Santa's little helper—I came from the world with a starless sky just to bring you joy! Don't forget me even after you wake up, all right?
211050: Everyone in the Fellowship of Floof must have animal ears! I don't know why, but apparently it's our captain's orders...
Ahh, there's so much to study... But the vice captain's counting on me! I have to keep going!
There are a lot of elderly folk in my hometown. I used to give them shoulder massages... I hope they're doing well.
Guess what? I was able to get blood from a thin-veined patient without a hitch! It's all thanks to my coworker for teaching me how!
*sigh* Light, how come you're so soft and fluffy? I could cuddle you forever...
Oh, no you don't. Alk! Stella! I can see how tired you are! It's time for some hugs and shoulder massages!
Hey, hey, it's the Fellowship of Floof's newest nurse Pythica, at your service! I'll be your medic and your frontline backup!
I can do anything as long as it's to make someone happy and healthy! That includes Alk and the others too!
131086: *sigh* Almost died a buncha times, and I STILL ended up having to do training... I knew it was too good to be true.
Arum! Alice! Did you two doodle on my face?! What? Then it was you! Lou! Sven! No? It was Nick?! Why, I oughta...
Heh, looks like Stella'll be all right. Guess I shouldn't be too worried about her standing in the frontlines.
Barrek? Yeah, I only gotta pay him back once I'm stronger than the champion you once were, Light. Muscleheads like him are so demanding...
I grew up not knowing other beastfolk, y'know? That's why I'm not that into them. But don't you dare tell that to you-know-who...
I take back what I said before, Alk. You're just as crazy as the rest. That's why I gotta catch up if I wanna keep up!
I got no choice but to get stronger if my allies and enemies are crazy strong. So yeah, push me to the verge of death. I can take it.
I used to think I didn't need my claws and fangs, but now? If I'm gonna tag along, then I'll need every advantage I can get!
121081: If you're going out on an adventure, take me with you. A researcher of the Academy needs to do some fieldwork every now and again!

Reylas, Nicola, Malviola, and Leleni... I've been helped by so many wonderful people. One day I'll have to return the favor.
Hehe... Oh, whatever shall I do with this love letter? A student from my class gave it to me. But... How should I handle this situation?!
Take the idea of your fate and smash it into tiny pieces. You shattered the ice covering Rei's and my world, and now it's our turn.
The world was unkind to us, but we had each other, and that was enough then. But now? Well, a sociable life isn't so bad, is it?
Freezing and shattering fate itself, it is I, Professor Cipher, the Magnificent Witch of the Academy! I look forward to our future adventures!
I'm not cut out to be a teacher, honestly. But somehow, pushing myself to be one isn't so bad either. Perhaps I like it here...
261071: Lots more people in Starview these days, huh? Which is good for me! Love all the new info! I wonder what I should look into next.
Now that I can sense them, lingering emotions are everywhere. Even now, behind you... Er, never mind. Forget I said anything!
If only this outfit was easier to move around in... Ah! Adjudicus?! No, no, I wasn't complaining! You must've misheard!
Hey, Stella, could I have a peek at that observation diary of yours? I bet there's some juicy info in there that'll sell for a lot to the right people...
You want to know about me? Then you better shell out some money! You don't seriously think one gold Denarius is enough, right?
Hey, Alk! Have I got some news for you! Ahaha, don't give me that look! I promise it's not bad news!
*sigh* What to do... I can't believe I got cursed... Well, since I can't do anything about it, I'll just have to get what I can out of it!
You can count on my help on occasion. Why? Isn't it obvious? We're friends, aren't we!
111087: I always get my hands on what I want. Why? Because I never give up!
Woo-hoo! What do you think of my new look? I remember dreaming of something like this when I was a kid.
Yup, that's it. My next stop is space! I'll get a bigger ship—one that fires lasers and has smaller ships attached to it! Surely Qualia City can do that?
Alk really let me and Amelia have it... I'll admit it, we went too far. I better be more careful from now on...
You know, Stella, you're the whole reason I'm able to visit all these cool worlds. You weren't wrong to connect them. I'll prove it to you!
I'm sure Yukko, Nami, and Taichi are all living happy lives! But... Mom probably cried a bunch... I really was a terrible daughter.
Space Pirate Marina, at your service! Haha, not that I've been to space yet. But I'd like to go someday!
Hey, we've saved plenty of worlds along the way, so you don't need to carry all that burden... But you still will, huh? All right, then I'll just have to help!
161087: My friends at the Diviners' Commission picked this out for me. I got to try on so many outfits... It was so much fun!
There are all kinds of people out there, and still so many things for me to learn. I'm glad I chose to study with the Commission.
No, I'm not avoiding the green peas! I'm just... practicing with my chopsticks! Grr, do I really have to eat these?
What if worlds are just layered on top of each other? And if darkness falls across them all, I can use it to... Hmm, no, I still don't understand!

*yawn* I stayed up too late...
Heh-heh... I'm a pretty rebellious kid, aren't I?
I've met so many people here, made a lot of friends... and a promise—to become the best mage ever!
Ta-da! I'm Couette, and I'm a new student with the Diviners' Commission. Hehe, it feels just like going to school—I'm so excited.
I feel like I've learned something about myself. But I can't stop now! I just have to keep going and going, no matter what!
131080: I don't know what you guys are thinking, but if you prove useful to me, I'll prove useful to you...
