I'm a bit of a sore loser. Even if you knock me down, I'll get back up... Nimbus, spar with me.
That Inori kid's a real pain, huh...
My brother was trash, but there was a time where—no... Forget I said anything.
The name's Tohru Sengaku. Intros aren't my style. Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it.
I'm taking advantage of you, so make sure you're taking advantage of me, okay? I don't like owing people.
111081: My shots never miss, and Rufo's prey never escapes.

...I'll never forgive the bastard that took Rufo from me...
The next time we meet will be the last.
Have you seen this cat? It got separated from a girl named Alice. The two of them must be really sad... So let's go find the kitty.

Alk, Stella. You going shopping?
...I'll come too. I can help carry stuff, okay?
Nimbus has pretty broad shoulders, huh... Huh? No, I'm not jealous! I'll be hitting a growth spurt any day now!
Rufo and I slept in the same bed when he was still alive. I'm still not used to sleeping alone... But I think I'm getting a little better with it.
My name's Ryunon, and I'm searching for the owner of this gun. If you find any clues... Please. You have to tell me.
I can't lose anyone precious to me ever again... I'll do everything I can to keep you all safe!
121075: I see you eyeing the Blaue Fraxis... Just say the word if you ever want to climb on board—I'd be happy to show you around!
Rain's a good kid—he's as serious as he is ambitious. Can't wait to see everything he accomplishes!
Some Floats have a mafia presence, so don't let your guard down... Not that they would pose much of a problem for you.
How I met Marina, eh? Heh... We'd need a starry sky and a few drinks before I could tell you about that.
It's sad that we'll never know for sure how our lives will impact the distant future... But I know that we're making a change for the better!
I'd do anything for a meal cooked by Alk... Then again, Nimbus fries a good lizard... Let's see if I can get them both to cook for me tonight!
I'm Captain Fraxis of the Gaean Navy! My warship keeps these waters safe, and her name is the Blaue Fraxis. You better not forget it!
There's always something getting in my way, but that's no reason to give up. After all, I've got the best crew a captain could ask for!
261065: Just leave me alone. Nothing matters—not when I have nothing left...
That damn tiger made fun of me again... Just seeing his face is enough to piss me off!
Why should I care about Aegis? I wasn't friends with any of those stupid, useless morons. The only one that mattered was Tohru...
*pants* Why the hell... is there a weird mushroom following me around? It wants to play? Yeah, right, I'm not buying that. Get rid of it already!
My parents? I don't know. They're probably asleep, ignorant of everything going on in the real world.
...Yeah, it pisses me off that my enemies took pity on me and let me into their nice, clean town. I hate them with all my being—I really do.
Are you free tomorrow? Luik took a liking to you and wants to hang out, so if you're willing... What? Me, jealous?! Don't be stupid!
...I'm Ryuichi Kageoka—not your friend. Not your ally. Don't give me that pity crap either. I might actually throw up.
Fine, I'll lend you some of my power... Pisses me off that I'm in your debt anyway.
131004: All the world's a stage, and I'm playing the leading role! I mean, isn't it more fun to think of it that way?
I got this bow from the Kaleidoscope. It's a magical bow that I can whip out anytime, anywhere. Well, maybe not while in bed.
This town is so wonderful! The lighting, the staging, the turf. It's a real high-budget production! It's perfect for me!
It's a happy moment when you're acknowledged by the upper crust—especially as the main star of this show!
You've got MY stamp of approval, so puff out your chest and be proud! Good. Just like that!
Surprise! It's me! Thank your lucky stars! 'Cause I'll be lending you my talent from here on out! You'd better save a good role for me!
You're even more amazing than I imagined... I'd better step my game up a notch. Can't have you stealing my spotlight, after all!
241007: Hey, adventurers are pretty amazin', huh? They just go! You gotta respect that drive.
I practice my swordsmanship single day. How's about we go a round?
I love these apple things. They're so crunchy and sweet. I can't get enough of 'em!
Wahoo! Hey, Alk! Let's head into the Kaleidoscope!
Whoa... What's with Nimbus? Why's he so steamin' mad at me?
Yahoo! Lou, proud canid warrior, at your service! Pleased to meet you!
Am I finally a great warrior? This means I can really protect y'all now! You don't have to worry 'bout a thing anymore!
211008: Have you read my books? The recent ones are kinda meh, but the first one I put out? Not too shabby.
Swordplay's about being fast and precise. Once you've mastered the basics, then it's time to get creative!
Look, adventuring isn't about looking cool or earning points. It's about survival. Safety first, right?
Today, I have a photoshoot and talk show, then I've gotta work on my new book. Hey, Alk, mind helping out? ...Alk?
I don't wanna let anyone down. Not my fans, and definitely not myself. I know I can make it—I just need to put in the effort!
Hi, I'm Levy Grace. Life kind of blessed me, and now I'm a diva AND an adventurer. Oh, I'll be autographing books later!

Never give up...
I'd almost forgotten that mantra—until you came along.
111006: Yes? What is it? ...Oh, my! Are you falling for me? Hehe... You are making me blush! ♡
*cough* Goodness! I thought it would make me look alluring and mysterious, but, I must confess, I am no match for these old smoking pipes!
Where could my old parlour, Hakunroh, be? I just hope everyone there is safe and unharmed...
Oh, my! ♡ Stella's cheeks are so soft and sweet, I just want to eat them up! ...Oh! Light, um... Nothing to see here, tee-hee!
Oh, dear... Everyone here is so warm and friendly that I almost forget myself sometimes... Hee hee! Did I have you going there?
It is a pleasure to meet you. I am Kikuno. The threads of fate must have bound us together. Let us be friends. ♡
Like an out-of-season flower blossoming against all odds... Thank you ever so kindly for looking after me. How will I ever pay you back? Tee hee... ♡
253001: With Monster Cuisine, anything's possible! You get me, right?
I want EVERYONE to love Monster Cuisine. And I'll do anything to make that dream into a reality.
"It's delicious." Those two little words will make any chef's day.
Alk's got talent and passion—the two ingredients that make a perfect chef. I better crank up the heat, or he's gonna outclass me!
*GASP* INSPIRATION STRIKES AGAIN! What if I fillet the tentacles while the monster's still alive? Hey, can you be ready for a quick taste-test in a few minutes?
Thank you guys so much! Monster Chef Parfait, officially part of the team and ready to spice things up!

Thanks for believing in me.
I swear that, one day, I'm gonna serve you a monster dish that will change your world!
311011: As a warrior, I'm still green, but I'm a respected huntress. We can hunt some big game together if you'd like.
I offer my prayers to the sun every morning. I pray for the safety of my clan, the winged folk who dance through the skies.
Light, I see you also have some splendid wings on your head. Why don't the two of us soar through the skies together?
It's a practice among my clan to gaze at the stars and predict what tomorrow will bring. The stars here are quite different... but still beautiful.
Even the sky of my home was too expansive for me. But suddenly flying through this infinite sky... It's a strange feeling...
I am Cran. I still have a lot to learn as a warrior, but I'll do my best to be of assistance.
As a result of my journey with you, I now at last understand the pride of my people, and what I must do!
213013: What was Yumu like in the past? Hm... I guess he was a bit prickly in high school, but... Sorry, I can't tell you any more than that!
I thought Stella was really pretty when I first saw her, and Nova's the same way! That being said, EVERYBODY in this town is pretty, so it evens out.
I know I don't need to wear my school uniform anymore, but... I guess it can be my battle uniform now.
I'm back from my trip with the Crimson Blades! What did we do? Hehe, wouldn't you like to know!
Yumu told me Light is a Champion, and a handsome one, too! Who would've thought a carrot-hating rabbit could be someone like that!
My brother's a nice guy, but he can be so... so stupid sometimes.
Now who's this? Why, it's Nao, of course! Hey, hey, let's go on a little adventure! Ah, but don't tell my brother!
I'm sick of waiting around for my brother to save the world. I can fight too! Hehe, so what if he worries? Serves him right for worrying me!
121070: I thought I was ready, but when I saw Regitare, I screamed... Ahhh... I feel awful about it...
I lose track of time whenever I look up stuff. I start on one page and end up on a totally different subject by the end... Stella, have you heard of wikis?
I always thought it ironic that my name means courage, but now... I think I can try living up to my name.
Why was I able to ride a motorcycle? That's because... I have a license... I just think they're cool, okay? Wh-why are you laughing?
Dia has her hands full dealing with Regis, doesn't she? Haha... Guess it just shows there's all sorts of people out there.
The city's being restored, bit by bit. You should stop by soon. Palpebra's great, but Shibuya knows how to have some fun. I'll show you around.
I'm Yuki Mishima. I'm a seventeen-year-old high school student. My hobbies are reading... O-oh, this isn't a formal introduction?
There's a lot I don't know about myself yet. There's a lot I don't want to know. That's how it is for everyone, right? But we push on anyway.
161082: I didn't know what to say or do after what happened, but... Now I know that I need to just face him head-on.
Is it just me, or is this town overflowing with babes?! I'm sure I've got a shot with one or two of them... Right?!
Paradise Isle? Bikinis?! Why didn't you invite me?! Huh? We hadn't met yet? Dammit, why couldn't I get time powers?!
Next time, I'm the one who'll have YOUR back... So don't disappear on us, okay, Ayumu? You're gonna make Nao cry.
Whenever I go into town with that pretty boy Nova, people only talk to him! What's the deal? I'm good-looking too!
I'm going treasure-hunting with Mr. Takamori later. He can seriously restore anything with his power. Even stuff like manga or data.
Sup! Looks like I'm hanging with you guys from now on. That okay with you? No? Too bad! Haha, just kidding!
I've got a debt to repay, and I'm gonna repay it! So, uh... Oh, whatever! Just know I'm here for ya!
211044: Doesn't matter how many times you ask—I don't know anything about the other Aegis peeps. I just hung around them a bit.
So even in another world, not everyone gets powers? Ohhhh, too bad, so sad. Guess it's tough for normies no matter where you are!
You're the Champion? Didn't realize you'd be so fluffy. It's like you're straight out of a manga! Pffft, I can't... Ahahahahaha!
Uh, hello? Why does everyone look like a nobody or a crazy cosplayer? I just want some normal cute clothes, thanks!
I said I'd help out at the Guild, so I'm doing it. It's not like I WANT to... But I did promise Lilie, so... It's whatever.
That heroine wannabe... She says whatever she wants like it's no big deal! Bet everyone forgives her because she's got a nice face. Well, not me!
Yeah, yeah. I'm former Aegis member Rinne Hikawa, here to do whatever you need—except physical labor. Tch...
Ahahaha! Guess doormats like you need all the help you can get! Just stay out of the way and watch me work!
221054: I've still got a long way to go before I can call myself a cool teacher...
My job is to restore this city to its former glory. Maybe then, I'll be able to read my favorite manga again... Hm? I'm serious.
My name? It means "to work with sincerity." Are you perhaps interested in etymology? I can find more resources if you'd like.
I want to see if there's any technology I can use my powers on. Once Yuki, Kenny, and Mika heard about it, they said they'd help me look.
Rescuing people from the Kaleidoscope is the most pressing issue. The Guild Knights, Nimbus and Shota are helping, but we'd welcome Aegis' help.
Hehe... Don't worry, I'm not drunk. I'm just... so happy to see you all smiling like this...
I may have been a pathetic liar at one point, but no longer. I hope I can be of help to you.
I've paid my dues and put aside my regrets. There's so much that needs to be done, and I'm the one who can do it!
151075: Do I like music? Why yes, I do! Every time Carol and I play a tune, my heart flutters with joy...

I've received so much candy...
It should be a while before I need to worry about meals!

Trick or treat...
Those that lack treats receive tricks, yes? What sort of trick shall we give them?
Trick or treat! Gimme something good to eat! This is another Halloween spell, right? I heard it guarantees you good candy... No?
Festivals are wonderful, aren't they? The town is simply lit up with smiles... I'd like to try going to more of these in the future.

Halloween music is really interesting... I'd like to try making another song!
Alk, Stella! You'll listen when I'm done, right?

My name's Lyra Ebelsorte. I like music, and... I can't wait for Halloween.
It's a pleasure to meet you.

I can't think of any tricks... Maybe we could say "tune or treat" instead!
...No?
161081: Palpebra and Qualia City are both similar at heart... Hehehe... In other words, my business experience will come in handy here as well!
Falsche and Corinna were gracious enough to help me make this outfit. They're both kind, good people.
I realize I still have a lot of room for growth. That's why I dedicate my days to studying... Yes, these Palpebran sweets are for research.
*yawn* ...Excuse me. I stayed up late yesterday speaking with Bulleta. Ehehe, I played a great trick and received a great treat.
Conductor has been sending me more messages of late... How does one normally respond when asked how one is doing?
Is it a fact that synthetics feel things differently than us? The androids also seem to be similar... Hmm...
Trick or treat! Hehe, I've always wanted to say that. What do you think of my outfit? It's cool, isn't it?
I find myself loving sweet treats and fun tricks. So what will it be? Trick or treat?
241057: I-I can't believe how revealing this is... The clothes my master got me were also bad... Where do people buy these things?
I'm supposed to be protecting the town during Halloween, but some people have t-told me... that I'm the biggest threat to public morals...
S-so many people have costumes on... It's fun to see what everyone has on!
Lately, some people have started shaking in their shoes and giving me candy when I walk by... I-it's not like I stab just anyone!
Trick or treat! Naughty people will all get a trick from me... Take this, and this!
Oh, the way those criminal scum start to deflate like rotting pumpkins and cry for mercy... Aha! Halloween is just the best!
U-um, Melmyna here... I'm dressed like this because it's part of the security job... Y-yes, I'll keep the town safe, I promise!
T-trick or treat! Y-you... don't have any candy, do you? Then I guess it's time... for a trick... Aha!
221053: The name's Rain. I'm a recently graduated sublieutenant of the Gaean Navy... Oh, forget it. Nobody's gonna take me seriously in this...

Even without saying "trick or treat," people keep giving me candy.
...I wish everyone would stop treating me like a kid.

Someone told me ghosts are a common sight on Halloween...
Wh-what? I'm not s-scared, or anything!
It was a little hectic, but in the end I had a great Halloween. I should pick up some souvenirs for the captain and my crewmates...
These sweets that Alk made for Halloween are something else! Maybe it's a good thing I won that contest after all...

If you keep staring like that... I hope you're ready for a little Halloween mischief!
...Heh! Just kidding!

Happy... Halloween? Why THIS outfit? And why me?
...Stop staring at me, already!

Happy Halloween! 
Hehe, let's just relax and enjoy the night together!
241051: When I look up at the stars I wonder if there's some kind of training out there I've never experienced before... I gotta go find out!
Mm-mmm! Food always tastes great after training! I'm going for seconds, Alk!
There's just something special about Starview Village! Maybe if I train hard enough, I'll become a deity, too? Teehee!
A lot of people think that training's gotta be harsh and painful, but I think that's wrong. Nothing's better than enjoying your training!
I want MONEY so I can open up a big training school! If I work hard enough, everyone will start to know who my god is!
H-huh? What's that? You're interested in training? How about I teach you? Maybe start with a little fasting? Hm?
The name's Makani! I'm keeping up my training while adventuring. Got any cool training methods? Let me know!
I never thought I'd see the day where I actually WANT to train with other people. Heh! But here I am, looking forward to it!
121069: I look angry? Believe me, when I'm really angry with you, you'll know.
The world of these beastfolk is fascinating. The sparks of conflict everywhere—live coals for the fires of war. Shame it fizzled out.
What a meddlesome contract... Pass me the next plate already! What do you mean I'm better at this than you thought? Just who do you take me for?!
Magnos? ...Oh right, him. Our contract is complete. All things considered, it left me satisfied—leagues better than my contract with you, boy.
Helga, good. Just who I was looking for. Let's spar a little—and don't try to turn tail and run.
Alk, which dog ears do you think will get the best reaction? ...What? I thought you had the same "hobbies" as that assassin from before.
What's with that idiotic look on your face? My ears? They're mostly for show. Though they do have their uses.
I don't need to hold on to humanity; I will surpass the power of all others. That is the only path I walk—nothing else is worth my effort.
131074: You need my help, don't you? Use me as you will—I'm here to be of service.

Stella, come here a moment...
There, there... It'll be okay.
...Why won't the others let me do this?
Still doing the tough-guy act, Nimbus? I can tell by your scent... You're a real sweetheart deep down.
Long ago, Albert was known as a vicious warrior who would have bared his fangs even before the Black Wolf himself. My, how people change.
I never realized you could draw out such power from merging circular and spiraling movements and connecting with the earth... How amusing.
I'll never be able to rid myself of the scent of blood... But thanks to you, I don't need to run from myself anymore.

I sensed something dangerous, so I'm here to keep you safe.
That's about what a warrior's life is worth, you know?
I decided I would fight to protect and obtained the strength to do so. Still... You've all kept me safe too, haven't you?
233007: There's still a lot I don't know. That's why I hope to learn as much as I can in this place!
Libraries are amazing! There's so much information about other worlds here... Do you think I can read about them all?
I sparred with Helga, but I didn't even come close to beating her. I know she's got way more experience, but... it's still frustrating!
I can't just spend all my time studying... I need to put what I learned into practice. Use my own words, keep my head held high...
Claw took me to Qualia City the other day. Everything was so shiny and bright... I didn't understand half of what I saw...
Alk, listen! I finally beat Helga once! It took... a lot of losses to get there, but I finally did it!
Um... I know I'm still a kid and I have a lot to learn, but I'll do my best to help out! Thanks for having me!
I shouldn't be in any rush... If I want to change the world, I'll have to take things step-by-step. Slowly, but surely, I'll make progress.
131068:
You are a strange lot. You bear no Spirit Horns, and yet you still trust one another?
I still cannot make sense of it...
Essla... I wish we could have seen this world together...
Unlike words, a person's Oudo is sincere. Blind trust in someone's word is a dangerous thing...
Your Oudo... rings pure. Let us remain together a little longer.
It is a shame that my Oudo cannot reach you. Stella, could you teach me more about how you communicate with one another?
I have heard that the original home of the Vesta was within a damp forest surrounded by springs... I'd like to see it myself one day.
I wish to continue on this path together, Hero of the Red Soup. Let me hear your Oudo once more.
I am a warrior. I am the blade of the Vesta... and I will fight by your side!
151069: Talk about a sight to behold. Just how many worlds are out there... Do you think any of them are good for slacking off?
Hey, hope you don't me crashing here for a bit. Ah, and don't tell the Guild Knights I'm here, okay?
Mmm, now that's a nice breeze. Makes me really want a smok—nope. No can do.
Would you like one? Ah, it's just candy, I swear. I just need something to chew on, you know?
The cat's name? I suppose I haven't thought of one. Don't want to get too attached...
Just take it easy. All that stuff about the fruits of your labor amounts to nothing if you burn yourself out. You've got to live a little.
Introduce myself? All right, I'm Captain Zekhel of the Guild Knights. I get the feeling we'll be working together for a long, LONG time.
I've got a real sweet tooth, and there's nothing sweeter than the dreams of youngsters like you. Looks like it's time to get to work!
231063: Huh?! Stealing food? I would never... Um... Sorry. Please don't tell Alk, okay?
There's endless worlds out there... Filled with all kinds of households I just have to visit!
It sure feels nice warming up in the sun. Come sit with me!
Come on! I was trying to keep out of sight at a home in that bleep-bloop world for a while... and they mistook me for a ghost! I'm a yokai, darn it!
Light always treats me like a kid even though I'm an adult! I guess I'll let it slide if he gives me some candy... Teehee!
It's really nice how I don't have to hide myself in Starview Village. It's filled with snacks from all kinds of different worlds, too!
I'm Fuku. Just a normal, um... human girl. Definitely not a yokai that grants fortune to, uh... Oh no! Please don't lock me away!
I used to be scared of everything... but I'm past that now. Humans, yokai, whatever... I want to make friends with everyone!
131062: I sure love a clear sky! Really makes you feel like you can spread your wings and fly!
Come to me if you're ever in trouble. There's nothing I can't smash into pieces for you!
All done with maintenance! Prep work and fine-tuning is a pain, but nothing beats that feeling of a job well done!
Hey, Alk! Your washing machine seemed a little beat-up, so I fixed it for you. Bet you're glad I'm around, right?
What are we gonna do today? Go have some fun? Maybe get some work done? I'm down for whatever, let's just get out there!
Starview Village is the BEST! You've got me hooked on this place and now you're stuck with me!
Another world, eh? Too awesome! My name's Strina, and I'll smash up anything that gets in your way!
There's nothing better than living life your own way! Nothing can stop me when I'm pumped up like this!
261059: I can solve that case for you. For a price, of course.
I may not look it, but I AM a detective. What can I say? I love mysteries. Especially the juicy ones that lead to cash.
Vulgar? Yeah, and? Want me to show you my violent side too?
Oh, fine, I'll solve it for you. As for my compensation... Well, you'll find out soon enough.
Phew... What's in this smoke? That's a secret. Can't have you picking up my bad habits.
Heh, how can you decide if something's good or bad without trying it? Live a little, will you?
The name's Volgia. I can solve any case, although my methods are a bit... unorthodox. You don't mind, right?
The mysteries you lot are facing are the real deal... Good. This wouldn't be any fun if it were easy.
331020: I just LOVE the rain! Something about the plippity-plop of raindrops makes my heart soar!
Stella, Stella! I heard it's raining in Palpebra! Perfect for a stroll! Let's go!
Everyone's so TALL in Starview Village! I'm gonna need an extra large umbrella to fit us all!
It's always possible to find a little ray of sunshine, even on gloomy days! Besides, you can't have flowers without the rain!
Hehe, I feel like I've been smiling even more since meeting you all! I hope these smiles last forever!
Phi Nonoa, at your service! Uh-oh! Caught in the rain without an umbrella? Well, hop on in, and we'll plippity-plop on our way!
The only thing better than trying new things is doing those things with friends! Rain or shine, I know we'll have the best of times!
141069: Dressing up for the occasion and enjoying the local liquor? Now THIS is my idea of a vacation!
This yukata thing is pretty nice! A classy, simple look. Maybe I should buy a few more?
I'm a big fan of festival food since I'm always finding something I've never seen before. Trying new food is an adventure of its own!
Yamato's a unique place, but its festivals are really something. People everywhere and yet it's somehow melancholy... I like it here.
It's not all about fighting, Alk—I can also teach you to have fun as an adventurer. I'd say that's more your speed, right?
That crazy old painter helped push me in the right direction. I'll have to repay him with stories of my escapades!
Looks pretty good on me, right? Figured I should dress for the occasion! Now that we're here, let's go have some fun!
Lanterns lit to guide the spirits of the departed, huh... Watch over us, comrades. My new friends and I have many adventures ahead of us!
151063: My first summer with my big sister... Excitement levels rising!
Yukata assembly process memorized. Now to replicate the process on Stella... Severe self-doubt detected.
Nephtim's observations suggest that the sound of wind chimes is "a real bop." Requesting immediate implementation into my shows.
This notebook was a gift from Alk. Nephtim will use it to log my summer in the form of pretty pictures...
Nephtim's place is with her friends. We will be together through every season, not just summer.
My mission of experiencing the joys of summer is complete, but there is still much to explore about the season... Next year will be fun.
Activating Yukata Mode. Commencing next mission: having a hella lit summer!
Nephtim will fight. For the sake of my family and myself, Nephtim will shatter the night!
253007: These ears are just for show, but one day... I'll grow real ones... Ehehehe! You can count on it!
I was stuck for a bit, but then I picked up... alchemy? I think that's what it's called. Anyway, now I've got all sorts of new ideas cooking!
I picked up a lot of interesting materials on that island AND got to spend time with my Nimby-Wimby! Best summer EVER!
Lately, I feel like there are weird holes in my memory... Well, whatever! It's not like it's been a problem so far!
Nimbus always says not to act so crazy all the time! Isn't he such a sweetheart? It's so cute when he worries about me pushing myself!
That priestess lady is SO annoying, always complaining about me using the sprites... Ugh... But why do I feel like... I owe her one?
I can't believe I ran into Nimbus while I'm out here doing research! This has to be fate! Ehehe!
Niiiimby-Wiiiimby! They said they do marriage ceremonies here! I can't wait until I'm covered in fur... Heeheee, then we can tie the knot!
141063: There are a lot of lively sprites in the summer. I find myself being uplifted by their cheer.
Swimwear like this isn't so bad, once you get used to it... It does still feel tight in some places, but it won't do to loosen any strings...
The sprites decided I should marry Alk. I refuse to give up now.
The sprites may have decided my marriage with Alk, but now... I wish for it as well. I... I won't give up on him!
Hehehe, I don't have much experience in the water, but the sprites help me swim. Without them... I, um... I'll need to practice...
The way Sohvi treats the sprites is appalling! But... I could learn a thing or two from her passion...
I'm a little nervous, since I've never worn a swimsuit before. Are you ready to go? The sprites are coming too, of course. Hehehe.
Hehehe, floating around like this is quite fun! It's almost like flying... Would you like to j-join me?
151051: This beach is our territory! Man the gates! Fortify the walls! Ah, should we have dug a tunnel? I forgot a shovel!
Popularity... Is what I wish for the most... Just where are my fans... A haiku is easy enough to make, but everything else is so hard... *sigh*
What do you think? I know I exude sexiness in spades! Gaaaah! What was that for? I should be showered with praise, not criticism...
*sigh* I wish this vacation would never end. I am having far too much fun!
Come, Stella, play with me! Shall we swim? Build sandcastles? Or eat ice cream? Perhaps even... pick up... Gah! Forget I asked!
Stella looks best when she is smiling. It makes me wonder what a certain someone would look like when they smile...
It is summer! Now come join me, Inaho Tamamo, and forget the calamity awaiting! Play first—save the world later!
Even should the heavens come crashing down, or the earth crumble beneath our feet, nothing will stop us! I swear it! So for now, let us play!
141057: The air in this town is clean, and the food is good. Only problem is the noise... Maybe I should do something about that.
Strength grants freedom. The stronger you are, the more you can mold the world to your will. That's all there is to it.
Don't interrupt me while I'm training. If you want me to teach you, bring me good sake.
That fool of a disciple is skipping her training again... She thinks she's so clever, but a good smack upside the head should fix that.
Nothing in this world lasts forever. Everything is fated to end in ruin. But rebelling every so often isn't so bad... to stave off boredom.
I train, drink, train, eat, and sleep. That's what I do in a day as a tengu. None of that asceticism hogwash for me.
I am Gouran, a glorious, immortal tengu. The time we spend together will be short, but you should be grateful for my presence regardless.
To think there were still new lands to roam and more training to be had... Perhaps the time I spend with you won't be wasted after all.
221040: The rays sure are bright today, aren't they dearie? Perhaps... you would have preferred that I shaved my fur?
I did consider assuming a human form with this swimsuit... But I'd rather not start any wars over little old me.
Audacious? Shameless? What do you think I'm wearing this for, dear Light?
The princess is such a silly girl. Mortals are like putty in our hands, and yet she makes so little progress.
I once thought it impossible for yokai to coexist with mortalkind. Perhaps I should dumbfound you all and bring along Lady Kuzunoha next time?
Every mortal is held up by strings; pull the right ones and they'll dance however you wish. I can teach you how to do more than cook, you know...
A vixen dressed for summer; her name is Akisame Shirano! As the proud servant of Lady Kuzunoha, I'll show you what it means to have fun!
The princess is UNBELIEVABLY naive, but with you all beside her, I'm sure she will find her way, one day at a time.
361033: Lucille's on the case! I'll get to the bottom of this mystery and make Master proud!
How'd I catch on to their schemes, you ask? I read it in a mystery novel, of course. Never stop reading, you guys!

Is this cake all for me? Wow! Thank you!
...H-hey! Stop laughing at me!
I only solved that last case thanks to everyone's help. I've still got a long way to go...

121051: How are you feeling? If you ever feel ill, please let me know. I will do my best to treat you.

341017: I can clean, do the laundry, and take care of the shopping! If there's anything I can do to help out, just let me know!

ally/join

Hey, Auntie, do you think these clothes look good on me? Hm? No good for combat? Jeez, that's not—wait, where's the old man?!
Nyahaha! The Great Chief Tink, reporting for duty! If you want a fight, I'll give you one!
Chip D'éclat, unlocked and loaded! Nyahaha! Ah, you said to be more careful, right? All right, tell me what to do and consider it done!
223007: I must learn more: about other worlds, about people... I will learn to understand.
It is astonishing to see that there are so many different worlds out there...
A performer... But what skills could be needed for such a—ah, you misunderstand. I enjoyed the performance, and am curious to learn more.
People are weak. However, I wish to walk alongside them, not guide them, even if that was my original purpose.
In addition to combat, I am equipped to process data, manage resources, and provide mental care. In other words: I can do house chores.
The answers I seek cannot be obtained from simple observation. I must take a more direct approach... eventually.
I have made my promise with Rashid. I will be fine... Now let us depart. We will crush the stars, and shatter the night!
Watch over me while I journey on. I swear I shall one day discover what it means to stand strong and never give up.
121039: Duties, training, meetings, negotiation... Working for the kingdom comes with endless work. This place forces me to relax.
Even in a different world, people are people... Heh... Interesting.
Our hometown was burned to the ground... And just like that, we found ourselves on a new journey.
Nothing is borne without sacrifice... But such sacrifices are not to be made lightly—I know this now. Still, I choose to fight till the end!
I know my weaknesses better than anyone. That's why I need to get stronger. I refuse to lose anything else!
Th-this tea cake... It's good! So... so sweet... Ah... Could I have another?
I am Haridal, commander of the Soaring Falcons. I'll be helping you out—I'm sure we'll both benefit from this arrangement.
No matter the battlefield, this blade of mine will slice through my enemies. Then I will see the dawn—I swear it on my sword!
351033: Those ladies back there sure were tough. Even my Super Cute Puppy Dog Eyes didn't work on them...
I hate fighting, so I'll be hiding over here, where it's safe. Huh? I can't? Damn!
Argh! I just want a hug from a cute girl! I want to be fed and cuddled and told I'm a good boy!
I don't usually associate with men, but I GUESS I can help out Alk and the others... In return, you better introduce me to some cute ladies!
This rifle was made from scratch by yours truly! If you ask reeeally nicely, maybe I'll let you touch it.
I'm Ruto. I miss my mama, have you seen her? *sniff* Can you hold me—hey, back off, man! I'm talking to the ladies!
Where, oh where are my fair ladies? I won't let anyone get in the way of creating my perfect harem!
141039: You want to know the secret to dancing well? Hmm... I guess just be honest with what you want to express. Ahaha, not easy, right?
Hehehe, I look great in this new outfit, don't I? It's definitely one of my favorites now. Come on, take a good, close look...
What do you want to do today? I can give you a special dance... Just kidding! Let's just move our bodies to the rhythm and have some fun!
I only recently noticed how awful of a person I am... But every day feels more fun now that I've embraced it. Now what should I do next...
It's all right, Stella. I'm certain you won't forget who you are. So dance with me and let it all melt away, just for a little while.
The blinding sun beating down your back, the dry air in your lungs, the sand sneaking into your clothes... Yeah, this is home.
Sonia Therese takes the stage! Like a shooting star, with the wind at my feet, I'll dazzle and charm! Now... Won't you dance with me?
Take in the music, listen to the beat of my heart, and let myself melt away... What's left is me in my purest form.
161051: Even within the darkest depths of an ancient ruin, my Lord's power is immense! Feel free to make use of it whenever you need it!
Nothing like drinking a nice, cold beer while wandering the endless, scorching sands! Ah, that's the stuff!
A subterranean ruin... An ancient civilization, long gone... And a people that still survive despite it all! Now THAT'S epic!

Hey, Sonia! Teach me a cool dance from your world again sometime!
Er, preferably not a dirty one...
The Devourer of Stars... Is that the true identity of my Lord? Now that I think about it, I do sense his aura when I'm in the Kaleidoscope...
You all look like you're in way higher spirits now! Aren't you glad we went on that adventure?
Denah Selphis here—and I'm all decked out for combat in the scorching desert heat! What do you think? Pretty sweet outfit, huh?!
Ancient buried ruins... That is just SO epic, like something out of a fantasy story! What are you waiting for? An awesome adventure awaits us!
151033: Hmph. Is a crystalized body so rare that you feel the need to gawk at it?

Urgh... Gah!
*huff* *huff* This blasted arm of mine!
I'm sure this arm of mine will lead me back to that monster... I don't know HOW I know this, but I do.
Sometimes... I dream about my village... The way it was before the attack... I swear I'll make that dream a reality and bring everyone back!
I just saw a walking mushroom. Hah, that certainly explains why nobody bats an eye when they see me.
How ironic... To think this accursed arm of mine would become my greatest strength... But I still need more power...
I will lend my strength to your quest... I refuse to lose anything else, so I will fight alongside you!
The name's Theriol... Tell me, what's your endgame here? What purpose does summoning me serve?
This power... It's coursing through my very being! Father... Mother... I will avenge you!
161045: Don't bother me. I have no intentions of forming friendships... Humans are so difficult.
Oh, that boy... He's so much more reserved with others. Why does he behave that way towards me? How impertinent.
Drifters started appearing around the same time people like me gained unusual powers... These powers must not be of this world.
How DARE they make me an advisor for extracurricular activities?! Hm? Of course I said yes! How could I let down those children...
All the items in my room were things I found at the bottom of the ocean. Not everything suits my tastes, but it felt wrong to leave it.
Are my clothes really that peculiar? That fuzz ball Champion seems to think it's improper for a professor... Well, I think it's cute.
I am Malviola, and I will only help as I see fit. Do not expect me to be friends with you.
I told you I would only help as I see fit, correct? If you were to perish, my work would suffer. I'm not doing this because I like you or anything.
231050: You don't need to thank me! I'm just happy to help! I'm all about giving back!
If you're ever in a bind, just holler! I'll be right over... So, what do you need?
I don't think there are any truly bad people in the world. As long as we listen to each other, we can eventually understand one another.
You're right. I need to be more careful. After all, if I get hurt, I won't be able to help anyone!
Are my powers a burden? Well, I'm used to them, but... If I could touch others without shocking them, I might be able to help more people...
I've learned so much since coming here! On every different world, I find a new way to help others! Isn't that amazing?
I'm Telluna! If there's ever anything you need, let me know! I want to be helpful!
I'm all charged up and ready to go! I bet I could help a hundred people right now!
311025: Do I really need to change clothes to repay my debt? ...Fine. If that's how things are done around here, I should follow suit.
So you want an order of Swan Love Creampuffs, one Hearty-Love-Love Cheesecake, and the Fwuffy Bun-Bun Tart, right? Got it.
If a favor is done for me, I always return that favor. Leaving my debts unpaid doesn't sit right with me. I still owe you, so order away.
None of the sweets you bought have long shelf lives. Be sure to finish them off by tonight.
You need help baking? Fine by me... Haché? Flambé? Nappage? This some kind of spell or something?
You don't need to give me anything. Any more chocolates, and I won't be able to repay everyone... Why are you laughing?
I am Klaus Fersen. I can complete any task without issue, be it assassination... or baking.
I am just fulfilling my duties, so there is no need to thank me... It just feels wrong.
111039: You believe I've changed? Perhaps I have. It is, after all, the natural course for children to grow, isn't it?
Clothes can be seen as a form of curse. They bind you, captivate you... and casting them away can be difficult.
Wouldn't it be amusing to see how the Diviners' Commission reacts to this outfit? I'm joking, Mizuchi. We can keep this between us.
Welcome, ladies! Ahaha, did I surprise you? I wanted to try a new curse—I mean, a little prank.
Back home, I am the child of tengu. But in that town, I am just a boy. It's equally refreshing as it is embarrassing, I must admit.
Has the hour already grown so late? I must be returning to the commission. I hope it's all right if I visit again soon.
Suizen Gogyou, guider of destiny and aide to all, at your service. I promise I'm doing this work to relax.
Debts repaid are once again made. So long as my destiny is tied to others, at least... I hope ours are intertwined for quite some time yet.
121033: I'll honor our contract. In return, you better keep me entertained.
I detest weaklings. They're not even worth using as fodder.
You have access to a vista overlooking other worlds? Perhaps working with you wasn't a mistake after all...
From what I've heard, this Champion isn't very human either. But I'm sure those naive fools don't mind that whatsoever.
There are so many people here that I would love to sink my fists into, but alas. The temptation might drive me mad...
Those idiots make me sick to my stomach. Can't even work up an appetite when they're around.
The name's Shuilong. Yes, the rumors are true. What use is humanity when you can have ultimate power?
To transcend mortal limits and become the greatest martial artist to ever live, I'll throw away my humanity. Why? For fun, of course.
241033: All right, my prosthetics are all tuned up! These babies are vital to my job, so I gotta keep them nice and clean!
The breeze here feels so nice. You know, the fiery stadium is nice and all, but I really enjoy coming here and seeing everyone so carefree.
Light's so cute and fluffy, isn't he? I have a few mutant plushies, but... Nothing beats the real deal!
It's amazing how diverse all the worlds are. I've seen sights no virtual reality machine could replicate! It makes me want to train even more!
Nothing beats breaking through my opponent's defenses and scoring a goal. That kind of adrenaline is super addicting!
No matter how strong I get, ActFast is not a solo sport. That's why I'm so grateful to have teammates I can work together with!
Hey, I'm Middy, an ActFast athlete! What's ActFast? Well, how about we play a game, and I'll show you!
I bet I'm even faster than the wind now! All right, let's show everyone that teamwork makes the dream work!
351027: I'd kill for some new parts, but they're so pricey! Got anything you need delivered? I don't care about the danger—I just need some cash!
Watch this! Here comes my Ultra Spin 1080! Whoa! Crap, crap, crap! Ahhh! Owww...
Dangerous... No, what about ludicrous? Hm? What am I doing? Trying to come up with some good trick names! Any ideas?
What if I started delivering Alk's food? We could call it... Boarder Eatz! I bet it'd be a hit! Huh? Is that a no? Awww, man...
Once I go pro, you're invited to all my games. I'll be showing off some sick tricks, so you better be ready!
Yo, I'm Axem, and someday I'm gonna be a professional extremeboarder!
You want speed? You ain't seen nothing yet! No matter what obstacles pop up, I'll skate on by with this baby!
161039: I like people who work hard. But my mom says working too hard is bad for you. Are you listening, Alk?
Mr. Light and Nimbus are very nice to me. I like them a whole lot. I hope they know that.
I want to be amazing like my mom and dad when I grow up. So I have to work harder.
Alk! Stella! Hehehe, I just felt like saying your names.
Incantations involve commanding the elements, like fire and water. But isn't it just a pretext to use the world for our own gain?
I've traveled down scary roads before. That's why I want to tell others like me that everything will be okay. Was that strange man doing the same?
I'm Couette. I plan on being a wise and powerful mage. You'll help me with that, won't you?
Magic is fun... But also scary. I understand that part very well. Still, just watch me. I'm going to be the best mage ever!
131032: Verikion... The legendary hero who fought with monsters at the bottom of the sea—he was nothing but a fairy tale made up by my dad.
This Vriki is just a stuffed plushie. This here is the real one. They're both Vriki, and they're both my friends!

If my dad were here instead of Vriki... I...
No, I'm sorry. I can't think such things.
Um... Vriki says he doesn't want to eat, and I can have his food... So, can I have seconds? Please?
Hehe... Vriki really likes it when you wash him! He gets all sparkly and clean.
I was so lonely before, but now that Vriki and all of you are here... I feel so warm inside. I wonder why...

"Look after Rhode for me..."
That was Vriki speaking there. He worries about me a lot...
I thought I'd be alone forever... But I'm not. I have Vriki—and now, all of you. Thank you.
111033: No matter what world I'm in, my mission stays the same. I'll help anyone and everyone in need... Meow.
All members of the Fellowship of Floof must have a pair of fluffy ears. That's the rule. It should also help kids be less scared of us doctors...
It's fascinating to me how medical practices are largely the same across different worlds.
We once hired an incredibly strong mercenary, but alas... We didn't have the funds to keep them employed...
One of my residency classmates was a former clergyman. I asked him to start the Fellowship with me, but he refused once he heard about the ears...
There's so much we're able to do now, and so much more that I want to do, since I met you. I'm grateful you invited me to Starview Village.
I'm Liao, captain of the Fellowship of Floof. We treat anyone and everyone, even if you're from another world... Meow.
As a doctor, I don't take lives—I save them, even if they're my enemy's. However, I will show no mercy to your wallet when it comes to billing.
261035: I've always lived my life like a dead man—and been treated like one, too. But something feels different about this place. It's so... warm.
I'm sorry, I'm afraid I can't take off this mask. Given my line of work, it's better that people don't see my face.
The world is filled with so many mysteries... It's been so long since I've felt this kind of wonder in my heart. Thank you, once again.
If you ever need my help, don't hesitate to ask. I don't need compensation—the freedom to embark on this journey is reward enough.
I've had enough of being manipulated by some unknown power. I will do whatever it takes to uncover its secrets!
Starview Village... has little to do with my own goal. But still, I find it fascinating... The secrets that it bears—I wish to know them all.
My name is Eduardo. I'm an agent who specializes in procuring information. I'm sure I can be of use to you.
I will continue my investigation... Not on anyone's orders, but purely that I may learn the truth. I am... a new man.
231044: H-holy crap! Take a look at this! I actually won the ticket lottery for that tour of the photo studio! I can't believe it!
Occasionally I get weirdos who pick on my appearance. Apparently I'm too "gawdy"? Eh. No worries—I usually shut those guys up real fast.
The coolest adventurer in Palpebra? Do you even need to ask? Of course it's me! Duh.
Hehe. I'm so glad I don't have to hide who I am anymore! Of course, I'll apologize to any fans who feel like I lied to them... But I'm glad I'm doing this!

Hey, Stella!
What do you think about trying on some of my clothes? I think they'll look great on you!
Hmm, maybe I should have a handshake event of my own. Sure, I might run into some angry fans, but that's fine! I'll win them over too!

Guess who? It's only the most talked-about adventurer in all of Palpebra!
The name's Edita—hope you're ready to become a fan!
I think I might be one step closer to becoming the person I want to be! Still got a long way to go... But I'm not about to give up!
151027: I wouldn't mind jumping into the Kaleidoscope, but I don't want to miss out on the festival! Let's all go together!
What do you think about my outfit? It's not what I usually wear, but I kind of like it!
Yep, that settles it—sweets are the best! My mood gets better just thinking about them! The crash afterwards, though... That's not as fun...
Chocolates are good on the go as well! Perfect for your busy adventurer. Wish they didn't melt so quickly though!
I've been thinking and researching it for a while now, but I still don't get this "love" thing! I wonder if I'll ever like somebody in that way?
You know, it wasn't always this easy to get chocolates—they were super expensive before! Thank goodness for technology, huh?
Happy Valentine's Fest! Hehe. I'm giving out chocolate to everyone who's helped me out. They're seriously great—try 'em!
Handmade chocolate, just for you! That's for always helping me out. It's different from the ones I gave everyone else—don't tell them, though!
251041: Everyone's always helping me, but I can never return the favor... That's why I wanna give back during the Valentine's Fest!
Ahhh! There's fire coming from the pot! Wh-why?! Ah, it exploded! N-Nimbus, your back! Your back is on fire!
Does this outfit look weird on me? Or is it fine? I can't tell. Ahaha... I hope it suits me.
I'm always shutting myself down and blaming myself... But I think I'm finally learning to forgive myself, thanks to you guys.
No matter how far apart we are, I know my friend is still there... I've never felt this sort of joy before... Ahaha, is that too much?
I-is it good? It is? E-ehe... Aww, come on, no way... Hm? N-no, I'm really happy you like them! I'm just not used to praise!
I wanted to thank all my friends with some treats, but... I, um, made a few mistakes... Ahaha...
No matter the distance, some feelings can still be conveyed. This festival gave me the push I needed to learn that... Hehe, Happy Valentine's Fest!
141033: The people here are so strange. They're all so powerful and strong-willed... I wonder if I'll ever be like that...
Urgh... Everyone laughed when I told them I like to curl up into a ball when sleeping... It's just so relaxing.
I need orders... Without them, I... I don't know what to do...
Sunbathing feels so nice. Maybe it's because I'm beastfolk, but I just love feeling the warm sun on my body... *yawn*
I prefer tough enemies to softer ones. Those jiggly slimes send a chill down my spine... Ah, but I'll attack if ordered to!
Thinking and deciding for yourself... is a lot harder than I thought. But I have to. I'm not a tool, after all—I need to have a will of my own.
I am Fluffy, member of the Gaean Royal Navy. Umm... All I can do is kick and punch, but... I hope to be of service!
I had no idea growing stronger could be so much fun... Now I can protect my friends even better. Leave it to me!
111027: Please don't exaggerate my strength. There's nothing superhuman about it! I just... perform above my weight class, that's all!
Hear my royal decree—Palpebra must fall! I'd appreciate your assistance in the matter, everyone!
It behooves a princess to be just, beautiful, AND strong. I suppose I fit all three of those criteria perfectly, don't I? Hehe.
I have decided... I will not return home until I've recovered all the sacred Mirean relics! Would you aid me on my quest?
One day, I will need to return to my homeland. When that day comes... Would you... No, never mind! Forget I spoke.
Even a princess as perfect as me falters sometimes. Thank you for your help... Gratitude from me is rare, so please cherish it!
Luck has blessed you, for before you stands the one and only Princess Toria! I have come to conquer Palpebra in the name of my kingdom!
To think you would go so far to aid me... You truly ARE the legendary heroes of myth! I will follow you wherever you lead!
241027: Training like crazy won't get you anywhere. Any good brawler knows that rest is just as important!
Special training? Not today, thank you. I've got a date lined up! What? It's not easy being this popular, heh.
I can't believe there are so many worlds... But I guess that means there's even more strong opponents for me to challenge!

Oy, Nimbus!
Where'd that furball go off to? I wanted to finally settle things today!

My old man? I mean, I guess I am grateful to him. He's taught me a lot.
Still gets on my nerves, though.

Hey, Alk! How about a quick fight?
Oh come on, no need to be so humble. I know you're really a pro fighter.
The name's Ricardo. I'm a fighter, always have been. If you need someone beaten up, I'm your guy.
Oh, man. You got to see an embarrassing side of me, huh. Whatever, I trust you guys. I'm not afraid of losing anymore!
251035: Sitting still doesn't suit me one bit. Come on, let's do some training!
This place is great. Everyone's so strong! Heh, I've got some exciting matches to look forward to.
Whatcha think of my outfit? I made it outta the flag we use when we get a big haul fishing. Should prove pretty lucky, right?
Ow, ow, owww... Hm? What's it look like I'm doing? Sewing. A fisherman's gotta be able to fix their net, right?
Winning ain't everything, you know. You gotta make sure the audience—and your opponent—are having fun. Guess you could call that my motto!
The sea... It calls me! All right, I'm gonna go fishing! I'll bring back something huge, just you wait!
Hey, I'm Diletta. I'm a fighter, but I fish as a side gig. If you're ever hungry for some fresh seafood, give me a holler!
The only reason I am who I am today is because of you guys. I promise I'll be champion someday, just you wait!
131026: I'll put an end to the BRASS and all idols... For my sake, and mine alone.
So this place is called Starview Village? How strange. I sense no Cosmic Energy here, but something else extremely powerful instead.
Cacow and I are known as the Chateaubrilliand Duo. We are a team, through and through. I would've never become a top idol alone.
My mind is clear. From this point onward, I'm sure I'll fall even more udderly in love with idols.
Alk's cooking is marvelous, as well as nutritionally balanced. I'll eat anything, but Cacow favors steak.
I've got my coat, fan, towel, and light sticks... Hehe, yes, I'm fully ready to attend the concert.
Cowdy. I'm Beaucy, the idol representing Oxton. It's a pleasure to meet you. The BRASS? Oh, I'm putting an end to that.
Thank you, Cacow. And thank you, as well. The Chateaubrilliand Duo will take the idol world by storm, and you'll have front row seats to it all.
221022: I bought this parasol in Yamato, isn't it great? It's not only elegant, but well-built too!
You're interested in proper shrine-going etiquette? Let's actually go for ourselves, and I'll teach you everything there is to know!
Unlike many monotheistic faiths, beliefs held in Yamato state that there are millions of deities, known as "kami"—Hey! Are you listening?!
That lady from the parasol store reminds me of my grandmother; stubborn, strong-willed, and supportive. Sorry—it's fun to reminisce sometimes.
I think I'll be able to learn tons more this year too! Maybe it's all thanks to the kami? Hmm...
It never occurred to me that all the knowledge I've accrued could actually help other people like this!
Are you on your way to visit a shrine for the new year? I'll go with you! I've read all about Yamato—I can be your guide!
That was a great first shrine visit of the new year, everyone! I'm sorry I'm such a burden sometimes, but I hope you'll let me guide you next year too!
141027: Urgh... I'm excited to go to the New Year's celebration, but should a fugitive ninja really be going to a diviners' event?
Walking around in a kimono sure does take some getting used to—eeek!
New Year's means delicious food! And you can't have food without... drinks... NO! I WILL resist! No alcohol for me! Probably! ...Maybe?
Hehe... Picking out souvenirs is so much fun. It's easy to buy too much stuff.
Suizen and Mizuchi are completely different from what I imagined... What good kids... I thought they'd be man-eating monsters!
I can have alcohol? Really?! Are you sure? Thank you! Now what to try first... Hehehe...
Happy New Year. I look forward to another year together... That was good, right?! I seemed like a totally different person!
Starting this year, I will punish all evil-doers! I'm sure I can do it.
231038: Ugh... How many times do I need to tell them NOT to call me Leni... It's PROFESSOR Leleni! When will they ever learn?
Please tell me you know the secret to getting taller?! Those kids will never take me seriously until I can look down on them for once!
These textbooks are all work and no fun. How do they expect me to get those kids to pay attention with THESE?!
They're finally staying awake during class! Ahh... I'm so happy I could cry! This is all because of you guys—thank you!
M-my students gave me this as thanks! I-I don't know what to say... I never expected them to do something that nice for me!
Grading, homework checks, class prep... Those kids certainly keep me busy... Maybe I should just hire an assistant.
I'm Professor Tor Leleni, of the Voluntas Academy. Did you catch that? I'm a teacher, NOT a student!
I feel like I'm in the midst of a growth spurt! Give it some time and those kids will respect me before you know it!
111021: Go on, don't be shy. Tell Santa what you want. Whatever it is, I'll be sure to work my magic to get it for you.
Hey, this outfit doesn't look too shabby on me. Even Aperio seems to have taken a liking to it.
You know that I don't like the holidays—let alone kids... Are you sure you want me to go through with this?
Perhaps my behavior doesn't set the best example for the kids... But I can't help it if they imitate me, now can I? Hehe.
You know, I also have a sweet tooth... How about you and I go get ourselves some sweets today? Even a queen needs her days off.
Presents? Can't say I've gotten many in my life. Does Aperio count? Now that I think about it, maybe I have received plenty of gifts after all.

Your queen finally shows up, and this is how you treat her? On your knees!
Hehe. Consider that your present for the holidays.
I'm getting used to this Santa business. I'm going to keep giving out presents to everyone—kids, adults, whoever! Happy holidays, hehe.
211026: The town is too lively during this time of year. I can't help but wonder if someone like me belongs here.
I'll be sure to mind my manners during the holidays. Everything in moderation.
Hm? Ah, my apologies. I was just... overcome by nostalgia for a moment.
The streets of Palpebra are so... warm and welcoming, even to someone like me. I will do everything I can to protect this place.
I'm a little too used to my military uniform. I don't mind wearing this outfit, but... My subordinates would've surely had a laugh over it.
Hmm... I'm running out of space... Oh, this? It's a fan letter. I tend to get a lot of them around here. It's like I'm back at the military academy.
Trine, reporting for duty. Curious about the outfit? It's for a job. If it helps get everyone in the holiday spirit, I don't mind wearing it.
Happy holidays. I hope this season brings you joy.
231032: Apparently, this outfit is meant to resemble that of a choirboy. Hmm. At the very least, it should prove to be useful.
Of course I don't hate festivals. Everyone is so cheerful and relaxed. It's easier to take advantage of them when their guard is down.
I suppose I am skilled at picking presents... But really, it's simple—you just need to find out a person's deepest desires, and prod away at them.
Hmm. This is a hard one. I'm at a loss for what to get you in return. But thank you for the present. I appreciate it.
It's the holidays, so a feast is in order. Of course I'll put something together—though I do expect to get something in return as well.
I never thought I'd become the type of person who gives out presents. And to you, of all people. Heh. Happy holidays!
Come now, it's rude to stare. Don't think I can't tell what you're thinking—you're so easy to read.

I'm hung up on the past? Not at all.
In fact, I'm in the mood to celebrate. Happy holidays!
361015: A-although I can't say I'm a people person, I can make an exception for the holidays.
You know, way back when there was this wild holiday party where... N-nevermind. Forget I said that!
The holidays are great and all, but I'd honestly rather be at a convention with my brethren!
It's the outfit, isn't it? I get the feeling that wherever I go, people are just staring... I-I'm overthinking things, right?!
I hope no one catches on that handing out presents is just a front for recruiting the next generation of like-minded fiction-lovers! Hehe...
I can appreciate a nice Santa cosplay when I see it... But actually wearing one myself is a different story!
H-happy holidays... So this is what it feels like to be on the receiving end of fanservice... I don't like it!
You know what? I'm over it. I'm gonna commit to this Santa shtick! Ho, ho, ho, have some presents! Now where's my cookies and milk?
161033: Santa sure is cool! He can fly, and he prepares presents for all the good girls and boys... That's a lotta work!
You want a present too? Well, when you ask like that, how can I say no? Here you go!
I'm gonna stay up and wait for Santa! I can't wait to catch him in the act! Hehe.
So sweet... So yummy! I just wanna eat cookies like this for the rest of my life!
Happy holidays! It's a cookie! Alk taught me how to make them! Aren't I a good learner?
I fell asleep, so I couldn't catch Santa... At least my sister told him thank you for me... Maybe next year I'll use Shadow Chariot.
Happy holidays! It's me, Arum! Do you like my new clothes? Sisty bought them for me! Hehehe!
On, Shadow Chariot! Today, we're taking over for Santa! Happy holidays!
243013:
Don't laugh.
I said don't laugh, dammit!
I'm gonna get you for this, Alk...

Ho, ho, ho. Happy holidays.
There, I said it. Happy? Wait, what are you—I thought I said no more decorations, Stella! Gah.
Happy freakin' holidays, you crazy world-hoppers! All right, 'nuff talking. Let's get this party started!
I'm a lucky tiger. Before, I had nothing. Zilch. Now, I've got more stuff than I can carry! That's why I figured, I gotta give some of it back, you know?
Naughty or nice? Making a list? I don't have time for that nonsense—everyone get in here and let's party it up!
Hey, Light, how about we down this bottle together? Come on, just a sip then! Whaddya mean I'm just looking for an excuse to drink?

Urgh... Seriously, can't you guys get me a better outfit than this? No? You sure? Come on, please?
*sigh*
Heh. Don't give me that gloomy look. It's time to eat and drink ourselves stupid! That's what the holidays are all about.
121015: I will provide any assistance I can as long as our objectives align. Just let me know how I can help.
Alk's cooking really is superb. I thought I grew up with good food, but... it appears the price tag does not always denote quality.
Perhaps this is disrespectful to say, but... I feel that the Champion and I have much in common when it comes to our plights and thoughts.
What is it, Alk? Ah, you wish to freeze ingredients with my eye. I suppose it would work, but you'd need me to defrost everything.
I lost my power and reason to fight, so I clung to my pride instead... How could I be such a fool?
That man... The dark mage, was it? Why is he after my Oculus? He must have an ulterior motive, but what?
I am Reylas Oraclus. If you assist me, then I shall return the favor in kind. I appreciate your cooperation.
This sword and my eye are yours to command. However, beware their power. They have been known to twist the hearts of man.
351021: Oh, don't mind me, I just like standing around... B-but if you need any help, call me, ok?
These clear blue skies truly are something! I'd pick these over the neon lights back in the dome any day...
I know it sounds silly, but I do miss being online. I wonder if the next part of my favorite webcomic is out...
Heyo... I was wondering if we could stop by Qualia City? Why? Well... there's this new game I've been dying to play...
Target spotted! Opening fire! RELOADING! Oh! Sorry about that, this new training manual has really gotten me fired up!
3MM Security, deployed and ready to go! Erm, sorry, was running on instinct from my previous job there. I'm Katyusha. It's nice to meet you.
I'm still new to this... But if it was in basic training, I think I can do it! Maybe!
111015: Heh... The smell of gunpowder... The sound of the blast... The aftershock that shakes your whole body... Fireworks are amazing...
Hmm... It's a bit breezy and hard to move in, but... whatever. Not like I need to do much snooping.
Cute? Hmph, wanna try saying that again?
My master? Hmm, she's like a tiny ball of energy. It's kinda cute.
Friends, huh? They're a bit annoying, but... I guess they're fun to be around.
Ninja arts are pretty basic. You've got stuff like holding your breath, disguising yourself as someone. I tried making my own, but the other ninjas got mad.
...No, it's me, Hanabi. I know my normal gear was probably fine. Eh, whatever, might as well wear this for the festival.
Did you like the fireworks? Hehe. No worries, I can organize another show anytime. Promise.
151021: A festival is happening right now... The crowds are a bit frightening, but I'm enjoying myself.
Cecilia and Arly picked this dress out for me... What do you think?
Why is the food at these stalls so good? Oooh... I know I shouldn't, but I want to eat everything...
I... I wanted to become like Cecilia and Light and protect the dreams of others... Do you think I've done that?
I've gotten a lot better at controlling my powers! Look! Yah! ...I'm sorry... Please pretend you didn't see that...
I'm going out with Arum today... But it's a secret from Arly... Hehe, it's almost like I'm her big sister too.
Trying new things is scary, but... I had fun. Next I want to try cooking again!
S-so sorry for the wait! These are the clothes everyone picked out for me. They're very fluttery.
I will run no longer. I will become strong, just like those I admire! I am Phiria Hermel, and I am here to fight!
261029: Hehe. Not bad, right? Now what should I try on next?
ARUM! Quit stuffing your face like that! Ugh... Now your face is all sticky... Come here, I'll get you cleaned up.
Crowds aren't exactly a problem for me, but they wear me out. Arum tends to get lost easily...
Someday... I hope to see fiends and humans smiling and laughing together...
I am NOT giddy. It's more like I'm dumbfounded... Human festivities are so elaborate. You'd never see this in Pandemonium.
It's pretty obvious with Phiria, but Cecilia can also be surprisingly absentminded. Sometimes I worry when we're together...
What are you looking at? This was the only thing that was my size and fit my wings... I'll admit it looks nice though.
I know all too well how weak I am, but I'm still Arum's big sister. I don't want to lose her again!
141021: Sir Alk, I look forward to our sparring match today... As well as tomorrow, the next day, and the day after that.
Oh, dear... Have you fallen for me? Hehe, I'm just teasing you. That being said, feel free to tell me I'm beautiful.
The wielder of the blade of Oinas just keeps slipping through our fingers... Whatever shall we do?
I've decided to explore more than just the world of swords. I may find something that will make me stronger! I look forward to your continued guidance.
Look! The knights of Tris have asked me for another sparring match! I can't believe it... I truly can't...
I'm going shopping with Hanabi. She may act annoyed, but she'll give in one out of every three times I ask her. Now then, I'll be off.
Hehe, I'm joining the ceremony, so I prepared a change of clothes. Don't you just love it?
This isn't about forgetting the past. In order to walk the same path as Sir Alk and Lady Stella, I must aim to be the best of the best.
251029: Festival or not, we mustn't shirk our patrolling duties. The law and order of the streets depends on us.
I certainly hope no one gets out of line. I understand it is a festival, but we should not go overboard with the celebrations.
I too wish to enjoy the festivities, but every time I try, I end up going on patrol again... I really am quite set in my ways, aren't I?
Lady Phiria and I were looking at the stars— or rather, the worlds out there. It truly is a beautiful sight.
I quite like this outfit, but... Now when I stroll the streets, people call out to me... What am I supposed to do when that happens? How humiliating...
Lady Phiria and I are both continuing down our own paths... And we have the people of this village to thank for that.
M-my attire may differ, but my resolve as a knight still remains. I shall continue my duties as a guard to the best of my abilities!
We will walk as one, and fight as one! Such is the knightly code by which I abide!
131020: I come in peace—mostly just to record the curious behavior of you organics during celebrations. What? You don't believe me? Heh-heh.
With this new outfit I'm more human than ever before! But the main attraction is my new taste and smell functions—what's for dinner, Alk, mon ami?
Oh dear, it seems I've been spotted. Please don't tell our darling canary I was here, all right? This will be our little secret.
What a beautiful violet hue... And that fragrance! So THIS is the decadent "wine" I'd heard so much about. Not bad!
Though we may be imperfect, twisted, and broken, we continue to live our lives. Then slowly but surely, we change. Remember that, Stella.
That's enough sulking for now, we've still got a Flipperversary to celebrate! And money to make, heh. Ah, I mean... fun to have! Yes.
Rec Register here—you weren't planning on celebrating without me, were you? I even got dressed for the occasion. I look great in white, don't I?
Androids were modeled after humans. In that sense, I too am human. It's really not that bad, all things considered.
221017:
Your back is definitely in my top five...
I wonder what will happen if I give it a little poke? Hehe.
Please, don't be alarmed! I'm just an adventurer... Oh, are you worried about this knife? That's just for protection...
Staying undetected is definitely my forte... I just really don't like it when people look at me...
Strong backs, slender backs, broad backs... I love them all! You know, you can really tell a lot about a person by their back.
I never would have imagined that the world is so BIG! Just look at all the backs around us... Where do I even begin?!
Oh, sorry about that... I guess only time will tell if I get used to people looking at me or not...
M-my name is Vivi... I'm just a regular adventurer! Why am I behind you? Don't worry, I just happen to love backs! Hehe.
I'm more confident than ever, thanks to you! The new Vivi is ready to tackle anything head-on! Or, maybe from behind. Hehe.
251023: I will treat any and all wounded. That resolve has made me a wanted man, but I have no regrets.
Oh dear, you look terrible. How about a checkup?
I can't believe so many different organic life-forms gather here... Perhaps someone will let me open them up.
What a wonderful place this is. I can travel to other worlds and study their medicine. I cannot thank you enough.
A great doctor can treat any patient, even a crying child. I'll cheer them up with a silly face.
I am here because of what my brother gave me. Someday, I hope to do the same for someone else.
I am Medic Maintainer, but you may call me Mech. Pardon me for asking, but... could I see your insides?
The more I study the medical techniques of other worlds, the more I wish to learn and treat! I can't take it!
311019: I want to make my customers smile, so I take care not to miss even a single stitch.
Hehe, leave it to me. I'll come up with an outfit that will make your heart soar.
Most of my customers are women, but that doesn't mean men aren't welcome.
You can change someone's life with  a single outfit. That's why I show people the joys of fashion! Ah, but I would never force anyone, of course.
Following trends is fine, but what matters most are the wearer's feelings. You have to respect everyone's tastes!
Bringing you joy with a single outfit! Welcome to my store. What sort of apparel are you looking for today?
Look, I spun up a new design! Perhaps I should make this my next release... Hehe, I'm just full of new ideas lately!
251017: I must travel to more worlds and learn from them if I am to become smarter and wiser. Hopefully I don't come across as simply sightseeing...
Stella, shall we go shopping for necessities? I'm technically a newcomer in this world, so feel free to put me on bag duty. *giggle*
Palpebra is a lively place, isn't it? I wonder if Excelion was once the same way, a long time ago.
I came to the library today to do some studying and research. I have quite a bit of catching up to do if I am to keep up with those two.
Alk, would you mind sparring with me? No one in the other world was willing to face me seriously. Give me everything you've got—no holding back.
Phew... Oh, I'm here to skip—er, take a break from my duties. I don't have to act like royalty over here, so I find it easier to relax.
Lilith Stratos, last of the royal line, reporting for duty. I swear to fight alongside you, my friends!
I can never become like you, but that doesn't mean I won't find my own way ahead. Still, you'll watch over me, won't you?
161027: So this is what the world is like. It is beautiful... to an almost irritating degree.
Do not mistake me. We aren't friends—merely allies who have reached an accord.
There is a library in this village? Hmm... How long has it been since I last sat down with a book...
I need only a faint light—just enough to brighten the dark road ahead of me. I will protect its flame. That is what I swore.
You wish to know more about Pandemonium? ...How peculiar. Very well, it's time for a lecture.
Alk, would you tell me more about your adventures in other worlds? Oh, you want... tea? Snacks? Heh, all right.
To lead my people to a new tomorrow, I will fight alongside you and your allies, no matter who stands in our way.
The curse is still within me. I will carry it until the end... That is my wish.
141015: To become strong, one must fight with one's head held high, even if that means accepting one's burdens and short stature.
I'm eager to see the new world we shall build together... and whether or not it has been worth tying my destiny to yours.
It is the right of those chosen by the heavens above to forge a path ahead. Though perhaps describing it as a duty is more accurate?
The elves are an intelligent and beautiful race, but they are also embedded in their ways. Trying to subtly pull them out is a monumental task.
Our journey continues. The fate of the elves, humans, fiends... Of all the stars... They rest at our feet. The fight is not yet over.
This village is full of fools who have no understanding of social hierarchy. It is lovely to see. Those in power aren't immune to criticism.
Rejoice, for destiny is at hand. I am Estariel, Paragon of Hope, and the one who will bring change to the high elves.
The elves were created a long, long time ago. They were meant to be the perfect race, but look at me! This short stature is far from ideal!
241015: Palpebra... was amazing. I have a headache from all the lights and sounds, but still... I want to go again some time.
Alk and the others are my friends now. Heh-heh. I'm so lucky.
I really like Meow-Meow! He's so big and fluffy, I forget all my worries.
Stella laughs a lot. That's what's great about her. Hmm? Did I say something weird?
Alk went out of his way to get to know me. That's what makes him "hot." ...That's not what "hot" means? But he matches the definition I learned!
Back when I lived in the forest, I never... I never realized how lonely it was.
It's nice and windy here... I'm Hao. Nice to meet you.
Your spirits can't join the winds, not yet. I'll hunt down anything in your way!
161021: Lord of Void and Darkness, I swear to you—I WILL find a way to break your seal and set you free! MUAHAHAHA—*cough* *hack*
Well, well! The archives of Starview Village... What manner of ancient tomes will I find? Huh... There are a lot of comics here... Are these ALL Stella's?
"Starview Village" is fine and all, but how about a more EPIC name? "The Celestial Observatory"! Or... "Empyrean Overlook" or something?
This world has as many, if not MORE, mysteries than the Lord of Void and Darkness himself! How is that possible?!
Ahh, nothing like a beer in the afternoon! Huh? No, I don't have a problem. What do you mean "day drinker"?!

The STARS, huh... This means I could take over the entire GALAXY! Muahaha!
Wh-what? Did I... just say something?
What do you mean you won't let me cook, Alk? COME ON, at least give me a chance, I swear I'm good at it!

Before you stands DENAH SELPHIS, dark maiden and dutiful servant of the KING OF VOID AND DARKNESS!
...You can clap now.
My journey across the stars with you has led me to find EVEN GREATER POWER! You have my thanks! Away, to more unreal adventures!
261023: ...You're kidding, right? I'd rather be a wanted criminal than someone else's lackey.
Take in the incense, and enjoy the most pleasant of dreams...
So many herbs to choose from... Hehe. Just think of all the fun we can have with these!
Just promise you won't get too attached, okay? Trust me, you wouldn't want to...
Worked up a sweat, did we? Just relax, and take in this incense. It'll help you... I promise. Hehe.
No matter where you go, there will always be wrongdoers looking to harm others. *sigh* No rest for the wicked, I suppose.
The name's Zelma—just an honest hardworking herbalist. Although some know me as the Purple Haze Rebel. Hehe, silly, isn't it?
The only person I serve is myself. I do what I want, whenever I want. If anybody were to get in my way... Heh-heh.
211020: I-if I were to ask someone for help, they'd see me for the fraud I am!

So, um, if I just use this catalyst here for this element, that should—AAAGH!
...Pheeew!
Everyone expects so much out of me... I can't let them down no matter what!
I think I finally understand. Asking others for help isn't something to be ashamed of. Alllllk! Make me something to eat!
Ah, nothing like a fresh pot of Alk's tea after a day of classes... It's moments like these that make it all worth it, you know?
So you wish to enroll in my class? Very well. Let's begin with a basic magic examination. Ready?
I'm Nicola, a professor at the Voluntas Academy of Magic. Feel free to ask me anything about the arcane arts!
Interested in magic, are you? I'd be more than happy to educate you. Just make sure you study and—AAAUGH!
161015: Take a look at this! I really like this head design, I'm thinking of installing it. Now I can change my hairstyle too, just like you organics can!
Trick or treat! I highly recommend forking over some candy—or you'll be in for quite the pranking!
I'm your number one favorite idol, right Stella? Yay! I'll make sure not to let you down!
Alk food time! Yay! Now that I have taste buds and a food processing unit installed, I can properly enjoy Alk's amazing cooking!
