I want to do another flash mob concert! I was all obsessed with being the best, but just having fun with my friends is way better!
Songs have the incredible power to convey emotions... But I believe that such power lies within ALL people.

All eyes and electrons on me! Lil Devil Dia here, ready to cause mischief!
Hmm... Is that too off-brand? You know what, forget it!
Sing with me, everyone! All you living people, and you dead ones too! It's Halloween, after all!
261017: I've never worn clothes like this. I don't think they suit me. What do you think?

Trick or treat.
What's the trick? Um. I'll read your deepest, darkest thoughts. Or something.
How is my tail moving? Hehe. That's a secret.

You want me to act more like a cat?
Okay. Uh... Meow?
Halloween is really fun. Spending time with everyone. Together. It really feels like... I'm alive.
What do you think? Of my new outfit. Was my "rebranding" successful? I don't really know...
Trick or treat! Give me candy. Or else I'll scratch you. It should be an easy choice.
Thanks for the sweets. I'll give you some of mine in return. I hope you like ghost candies.
231020: Happy Halloween! Nothin' like a good party, right? Everyone needs to loosen up once in a while!

Trick or treeeat! *giggle*
If you don't have any candy for me, I'll just have to experiment on you!
How'd you like some candy that'll make all your troubles go away? Made especially by yours truly.
Observe, hypothesize, experiment, conclude. Isn't the scientific method just wonderful?
Ghosts love a good shindig! It's like an all-you-can-capture specimen buffet!
Is it Halloween already? Sorry, I must've lost track during my latest experiment. Whatever, holidays are made up anyway.
Test or sweet! Wait, no, that's not right... Trick or treat!
Think I could continue my research even after becoming a ghost? But I suppose doing the same thing forever wouldn't be fun either...
351015: No harm in a little candy—as long as you brush your teeth afterwards!
Wh-WHOA?! I have plenty of treats to go around, so no more tricks!
I'm having fun just admiring all the crazy costumes!
I've got a huuuuge bag of candy ready for trick-or-treaters! *giggle* I'm sure they've been looking forward to Halloween!
The kids always have tricks up their sleeves. But I may have learned a thing or two... Let me just... BOO! Ahaha, sorry, sorry!
Trick or treat! Hand over the candy and no one gets pranked! ...Oh, relax, I'm just kidding!
He-hello, Corinna, at your service. The kids wanted me to dress up with them, but the costume's not TOO over-the-top, is it?
E-even I need to let loose sometimes, right? *giggle* Well then... trick or treaaat!
151013: I've had enough of working! I want to just spend the entire day loafing around!
When I first relocated from the Farlands to Palpebra, I was bewildered by the differences. But now, I adore them! Life here is much more... carefree!
Zzz... The only thing better than falling asleep... is going back to sleep. So it is written... in the sacred texts...
How exactly did Starview Village come to be? Perhaps it, too, was a work of the heavens...
Yoo-hoo, Master Alk! It's me again. I would like a snack and a place to lie down! Please vacate your bed!
Being purely a figurehead isn't easy. Still, I'll give it my all. I have to live up to the expectations of everyone who looks up to me!
My name is Orvelle, I'm a high priestess—and saint too, I suppose. *yawn* May I please go home now? I want to go back to bed...
Divine punishment rain down upon you! Hehe. If it means I can get more leisure time, I'll spare no effort. Let's do this!
151014: Nothing quite beats having a home to come back to at the end of the day. I could definitely get used to this.
I guide all who are lost, no matter who they are and where they may be.
It's odd how many distortions there are in the midways. I do hope we can eventually find a safe way to bypass them.
I used to stay out, never wanting to come home... Nowadays I cut my adventures short, just so I can hurry back to enjoy one of Alk's meals.
I won't stop delving into the Kaleidoscope, no matter what. I was given this power to aid the lost, and I'm going to use it for exactly that.
It's nice that we can still join hands for a time, even if our paths ultimately diverge...
Pleased to make your acquaintance. I'm Firamelia. You wish to know if... I'm the guide from the rumors? What rumors are you talking about?
Oh my, are you lost? There, there. We'll get you out of here in no time. Take this lamp, and follow its flame home.
261011: Hmm? Why are you frowning? The tea should smell and taste fine. I assure you the beaker is sanitized as well.
You want me to tidy up my room? It's already plenty organized though. Look, everything is set up efficiently for research.
Why do you seem concerned? I always take proper precautions while fighting, and can concoct 15 types of antidotes on the spot.
Hahaha! Time for the practical application! Next, I'll gather data on this weapon—ah, are we done already?
Alchemy exists to create a better tomorrow. It is my honor and duty to develop technology for this very purpose.
I was so caught up in my work, I forgot a "better tomorrow" includes me as well.
Hmm? If you're looking for Bryce the alchemist, you've found him... What's the proper procedure for introductions again...
Hahahaha! Practical application is so exhilarating! I need more data! You'll take me to more monster-infested areas, won't you?!
211013: Ready yourself, yokai! Huh? Light? For a split second, I thought you were a yokai!
What's wrong? Are you all right? Just leave everything to me!
Training is essential for any serious swordsman. If I get lazy with my daily 10,000 strikes, I start to get antsy.
Hey, listen to this! I saw a yokai, and I didn't even pull out my sword! Pretty good, huh?!
Every time I help a yokai, I realize anew that my path is different from my father's. But I don't regret it, because this is my own path!
There are plenty in this world who aren't humans or yokai. It doesn't make any difference to me. I'll respond to anyone's call for help!
Hey there. I'm Kuramaru! If you need help with yokai, I'm your guy! I'll come running anywhere, anytime!
I can feel power flowing through me! There's no one who can stand against me now! Let me take the lead!
121008: Are my knees trembling? Indeed. Are my nerves giving out? Most assuredly. Hah-hah-hah! So hurry and assist me this instant!
A man cannot take action when his knees are weak, nor can he defend others without his shield. At such a time, the only option is to surf!
Equipment is fastened down, and I've done my calisthenics! Safety routines are part of a soldier's fundamentals, so I must set a good example.
To err is human. When a man fails, all he can do is reflect on his mistakes, pick himself up, and try again!
My reputation is my pride! Once I take up a challenge, I never give up—no matter how many tries it takes! The one thing to forgo is hurting others.
Summer is here and so am I! Ride the waves! Ride the wind! Ride the high! A spectacular sight is about to unfold before your very eyes!
Hah-hah-hah! No one said it would be easy! But if you will support me, I vow to look after and protect you all with Lord's Aegis!
261010: A different world? Yeah, I know what that is! It's like when you have a world, and then you have another one... but it's... different. Right?!
I'm the man who's gonna be the greatest adventurer in the world! H-how? I'm still working that part out...
So strange... Before, I had money, right? Then I went to this restaurant, and wouldn't you know it? No more money. How do these things keep happening?!
Look, I'll be honest. I'm no good at math. I have no idea how to calculate request fees—I've just been winging it this whole time.
Being with you guys reminds me of tales my grandpa used to tell. All those stories of adventurers who helped each other out—that's us to a tee!
I'm counting on you guys! Which means... you guys can count on me too. Of course!
The name's Grieg. Feel free to call on me for help, you hear? Doesn't matter when or where—I'll come running!
I'll watch your backs, and you watch mine! That's how the best adventurers do it, right?
211012: Eek! D-don't scare me like that! If you do, even I don't know what might happen...
I hear a voice... I'm losing myself. But that's all right... I almost want it to come take me away...
This village seems so safe... There are no bandits or anything. I can hardly believe it...
I know I can never get it back... But that's all right. I'll become the flame, so nobody can ever steal from me again!
If I didn't have this blade, maybe it wouldn't have turned out like this... But I know it also means... I wouldn't be standing here right now.
You guys, just keep getting stronger and stronger, okay? That's my wish for you...
I am... Nasir... Please... don't bother yourselves with me...
A voice calls to me... It's been calling to me since I was little. It tells me I can never forgive. That's why... I know what I must do...
351009: No can take vegetable? Must pay money? Hmm... No understand human world...
Fire so beautiful. So bright... Want fly into... But then, probably die.
Human amazing! Market human make Mora cocoon into handkerchief! In forest, no one can do. So surprise!
Mora cocoon sturdy, soft! Want me make you something? Will do! Work hard, for everyone!
I shop at vegetable store! Alk, friends, help me learn! Thank you!
Me Mora! Please teach about human! How lay egg? How spin thread?
When enter room, must knock. Money use buy vegetable. I learn many thing! Thank everyone!
161008: Fiiine, if you insist. I'll tag along. Wait, are those snow cones? I want one!
Slowpoke. Try and catch me if you can. Ahahaha! Not that you can fly after me!
I'm not interested in playing games for kids. A real grown-up would... go for a test of courage or something.
You want a bite? Well... Maybe if you ask nicely, I'll consider it. Ahahaha!
Mmm, the food here is delicious! I don't think I've had anything this tasty before—except for Alk's cooking, of course!
*sigh* I don't want to go home yet... Oh, don't give me that! I had fun, okay?
Don't just stand around! Let's get going! I promise, we're going to have the best summer ever!
Hehe, did you see what a good job I did? If that doesn't prove I'm a proper lady, then I don't know what does! Hey! Nimbus, are you listening?
261009: To protect and care for all that is BEAUTIFUL in this world—that is my duty! No, it is the duty of all who are graced with the love of BEAUTY!
Hehe. The scorching summer sun calls to my skin, begging it to reveal itself! How could I ignore its plea?
There's nothing to be afraid of—lay your heart bare before me! Strip off all excess and leave only that which drives you forward. THAT is beauty.
Love, in all its power, can distort. It can even rob us of our beautiful futures... Still, I can't deny—there is yet BEAUTY in clinging to love.
Say, shall we do something really exciting? Hehe, that startled face of yours is truly GORGEOUS!
I've seen it before—how a fledgling musters up the courage to spread its wings and fly. That BEAUTIFUL sight is what spurs me to keep fighting!
The sun and sea call to us with fervor! Come, my BEAUTIFUL friends! Let us answer their call!
The world abounds in BEAUTY—the vermillion sea, the countless stars above. For these blessings, let us repay the world in kind!
221011: Do not let my appearance deceive you—I am indeed a knight! Who knows what manner of trouble could crop up at a resort like this! We must stay vigilant!
An inner tube! This is perfect! Now I need not fear sinking. With this, I am complete, a truly invincible knight—W-wait! Give that back! I cannot swim!
Tridents are marvelous weapons. They are light and slide gracefully through the water, perfect for aquatic combat! ...And for fishing as well!
Even for a knight, there are foes who are simply too formidable—against whom we are powerless. I speak, of course, of women.
What? My outfit is perfectly fine. The helmet matches my swimsuit, and this inner tube is very hip. Ugh, it's impossible to keep up with big city fashion trends.
Gerard of House Martel, knight of the seashore, at your service! Forgive my unexpected visit—I wish only to be of aid.
I shall fight them on the beaches! I shall fight them on the landing grounds! I am Gerard, of the House of Martel, and I walk the path of the knight!
331014: The ocean's pretty awesome, isn't it? You've got ruins, adventure, and treasure galore! Plus the fish are super tasty!
You know, I could probably slap on wings and take off for the skies! I'll have a craftsman whip up a pair when I get the chance.
I can't wait to see what kinda treasure awaits me in the next ruins!
Hold it right there! You know I can't go around wearing anything that'll fly up...
Sometimes being this light isn't very convenient, but it sure has bailed me out of some sticky situations. I'm kinda into it, to be honest.
Name's Flana! I'm a salvager who happens to be light as a feather! It's nice to meet you!
I regret nothing. Adventuring with you guys is better than any treasure out there!
151012: Do you need any help? I can handle anything from housework to adventures... A performance? Certainly, if you're sure that's what you'd like.
You want to know if I like music? Well, I'm not really sure. I haven't given much thought to my likes or dislikes...
Your cooking is wonderful, Alk. You're able to do so much with so little, it's remarkable. If only I had known about this sooner.
Today's performance was another great success. I felt such joy to see you all gathered together, enjoying my music.
Not quite, Stella, try moving like this. Ah, not quite that way, try again! Watch your wrist—ah, teaching is much more difficult than I expected…
To think that all along I actually loved music. I've surprised even myself. But I'm glad. I'm glad I was able to remember.
I recently received a new piece from a certain android composer, but it's extremely difficult. Still, I love a good challenge!
I am Lyra Ebelsorte, adventurer, at your service. I am skilled in adventuring, housework, and perhaps also... music.
To think that even someone such as myself could inherit something so precious. I must pass something on in return.
223001: Crude? Who, me? I have no idea what you mean! Hey, I'm talking to you! Don't look away from me!
Huh? Why would I be embarrassed? I didn't do all those sit-ups for nothing, you know. Check out how flat my stomach is!
Hey, come on! Time for some fun! Here's what I'm thinking: feast like a queen, party hard, then pass out and sleep for a day or two!
Hee hee. It's okay, we're all good! We're laughing with you, not at you!
You can't change the past, and you can't get back what's gone for good. What you can do, though, is keep moving forward. Let's do so together!
The beach is sure great at night. That feeling when the cool sand gets between your toes... Try it out, Stella! See? Feels good, right?

On my honor as captain of the Crimson Blades, I promise you...
This is gonna be the best. Summer. Ever!
Our vacation may be over, but our adventure goes on! No matter where we go next, we'll go there together!
141008: Food is quite fascinating. This flavor in particular... What did you call it? "Spicy," was it? I will have more!
Being of this stature has many demerits. There are many places on my body that are impossible to scratch. Luckily, I have Lucia to help out in that regard.
Go just a few hundred years without speaking, and the next thing you know, you've forgotten how to do it. Do not make the same mistake I did.
There are things we cannot change. And there are things we can. I know for a fact that I have changed... Perhaps for the better.
A slight acidity amid the sweetness, and...a note of citrus, well-blended with the bitter liqueur... It seems my culinary vocabulary has expanded.
The women around me pay for my food. I do not work. Is there a term for that in your language? ...Why are you making that face?

My name... is Schult. I am... a dragon.
Allow me... to accompany you.
Saved by the very humans I meant to save! You are quite fascinating indeed... Do not worry—I have fight left in me yet!
251011: People often say, "All you do is ring a bell. It looks so easy!" or "How can you charge so much for 5 minutes of work?" Being a lockpick is rough...
What do you have for me to open today? Actually, it's your lucky day—I've got a special going on right now! Let's have a look!
Since I started adventuring with all of you, my life's gotten so much more exciting! I can't wait to visit all sorts of different places!
Sometimes I can even see the locks people place on themselves. You'd better keep a close eye on your secrets! Hehe, I'm only kidding.
It's best when the lock tells me it's ready to be opened. Yes, it's ideal when it wants to open up of its own accord.
Hmm... I bet I could use this power on other things, too. You know, it feels like I've unlocked something else, too—my potential!
Hyaaah! No locked door can stand in my way! I'm Keyana. Nice to meet you!
There are some locks you just can't undo, no matter how much you want to. But never mind that! I'll always do my best for you!
131014: You don't know how much it hurt to stop by Starview and find no one home!
Want to spend some time together, honey bun? We're allowed a little fun while we're on vacation.
Oh, this little pinch in my chest must be what happiness feels like.
I'm not letting anybody else put sunscreen on Stella! I've been waiting for this day for so long—no one's going to beat me to it!
After all this time, he still thinks he's a hero... A shame. He used to be such a sweet little kid.
I'm no blushing maiden. Stare as much as you want while you have the chance, hehe.
What's the point of a vacation if you don't have a little fun? I'm sure you'll forgive me for going a teensy bit wild!
Would you hold my hand? Yes, just like that. This way we won't stumble even on a starless night. Remember this, okay?
231013: Hmm... What should I do today? Something exciting would be nice... I wanna make today count!
Failure's not a problem—you just have to take it on the chin. Grin and bear it. If you're gonna meet your end, it's best to go out with a smile!
When you LOOK your best, you can DO your best and bring a smile to those around you. There's nothing quite as beautiful as a smile.
Take a look at this—I got myself a planner! Now I'll have no problem keeping track of all the promises I made! Is this a great idea or what?
Tomorrow is a mystery! Who knows what it could bring? That's why everyone always gives their all. I guess... I can try to do that, too.
Is this your world? Not bad, not bad. But you never know when we'll have to say goodbye... so until then, let's have some fun together!
We've had more than a few great adventures together, haven't we? But I have a feeling there are a ton more to come!
321013:
I'm super sorry for all those pranks I pulled! I promise I'll stop!
Hehe, if you believe that, then I've got a bridge to sell you!
Scouts need all sorts of explosives, you know! Flash bombs, smoke bombs... Yes, and they're also great for pranks—I mean, flanks! For flanking!
It takes a lotta agility to be a scout! Like this! Catch me if you can!
I'm baaack! All clear up ahead. I scouted the heck outta that area. What are we waiting for? Let's go!
The last group I was with was so boring! But you guys... you guys are all right! Your reactions to my pranks are just priceless!
Ritta's the name—scouting's my game. If you need a guide, I'm your gal! Looking forward to working with you!
Scouting is lonely work, and it can get a bit scary, too. But no worries—I can do it! For the sake of my friends.
251010: Sometimes when the sun is too strong, I start to feel faint. Let's take a break and find some shade every so often, okay?
The clerk really thought I should buy it, so I did... Do you think this outfit is a bit too bold for me?
A tropical island vacation, how exciting. I'll make sure to look after everyone, so we can all be safe and healthy!
I pray that we may have more guiding stars come into this world, to watch over us and lead us into the Light.
I am more than content to partake of only bread and water, but I must admit... Having ice cream with your friends is really enjoyable! Would you like a bite?
I think I've gotten used to walking around in this swimsuit... Maybe the heat's getting to my head?
My clerical robes were way too hot, so I changed out of them. How would you like a healer on your summer trip?
Did I find love this summer? I'm still not sure yet. But I am having a really good time!
111009: Summer means the beach, and beaches mean treasure! My paws are itching to dig up some loot!
Keep staring at me in my swimsuit, and I might just eat you up! Don't mess with a hunter!
Hoo boy, I sure am hungry! I'll go hunt us some fish!
Woo, that was fun! We got so many treasures already, but there's more to be found! Our summer's just getting started!
They say there's a mysteriously powerful treasure sleeping in the ocean somewhere. Ohh, I've just got to have it!
Sunsets are great in the desert, but they're super pretty on the beach too! Let's come back again sometime!
Just call me Midsummer Mia! Ready to scour the ocean for all its booty!
Another day, another successful hunt! It's so fun hanging out with everyone! I'll treasure these memories forever, heh!
131013: No matter what world we're in or who's watching, I'll always put on the best show I can! So don't take your eyes off me!
Hot summer sun! Swimsuits on the beach! Are you ready to have some fun? I know I am!
Hmm, you know what's kinda weird? I don't mind wearing costumes on stage, but for some reason this is a little embarrassing...
How about a little summer magic to spice things up? One... Two... Three... Now you can only look at me!
Ngh, I'm so full of ideas, I could explode! No more holding back—it's show time!
Lately, I've been trying to surprise Stella once a day. It's honestly so fun, I might make it a daily routine forever!
Clear skies, blue waters, and warm sand beneath our toes! Summer's just the best, isn't it?
There's still so much more I can do, like underwater light shows or dancing with the mermaids! You won't want to miss my next performance!
231012: What do you think of my swimsuit? Pretty good, right? Hehe, with a poker face like that, you're going to lose all your bets!
Lazing around like this every once in a while isn't so bad... Can get a bit boring though.
Now that we finally have a chance to relax, why not cut loose a little? One game! That's all I'm asking for!
Betting beats lazing around any day! I'm off to the casino, and none of you can stop me!
So people back home consider me a legend, huh? I'm in it for the thrills though—not the adoring fans.
Marina helped me out way back when. At one point, I even wanted to be like her, but now... Now I consider her a rival I'd hate to lose to!
Beaches sure feel different when you're on vacation! Let's have some fun in the sun and save the gambling for another time!
Ahaha! Yeah, who am I kidding? Relaxing is sooo boring! Bring on the bets! No risk, no reward!
341011: I'm more of the intellectual type—which means I don't really like things that tire me out. But it's a different story if you're offering me some sugar.
Hmm? You want to see my magic? First, I have to explain the theories behind it, otherwise you won't understand my magic!
Magic theory is very useful knowledge. You can even use it to tell fortunes. Would you like to know your future?
Every day is an adventure with you people. I'm discovering things previously unknown! It's also been quite helpful for my magic theory studies.
I'm just hitting my growth spurt, so powerful magic will come to me eventually. I just know it! Then everyone will be in awe of the mage I've become.
Interested in magic theory? Fate must have brought us together. Gimme some candy, and I'll tell you whatever you want to know!
What's going on? Is it finally happening? Have I achieved greatness?! This is it—witness the birth of the world's greatest magical genius!
151011: Let's all go out to eat together today! People can really get to be better friends by sharing a meal, you know!
The Gourmet Guild specializes in trying all kinds of foods. It's a lovely crew, if I do say so myself!
Ooh! So you're a hero, are you, Light? Well, then! How about a little contest? Hiyaaah!
The more people you eat with, the more friends you make. How truly wonderful!
The key to survival is food! So fill your belly with the stuff! How can you be at your best without food?!
So this is the World Flipper? A device that lets you travel across worlds and try all different kinds of food? How crazy is that?!
After all those rice balls, I'm full of food and full of energy! I promised Stella I'll take back what's rightfully mine one day, so I'm going to do exactly that!
141007: I must study the ways of different worlds in order to better serve my lord.
Even the nature of spirits here is different from Landosol. How curious...
Palpebra is much more lively than Landosol. It is almost a little too much to take in at times.
Discussing housework with Alk is always a learning experience. Today, too, I have learned new ways to better serve my lord.
No matter what world we are in, I am content so long as I am with my lord.
From sunup until sundown, from the cradle to the grave, I will look after my lord.
To not only have met my lord, but also fine friends like you... My life is truly blessed.
161007: The food here is pretty good, but every once in a while I miss the tastes of Landosol... What? Homesick?! Of course I'm not homesick!
My magic is pretty spectacular, isn't it? Hehe. I know you're amazed—you can admit it.
You mean every single one of those star-like specks is a different world? That's... incredible.
Seeing you all gather around the dining table and share meals together is nice. There's just... something comfy about it.
A pair of matching brooches... It's really nice to have a friend I can do that with. Huh? Sappy?! I'll show you sappy—you shut your mouth or I'll end you!
Starview Village? World Flipper? I have no idea what that means, but whatever! I'll join you, if that's what you want. You can thank me later!
It's not like I'm against having fun. I'll kick back and let loose with these goofballs, at least until I get back to Landosol.
311013: Oh, look at this! The new volume of the Legend of Whitetail was just announced! "The Enigmatic Panther: Whitetail's Dearest Friend." I can't wait!
I may be just a tiny mousefolk boy... but I have just as much pluck and courage in me as any cat or dog!
My favorite one is definitely "Whitetail Strikes Back"! Just when it looks like they're done for, Whitetail comes to the rescue! Ohmygosh he's just so cool!
Master Nimbus complimented me today! Can you believe it? I almost cried on the spot.
Somebody thanked me for helping them today... I can't believe it! I'm one step closer to becoming just like Whitetail!

I'm Sven!
I'm still pretty weak, but just you watch! Someday I'll be as strong and cool as Whitetail!
It's true a lot of stuff in those books might be made up... But that's okay! There's definitely kernels of truth in there, too!
211011: Oh gosh... Nimbus scolded me for not being able to make eye contact again.
Th-these clothes? I'm wearing on them on my master's orders. He said he has his reasons, but... I bet this is just what he's into...
My master is an incredible person! He's handsome, charming, strong... and also very, very scary. *gulp*
I figured it out. I finally know what it means to look somebody in the eyes. It means to really understand them—their pain, hardships, and fears.
I think I've outgrown my fear of fighting. M-maybe I've grown up a little? Hey, what's with that skeptical look?
I-I'm sorry. It's just really hard for me to make eye contact with people. I-it's nice to meet you.
I used to be so timid, unable to look people in the eye, like a scared little puppy. But no more—now I'm like a tiger, ready to stare down its prey!
233001: Heeey, what are you doing just lazing around by yourself? Come on. Hang out with me instead!
Hee hee! Behold! I've cooked a wonderful potato dish for all of you! You'll love it, I'm sure! ...Hey! What's with all the glum faces?!
Hey, Stella! Look! There's a little bug over there! What is it? A stag beetle?! Wow, it's so black! Come see!
Hey, Alk! When are you going to head out again? Next time you go somewhere new, take me with you! Don't forget! Promise?
You know, I started helping out around the town recently! Fixing homes, making birdhouses... What? No! Nobody's taking advantage of me!
Hehe! I'm coming with you, everyone! Hey, what's with the blank stares? Well, whatever! I decided I'm tagging along, so let's go!
I've learned that helping each other out and getting along is the true meaning of being a community! I've got to go tell Simon too!
151009:
Commencing rehearsal of celebratory expressions.
"Amazing." "That's wonderful." "Incredible, isn't it?"

Unable to determine optimal verbiage.
"Street performer" or "street influencer"—which is preferable?

Nephtim finds this dress quite pleasing.
A beautiful white hue, just like Dia.
It is regrettable that we could not form a group. But Nephtim will not give up. Nephtim will have her day.
These beautiful flowers are from Challua. Challua is like a big sister to Nephtim. Or is she a little sister? Note: perform age calculation for Challua.

Currently contemplating the meaning of own existence.
...Does doing so make Nephtim a grown-up?

Commencing anniversary festivities.
Nephtim is a PARTY MACHINE—Apologies. Nephtim got carried away there.

Nephtim just wants to have fun.
Nephtim will work even harder, so she can spend more time with her friends.
161006: Beyond lie endless drifting worlds, swaying to and fro. Could the new world I seek really be among them?
I fell from the heavens, but have no regrets. These wings are a symbol of pride.
Strength is not something absolute. To run away is to live to fight again. Know that this conviction, too, is a form of strength.
Once I was alone, struggling against the cage bars of this world. But no longer.
To let down my guard and trust in others... That is not something I've ever considered. But... I think I could get used to it.
I am known as Olivia. It seems this path I walk toward a new world has now crossed with yours. If so, let me lend you my power.
Your determination has touched my heart—for that I am grateful. I no longer walk alone. Let us go forth toward a new world!
261008: I'm tired of traveling by myself. It just gets so boring! Isn't there anybody around who'll join me on my adventure?
Mother! Father! This place is pretty great, huh? Hey, let's go this way! Or, wait... Maybe that way!
There are so many things here I've never seen before! This is great! Father? Mother? Do you like it here? Hee hee! I think I do too!
Mother's sandwiches are so good. I wish I had one right now. I wonder if I'll ever get to eat one again...
When I can't talk to Mother and Father, I get so lonely... But when I'm with all of you, it's like... I dunno. Like I don't have to feel so alone anymore, you know?
My house was always freezing, which I found weird. Why didn't Mother and Father turn up the heat? But they... weren't really there, were they?
When am I ever gonna get big and strong? If I ever do... maybe I won't be so lonely anymore. Hee hee! That would make me so happy!
Mother! Father! This person looks really kind, don't you think? Maybe I can get them to come on my adventure.
It's so fun being with all of you! Mother, Father, everybody! I love you all so much! Hee hee!
211010: Man, I sure do love the sea! What? But I can't swim, ya say? Pshaw! What does that matter?!
Ahh, Alk's cooking is simply the best, I tell ya! I wish the crew could try it too!
These guns are pretty cool, don'tcha think? Hey! No touching! Marina gave 'em to me!
Never hold back. If you ever need anything—anything at all—let me know. I am your sworn gun! ...Whaddya mean I'm trying too hard to sound cool?
I'd do anything for my mateys! Not even the ocean's depths would scare me! But, erm, if I was ever drowning, you'd help me out like a true friend, right?
Oh, man! You saved my butt! I thought I was a goner for sure! But, wait. Who are you people exactly?
You're a true mate! I'll follow you to the ends of the earth! ...What? I'm getting in your personal space, ya say? Come on, no need to be bashful!
131012: Sparklers? Sure I can make 'em! They've got a certain summery charm to them, don't you think?
Believe it or not, I've actually got an apprentice! She's a runaway ninja with a penchant for explosives. I promised I'd help her set off a real big one!
Prepare carefully and, when you strike, do so boldly. I reckon the key to life is the same as the key to good fireworks!
My dad is hopeless—all he knows is how to make fireworks. So I'm stuck with lookin' after him. Who even cares about that ol' geezer?!
Doesn't matter what amazing materials I can find if my skills aren't up to snuff... I need to train harder!
I'm Botan, the fireworks master! Let's light up the sky together!
When I think about that day—the setting sun, the smiles on everyone's faces—I just get all warm and fuzzy inside! Come on, let's set off another HUGE one!
321012: Cute accessories, a brand new dress, and sweets galore! Now THIS is the life. What? A girl's gotta spoil herself sometimes!
I said I'd leave the past behind, but I kind of miss my hometown from time to time... *sigh* Lame, right?
Uh oh... I spent way too much—I'm totally broke! How am I supposed to stay trendy when I have literally no money?!
No talents? No problem! Don't need them! What you DO need is a dream. Life's more fun that way!
Ohmygosh, let's go on this quest together! After, we can like grab a coffee, or maybe go shopping! Or both! And how about going stargazing after that?!
I'm Samantha! I'm a shaman, but like, I'm thinking of giving that up so I can get into fashion instead. Anyway, nice to meet you!
Whoa! I think my latent shaman abilities just like, awakened or something. Why can't the same happen for my fashion design skills?!
311012: I use the scented oils stored in this pot for aromatherapeutic massages. The fragrance soothes both the mind and body. Would you like to try? Hehe.
All sorts of people pass through Starview Village with so much to teach me. I'm humbled to be able to use my healing skills to help them.
Remember to take it easy! No need to work yourself so hard! Hehe.
It's okay to tell yourself "that's enough for now" every now and then. Just have faith, and you'll never lose sight of what's most important to you.
My mind and body are attuned in perfect harmony... so why on earth am I still so clumsy?!
Greetings. I am Harlisha, a practitioner of the healing arts. Come, let us enjoy a moment of calm serenity—perhaps over a cup of tea?
Are you getting enough rest? Allow me to apply these scented balms to—eep! Oh no, I spilled them everywhere!
221010: My concoctions are to die for. Super special too, considering I chop up sprites and throw in their juices. Want some?
In theory, this should work, so why isn't it WORKING?! AAAHHH! This is starting to REALLY PISS ME OFF!
What am I trying to raise the dead for? Beats me. I forgot! Why's it matter anyway?
I'm gonna slice that woman into itty-bitty pieces! How dare she try to hit on MY Nimby-Wimby! Ohhh, I'll make her PAY!
The sprites I summon seem kinda funny, don't they? I get the feeling they weren't always like this... But eh. Who cares?
Ehehe! I'm Sohvi. Get in the way of my research, and it'll be the last thing you ever do!
Ehehe, hehehe! The formula this time should do the trick! Soon, I'll become the furry wife of your dreams, Nimbus!
211009: A s-s-sword? *whimper* But I'm no good with blades!
Whoooa. That floaty thing there is another world? No way!
Everyone tells me that I'm just a big crybaby—my friends, even my dad! I'll show them all. I'll become the best marksman in the world!
Click, bang, boom! When I'm shooting to my heart's content, I feel like I'm on top of the world!
Hehe... I've been feeling a teensy bit more confident lately! Don't worry, everyone—Kyrie will protect you!
H-hello, m-my name is Kyrie! My specialties are hyper-fast reloading and rapid fire! It's… it's nice to meet you!
Joining up with you has been a blast, Alk! No matter what lies ahead, I promise I'll charge in alongside you—guns blazing!
131011: It is my duty to enforce the law, protect the populace, and bring about peace to the world. To these ends I dedicate every aspect of my being.
I am currently in pursuit of a suspect in a crucial case. I request that you cooperate with my investigation.
Why is Commander Light so... fluffy? It is not the place of a commanding officer to be so soft and cuddly. I will need to exercise great self-restraint.
If our relationship were to become known, I would be a fugitive as well. In other words, we are now accomplices.
Thus far we have had fluffy, silky, and jiggly. What other tactile sensations will I experience in the next world? I can hardly wait.
I have decided to fight. I cannot avoid my memories, nor my wrongdoings. I must confront them and forge ahead.
First Commander of the Aegis Squadron, Savior Seraph ready for duty. Please refer to me as Sera. Your body composition is most... unusual.
I will use this newfound power to atone for my wrongdoings. My mission is not yet complete.
121007: It's beautiful... Way out here, the cruel desert and the chaos of life are just stars.
It's wonderful here. People can pursue their own happiness without resenting others, or being resented. This must be what freedom is like.
I've been traveling a long time. Hope's often eluded me, but I will never give up the chase.
Rolan was ahead of his time. His duties tied him to the Oasis, but in heart and mind, he traveled farther than anyone. Now, Nimbus is living Rolan's dreams.
The professors at the Arcane Arts Academy often say I'm violating dress code... Cultural differences, I suppose.
My journey is far from over. I wonder where our shared path will lead us.
My name is Rakisha. I'm a traveler. Are you the world-hoppers I've heard so much about?
Haha. My ego put blinkers on me. I never saw the people walking beside me, or those following behind. I never realized I wasn't alone.
261007: You looking for a shoulder to cry on? I can listen, but I'm not really good at comforting people.
Keep your weapons maintained. Never know when you're in for an ambush.
I was just thinking about the fort... Sorry. Nothing to worry about.
We're going drinking tonight. I'll show you how to really let lose.
I was and always will be a Navy man. I could never see myself doing anything else but... With you guys, I'm willing to try.
The name's Selgir. Only thing you need to know about me: my targets never get away.
If I let people tell me what is and isn't possible, I'd never get anywhere. I steer my own ship.
221009: Many of your people are not human... I like that...
S-sorry. I'm still not used to speaking. But... I'm always happy w-when you talk to me...
My shikigami... is a snake yokai. I'm not sure if I'll ever learn to control its power...
Wood, fire, earth, metal, and water. All diviners' arts require the five basic elements. But your spells function on wholly different principles...
The pain... The mockery from the villagers... sapped me of strength. But the kindness of your smiles... fills me with strength.
I-I am Mizuchi of the Diviners' Commission. There's much I have yet to learn, but... I hope you'll allow me to accompany you.
I cannot be like Miss Stella or Princess Inaho... But I don't need to. I will find my own form of strength!
331013: I'll offer pointers if you really want me to.
Never let your guard down. Always be on the lookout, no matter where you are.
I'm not very good at conversation, sorry...
Been a long time since I ate with others around...
Call on me if you need me. I've got your back.
Name's Vargen. My axes are yours whenever you need them.
Seems I've gotten stronger. I'll put this strength to use protecting you all.
151007: Strong. Skilled. Stunning. That is who I am. I have nothing to fear, all right? I have. Nothing. TO FEAR!
There lives a fool, as cowardly as he is vain, guarded by shields that move on their own. If he may have his magical aegis, then I may have my swords.
It is the financial might of the Swes that has made me master of these arms. The coin truly is greater than the sword! ...Don't ask how much I spent.
When a party is harmed by a settlement, it is violence. When both gain, then it is trade. Commerce makes the whole greater than its parts.
I seek to institute free and fair trade between my country and Palpebra. My friend, will you not join me in paving the way?
I am Libram, son of the Swes, sixth of the Nine Noble Houses. I hope we may establish amicable relations.
As the youngest son, I never had any hopes laid on me. Instead, I was given freedom. But now, for once, I have something to prove... To myself.
241009: WOW! There's more ta see down here than I thought! And the city's all ritzy glitzy! I wanna see it all!
Y'know, this traditional tengu stuff I'm wearin' is great for flyin' and all, but it's so last century. C'mon, wouldn't I look cute in a floofy little dress?
Nghh, I'm STARVING! Y'all got anythin' to eat on ya? Doesn't need to be fancy.
I tried some of that "boba" tea stuff, but I'll be real, it tasted like konjac. I bet it'd go good with miso, though, don'tcha think?
How Master's doin'? ...Hmm, for all he acts big 'n tough, he's a real softie. Maybe I SHOULD swing by the mountain and say hi.
Hi! Nice ta meetcha all! I'm Kohane. This is gonna be a blast!
You know... Maybe I'll drop by the mountain. I'll bet Master's lonely without me a...round... W-WAIT! N-n-not that I'M lonely, ya hear?!
141006: What lovely weather we're having... A spot of tea with good company would be wonderful right about now.
A diplomat's job is to make a good impression. A well-timed smile is as potent as a blade or as sheltering as a shield.
This is one of the Guild's most magical items. It can fly people around, keep tea warm, and even preserve baked sweets!
The future is our responsibility, and we would do well not to shirk it. The opportunity to do what we can shouldn't be squandered.
What kind of future will we create together? No matter what it may be, I have a feeling it'll be worth the investment.
I'm Miguel, the Guild's messenger pigeon. There's no need to stand on ceremony. Why don't you join me for a cup of tea?
The future is in your hands. Whatever you invest in me, I shall repay equally and fairly. Now, let us be off, to the future we desire!
321011: I know I'm lugging around this big old axe, but... The less I have to use it, the better.
I guess I must LOOK weak, 'cause no one ever takes me seriously. *sigh* I wish I looked as strong as I am.
Let's see... That's should be everything! ...Oh! Did you want me to carry that over too? Don't worry! I'm a lot stronger than I look.
Back when I helped the Fellowship of Floof, I met the COOLEST doctor! I hope I can be that cool someday...
Believing in yourself... isn't always easy, is it? But... Light believes in me, so I'm gonna keep my chin up and do my best!
Um, I'm... My name is Clara. I work as a mercenary, so let me know if you need some extra muscle!
I wanted to be brave like Light, but... Thanks to you guys, I feel like I already AM brave! Yeah! No one's stopping me!
251009: Where are you all headed today? I'd be happy to help out if you'll have me!
Don't mind me, just doing a little sword practice. Promise I won't fall over. A little dizziness... never killed anyone—
Uh-oh, I blew up Nimbus again... I'm so sorry! I swear it wasn't on purpose!
I've been practicing my fishing skills! I'm getting pretty good at blowing the big ones up. That's how fishing works, right?
Say, Alk. Stella. Next time you take a day off... Mind inviting me along again? Ehehe...
Whoa, so this is what another world is like. I'm not sure how helpful I'll be here, but I'll do my best to chip in!
I'm still figuring out who I am... But I think I'm a little more confident now thanks to you guys!
700010:
Hey, Light, come help me out with training!
Heh. I'm so spoiled, getting drilled by a champion.

The stuff I cook might not be fancy, but you can bet your bottom coin it's good.
If you're hungry, let me whip something up.

I don't remember anything about my life before Starview.
...Aw, it's not a big deal. I'm sure it'll all come back to me.
With all these worlds, can you imagine the sort of people that'd be living on them? Kick-ass soldiers, full-tilt weirdos... I've gotta have my own thing too, you know? To stand out!
Starview's sure come to life. It's nothing like back when it was just me and Stella. It... feels like home now.

Light, you think I don't see those carrots on your plate? Eat your veggies, okay? You're a big-boy champion.
...That is the weirdest thing I've ever said.

Come on! On to the next world!
I promise I can handle it.

Don't you worry about me. I've picked a few new tricks and stunts.
I'm more than ready for the next world!
700009:
Hey, Light, come help me out with training!
Heh. I'm so spoiled, getting drilled by a champion.

The stuff I cook might not be fancy, but you can bet your bottom coin it's good.
If you're hungry, let me whip something up.

I don't remember anything about my life before Starview.
...Aw, it's not a big deal. I'm sure it'll all come back to me.
With all these worlds, can you imagine the sort of people that'd be living on them? Kick-ass soldiers, full-tilt weirdos... I've gotta have my own thing too, you know? To stand out!
Starview's sure come to life. It's nothing like back when it was just me and Stella. It... feels like home now.

Light, you think I don't see those carrots on your plate? Eat your veggies, okay? You're a big-boy champion.
...That is the weirdest thing I've ever said.

Come on! On to the next world!
I promise I can handle it.

Don't you worry about me. 
I've picked a few new tricks and stunts.
I'm more than ready for the next world!
333001: This kimono from Yamato is purrr-fect! It's hard to move in, but it's so beautiful, Mew-Mew wants to wear it every day!
Mew Year's gifts? Toys to roll around and play with? That sounds totally paw-some!
How do I look in my costume? Am I mew-tiful? Fur real? You're making Mew-Mew blush!
What will you all do fur Mew Year's? I wanna play the Yamato paddle game, stay up late, plan my resolutions, and— Myaaa... So much to keep track of!
*Yaaawn* It feels like my fur-al instincts have awakened! My kitty punch will knock foes into next week!
Happy Mew Year! My resolution is to help my fur-riends by being a more dependable kitty.
Happy Mew Year! Thanks fur celebrating with me! Let's have a paw-some mew year together!
263001: The world is expanding. You know what I call that? A business opportunity. Plus, it means plenty more cute things on my property, so it's all good!
I love anything and everything cute: jewelry, art, animals, children, dolls, everything. Everything! I need it all right here with me.
I'm not a fan of fights. They are so not cute. Then again, seeing someone fight with all their heart for something... Hee hee, that's pretty cute.
I'm happy that you're all getting so strong, but...I don't want to see you get big and burly. So not cute. Don't lose your slim cuteness along the way.
You! Your face is so cute! I just want to cup it in my hands. Is that okay? ...It's not okay? All right. Well, I'll just have to come along with you, then!
I can't believe you'd make me go through so much to get my hands on you! Hee hee. It's so...cute! I just know you'll be mine in the end. That's what makes this so fun!
323001: Ta-da! What do you think? Does this outfit make me look more grown-up?
Holidays are fun! Humans are good at having fun!  If I spend more time with them, I'll have lots more fun!
Happy Holidays! I'll work hard to be the best holiday tree ever and make everyone merry!
Regitare's been treating me like a sapling ever since we went troublemaking. Mrgh, I'm a grown-up tree! I can take care of myself!
Stella, do you wear makeup? Can you teach me? I want to try. Um... Do I put on honey... like this?
Challua wants to celebrate with everyone! Let's all have fun together!
The holidays are when everyone comes together to have fun! I'll become a tree, so you can decorate me and make lots of happy memories!
121004: Next time you head out, you should bring me along, too. ...What? Don't worry. I'll only freeze the foes this time. I promise.
Do you know how to make something last forever? I do. You encase it in ice. Everything stays as it is in ice, even memories.

You might not think it to look at me, but I was actually pretty well-known all across the seas. They called me the "Ice Queen," the "Ivory Reaper," and the "Scourge of the Seas." I guess everybody was pretty scared of me.
I want to show this sky to my sister someday. It might just be a foolish dream, but it's the hope that keeps me going.
Get too close and you might freeze solid! ...I'm kidding. Don't worry. I can control my powers. A touch won't do you any harm.
Happiness is like snow. It's beautiful, but it eventually melts away. But the day when it comes and piles up again always comes. When that day comes, how about we all have a big snowball fight?
I am the Ice Queen Cypher, chilly preserver of both time and fate. I can come along if you'd like... Or are you scared of me, too?
I have no intention of losing to fate. In that regard, we are the same, no? I suppose that's what you'd call being like-minded. I'm glad we agree.
161004: I'd like to return to the Elven Woods... But I don't want any trouble.
You need power to survive. That's the mantra I've always lived by.
Enchanted blades never go dull. They can't be blunted by monsters or fruit. Want to give it a swing?
"I fight to defend people who have no one else." That oath is what gives my life meaning.
All you need is inner strength. When it comes to physical power, I've got you covered.
Name's Mormia. Occupation: adventurer. Weapon of choice: enchanted blade. One of the few half-elves to ever exist. I'm here to help you fight for peace.
Power is only justified when it's used to protect others. You're the one who taught me that. Thank you.
231008: I'll do whatever it takes to come out on top. It's the only way to survive. Need proof? I'm still alive, aren't I?
I like them strong because they're all the more useful to me. But I would never take without giving in return... You scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
I despise people who act "in the name of justice." I know mercenaries will perform as long as I have what they want. But with heroes... you just have to trust them.
What? Do you want some of my sherbet? Fine. You get one lick and no more. You should be happy. It's more than you deserve.
On the flip side of every smile is avarice. And behind every veil of tears is cunning. I know I can't trust anyone... So what am I hoping for?
My name is Adonis. You look like the strong, dependable type. Mind if I come along for the ride?
I've never trusted to hope, and I'm not about to start now. But I decided to follow my heart, and that's why I'm coming with you.
341010: What? This? I'm sharpening my knife. It's been my trusty companion since I first started out on the street. I've gotta keep it in good condition if it's gonna have my back, y'know?
Man, the people here are something else! I mean, Palpebra was one thing, but these guys are a whole other level. Never a dull moment, though, right?
I'm Stella's bodyguard. Where she goes, I go. I'd follow her to the ends of the earth. But another world? Didn't see that one coming.
To think I'd be, not just a Kaleidoscope adventurer, but one in another world! Heh heh. If only I could go back and tell my kid self, "Hey, check this out! Can you believe it?!"
Hey, Stella, show me around the library. I wanna get some books for the kids. That cool? Heh heh. It'd better be!
The kids call me "Scary Kate." From here on out, I'm gonna be Stella's bodyguard. Nice ta meetcha! ...So, uh, what is this place, anyway?
That stuff about being a bodyguard just kinda slipped out before. ...But, thanks, Stella! This time, it's for real! I'm gonna protect you!
121003: Happy New Year! Have you thought up some good resolutions? Of course mine is to completely conquer the Kaleidoscope!
Hey, if you're free, how about a game of badminton? Heh-heh. I'll warn you, though. I'm pretty good!
Other worlds are incredible! I wanna learn about all their customs! I bet I'll end up learning more about myself too!
*munch, munch* Mmm, this rice cake is great! I wonder if this would catch on in Palpebra, too.
Victory isn't something you get by beating others down. Real victory is something you share! Don't you think?
The name's Ellya—master of light and kimono mage extraordinaire! I'll show you my brand-new strength!
Yamato's culture is fascinating! And there are so many other unexplored worlds too. But I'll find them all! Just you wait and see!
111005: Welcome to the Battle Royale: All Star Smash, or "BRASS" for short! We're gonna be the ones taking home the gold!
Huh? I don't really get all this "other worlds" stuff. It's kinda overwhelming.
Raaaaaaah! Excellent! Another day in perfect vocal form! With pipes like these, we can't lose!
Mmmmmmm! Alk, your omelet game is seriously on point! I'd follow you to the end of the world and back for just one more bite!

I love Kapipi and Catherine so much. 
When we're together, it's like we can 
shoot for the stars! 
You guys wanna come along 
for the ride?
You wouldn't know it by looking, but Kapipi is seven years old. Wait a minute. That makes me older than her, doesn't it? No way!
We're Hard Rock Magic, and we're coming out on top of this All-Star Smash! You'll be there cheering us on, right?

I don't really know why I sing, 
but that's okay! 
I'll find my answer someday! 
Kapipi! Catherine! Let's hit it!
261006:
Happy New Year's.
This will be the year we return with Light to his home world. I can feel it.
I had this outfit custom-made. What do you think? I quite like it. Perhaps I'll fetch that katana as well...
Once I've resolved to do something, I see it through to the end. The same holds true for cooking. You won't get the better of me, Alk.

Will!
Don't you dare listen to him! He lies! It's all lies!
Where is that unkempt fool?! He offered to buy my zatsuni so he could use it as a weapon! The nerve of him!

Heh. You look surprised.
I'm the last of the Swallow Knights. I must do our name proud!
There is more to cooking than I thought... I'd like to learn more about it. You will teach me, won't you?
241006: Kakemakumo kashikoki... Hehe. What did you think? I heard it's a prayer from Yamato, so I was trying it out!
Don't you just feel all fired up with the start of a new year? I'm really getting into the spirit!
Who wants their fortune read? They say a good one will bring you luck throughout the whole year!
Wait! So you're telling me the calories from whatever my shadow eats makes ME gain weight?! I am so not okay with that!
Eeeeek! My new year's fortune just blew away! Why does this kind of thing always happen to me?!
Happy New Year! So this is what shrine maidens in Yamato wear. Um...how do I look?
Wow! Look how strong I've gotten! Now I can keep that shadow of mine in check! My dignity as a maiden depends on it!
211007: Planning's important, no matter what you're doing. Not every pencil has an eraser, you know. Think first, and then write!
Calligraphy's got me thinking about lettering and the spacing of every word... That kind of attention to detail is also what makes a good article!

How do I look?
Heh... I had the kimono tailored so I could run around in my boots!
Letters represent more than just sounds. If you give them different shapes and colors, they can get across emotion. That's what makes calligraphy so interesting!

As a reporter, it's my job to deliver the best of the world to the public's front doorstep!
And that's exactly what I'm gonna do this year! Just you wait!
This is Luluca, representing the Oculus. I'm here with a special report on kakizome, and I'm all dressed up to do it!
Kakizome's only one of countless traditions! Every world, culture, and town has something to share. You ready to look for our next big scoop?
351008: I come from mountains! Mama is pack leader! I make my own pack!
Many, many wolves in Mama's pack! We talk a lot! Huh? You CAN'T talk to wolves? Poor friend...
Alk is so big brain! Join my pack anytime! Nimbus join too!
Mama is a big, big wolf! Guild man calls her demon wolf. But why? Mama so sweet!
I'm pack leader now! All right, everybody! Follow me! Kharo lead you to victory!
I'm Kharo! You can join my pack! Don't worry, I'm nice wolf!
Warm day when Mama bring me home. I like warm day, so I make my pack bigger on warm day. I do just like Mama do!
443001: MIC CHECK. ONE, TWO. ONE, TWO.
LOOKS LIKE WE'RE ALL SOLD OUT OF GOLD BARS. THANK YOU GUYS SO MUCH.
HOW ABOUT I GOLDENIZE YOU TOO?
EYE LASERS? REALLY? YOU COULDN'T COME UP WITH ANYTHING ELSE?
KISEKI'S DISEMBODIED HEAD IN THE HOUSE.
THANKS FOR EVOLVING ME. EVEN THOUGH I'M JUST A HEAD.
443002:
I'm here from another dimension to RING IN A NEW ERA!
...What do you think? Too much?
I'm, like, a total badass in these battles. I mean, have you seen me?
Where's all my staff? Don't leave me, guys...
Um, yeah. Thanks for evolving me and all, but why am I just a 2-star character? Come on!
You've spent, like, all this time leveling me, so make sure I'm in your party, 'kay?
Triangle, square, circle, square. Psyche, triangle! It's Towa Kiseki!
131003:
Oh, would you look at that?
The ring of tea leaves in the cup look like a little wreath.
Happy holidays! I hope the rest of your year is merry and warm.
Ahaha, you have a big day of opening presents ahead of you, so you need a good night's sleep. Would a cup of tea help you relax?
I stopped by the Maids' Parlor the other day, and the head housemaid made—ahem—allowed me to wear a uniform. Clothing varies greatly by world...
This Santa outfit has grown on me. Iori would have laughed at me, but it puts such a smile on the little ones' faces. I can be their "Santa" a bit longer.
Soushiro Kengyu, here to spread some holiday cheer! Now, shall we start delivering these presents?
Delivering presents was a gratifying experience.  I am truly fortunate to know such sweet children. I will treasure their gift—and spread their goodwill!
151004: Behold! A brand new outfit for a brand new me! How does it look? Am I not the trendiest girl in all the land?
Now I know the secret to Santa's popularity, I shall be unstoppable! The boys will never know what hit them!
Seasons greetings, and a happy new year! Come on, I wanna go play in the snow!
Let's summon shooting stars over Yamato next year. Imagine yokai and humans, wishing upon the same stars... Holiday cheer is ALWAYS in style!
Mwahaha, look at this! A child wrote a thank-you letter to "Yokai Santa!" I DID want to be popular, but... this is more than enough for me.
I, Princess Inaho Tamamo, daughter of Nine Tails, hereby declare that I have become the trendiest girl in the land!
I "like" like you too! I shall swap presents with you again next year—and ever after! That is a promise!
111004: Does this outfit look all right? I'm still not used to all the festive accents... Then again, she did pick it out just for me, and I trust her judgment, hehe.
Will my gun work wrapped up like this? It's a  Kaleidoscope weapon—a little ribbon won't affect it. ...Maybe I'll loosen it a little, though. Just in case.
Thank you for coming. I'm pleased you could make it— You look surprised. The mission called for proper etiquette, and I'm a quick study.
Taffy? It's thanks to her that I am who I am today. I couldn't ask for a better colleague... or a dearer friend.
I don't dance unless it's for work or someone special asks. Hm? You'd like a dance? Maybe... Ask me again at the ball tonight.
I'm Marianne, your bodyguard and maid... Ahem, I mean, your companion this evening. Try not to stare too much—I'm still not used to this outfit.
Thank you for the wonderful gifts. Allow me to return your kindness with a memorable evening. How about a carol to kick things off?
231007: Happy holidays! I've got presents for you—but only if you've been good!

You get any presents?
Me? Yeah, you bet! From my best pal Baloosh!

You wanna know if I believe in Santa? 
Uh, well, I've never met him, but he gets me to do deliveries sometimes. Or, at least, I wish he did!
I'm spending the holidays with all of my best friends—like Baloosh, Alk, and everyone else at Starview. I've never been happier!
Look! It's snowing! Baloosh, you ready for a snowball fight?

I'm Aureo, and this is my pal Baloosh. We're here to deliver your presents!
(Guin! Gu guin!)

I think we've gotten strong enough to carry big, giant presents! You feeling up to the challenge, Baloosh?
(Guin! Gu gu gu!)
211006: Whoa, so those floaty things are other worlds? That's nuts! Wait... Could my weapons be from another world, too? So that's why they look so weird!
In my right hand is Drake Buster! In my left is Demon Slayer! Or, wait. Was it the other way around? Whatever! Pretty cool either way, right?
When you're lost, down, or don't know what to do... that's the perfect time for dungeon diving! Who knows what treasures we'll find! Let's go, go, goooo!
Without my guns, I'd still be a pack mule. It was wrong to even consider using other weapons. Drakey, Deemy, from now on, we're a team!
I chose an outfit that's easy to move around in, but everyone kept giving me funny looks. Huh? What do you mean it was too form-fitting?!
The name's Kannon—Copperhead Kannon. Huh? You've never heard of me?! No way! I'm kind of a big deal! Well, you know me now. Glad to meetcha!
I'm gonna become big! A legend! An EPIC legend! That'll show my old man! Till then—no, even after—we're in this together!
331012: Isn't this crystal ball lovely? Would you like to look into it?
There's so much water... Back home, we often suffered from drought. Rain seems to make everything more hazy and beautiful, doesn't it?
Starview's a lovely place. Just gazing out over it makes me feel at peace.
If I join you on this journey, you will guide me to a brighter future. I don't need a crystal ball to tell me that—I can feel it in my heart.
There are some things that even I can't predict. Weather, for instance. If only I could get my hands on the mystical "geta..."
I foresaw our meeting in a crystal ball. It is our destiny to journey together.
I spent my entire life gazing at mist and shadows. But no longer. With you, I have learned to look towards the light.
141001: Sir Alk! I've been waiting for you. It's time for sparring practice. Ohh no. You aren't getting away.
Enlil the Skyfang, a treasured family heirloom. A dragon stole it once, but I got it back... The battle? Dull, dragons are no swordmasters.
Lady Stella, I'm really glad we all became friends. Here, I'm free to just be myself.

I've been sparring with some other people recently... Would you like to know who?
Well, too bad, Sir Alk. It's a secret.

This blade is the pride of Tris.
...It's odd. I all but cut ties with my family, but thinking of them... still brings me strength.
A swordfight... That's a far better way to get to know someone than socializing. With each blade clash, you can just hear the thrumming of your hearts.
I am Celtie Tris, of the Farlands. What say we spar sometime? I think you'll find I'm quite handy with a sword.

I, Celtie of the House of Tris, swear upon my sword to guard and keep Starview Village... 
I'll be the Knight of Stars. Got a nice ring to it, doesn't it?
151003:
Oh, you came to watch my match? Thanks!
 I'll have to put on an extra good show today!
The lead-up to Elysian Blade is just as important as the strike itself. The fight should be a story, and the finishing blow, my signature.

It's tricky coming up with cool victory poses. I was thinking of going with THIS.
How's it look?
I get a rush of adrenaline just watching you fight. The way you protect others is heroic—it's got the makings of a great show!
You should come fight in the arena some time. A heel turn'd be fun—good guy gone bad!
The name's Eclair. You may've seen me in the Platinum Arena. If you haven't, come watch a bout on the house.
Seeing all the unique fighters here really gets my blood pumping! Send some of them my way—if they think they can beat the champ, that is.
241005: I'm not the type to look before I leap, really. I trust my nose to lead me wherever there's danger to deal with.
I don't plan as far ahead as you might think. Why, one whiff of danger and my feet start moving before my mind catches up!
I'm not in this for fame or thanks, so you need pay me no mind. I'm just doing as I please.
Everyone needs a break now and then. I quite enjoy strolls through town, taking in all the sights and smells.
You certainly smell like danger, but I also get notes of... Hmm, how to put it? Something refreshing, which I'd love to put a name to.
Helga Vanese, charmed to meet you. I was a soldier, but I think I'll tag along with you lot for a spell. Ah, the sweet scent of danger!

The nose always knows!
I'm glad to put this old sniffer of mine to good use protecting our humble little abode.
231006: I'm not good at thinking. Fighting is easier. Feels better. Just smash your problems! Easy!
I don't wanna do anything when I'm hungry. But when I'm hungry, I can't smash my problems away...

I learned to wait my turn. Those who can't need to learn manners!
But Alk's cooking smells so good... I can't wait anymore! Graaargh!

I'm from a different world. But I like this world more!
Food is tasty! Everyone's friendly!
Strange. Everything taste better when Alk feeds me himself. I want to do it again.
Where am I? Hmm... no matter. I'll just smash any problem that comes my way! Graaargh!
I'm stronger! I'm bigger! Big muscles means big food!...Food? I'm hungry... Alk! Feed me!
321010:
Do I really look THAT unreliable?
...Yeah, I guess I do, don't I?
Believe me, it's not for lack of trying...
Supervising the spring means taking care of the monster guarding it... *sigh* I hope we'll get along...

Huh? What's wrong with my suit? Ahaha, I think it looks pretty snappy! Right?
...White probably wasn't the best choice for adventuring, though.
Um... I know this is sudden, but... I'd lo-like to spend some more time with you... I-if that's okay, of course.
My father keeps badgering me to get married now that I've taken over the family business. I don't know what to do!...Um, Alk? Are you listening?

My name's Rico. I know I don't look like the strongest, but—H-hey! Don't look at me like that!
I-I'll try my best...
I've got the family business riding on my shoulders now, so I turned over a new leaf and started training! ...Huh? I still look meek? T-take that baaack!
253013:
I'll hit our enemies with barrels. 
You think it's a bad idea? 
Amelia suggested it though...
I'm practicing a lot of things—like how to move my arms and legs separately, how to sing, and how to not burn the kitchen down.
It will be okay, Couette. You'll meet Rooma again. I can help you think of conversation topics for the next time you see him.
Challua taught me the trick to smiling—it's to have fun. But... I'm already having fun... so how do I improve my smile?
Bryce made these barrel-shaped bombs with help from Renoir and Malviola. Then Hanabi added her own touch. I like them a lot.
I started writing my book. It's actually easier to write a lot than talk a lot. Also... I may have exaggerated a few details in it.
I was able to help with the fighting for once—inside a dream. Using barrels. Do you think I can do it in reality too?
I've decided to keep fighting. Even if I'm wrong... Even if I'm broken... I'll push forward!
163001: ...Food? Rations are more than enough for me. But... Thank you.
Excuse me, but could I take another look at the library? There's still much for me to learn of the outside world.
My blades are always watching. Whether it's my enemies or Orochi itself, I can count on them when the moment comes.
You know, my blades need their rest just like you and me. They even get cranky if they don't get enough sleep.
I want to do the right thing... Even if I can never make up for the past, I have to try. Only then can I have the chance to see her once more.
It's time for food? I'll set the table then. Thanks... for inviting me to join.
The name's Yakumo, a fugitive ninja. I'm looking for Orochi's blade to be granted an audience. Do you know where I can find it?
I always dream of the day I can meet her once more... Until that day comes, my search continues. Will you help me?
213001: Welcome home! Dinner's ready if you want to eat. Or do you first want to... Ah. Wait, hold on. Don't get the wrong idea—
I can't be the only one who thinks it's weird to celebrate the birthday of a dungeon, right? Oh well, might as well have a good time!
You like it? That's good... Nah, don't mind me. It just reminded me how nice it is to have someone enjoy my cooking, that's all.
Wasn't there this one superhero that helped hungry people? You haven't heard of that? I remember liking him when I was younger... I think.
Heh. Second place... I can't believe I got second place. Ah, crap, I'm grinning like an idiot again, aren't I?
I feel like a new path has opened up for me. I know more and can do more than ever before... I just love that feeling, you know?
